choices: Aya the cave girl from the stone age
Cassandra the spoiled princess from the middle ages
Jester the Jester girl from the middle ages
Erica the wild viking girl from the 9th century
1.content:
All right. Which girls do we have?

Name: Aya
Time area: Stone age
Is: Just a average cave girl
Age: 5
Size: Very chubby on the edge of fat
Eyes: Blue
Hair: Long dark brown straight hair
Favorite food: Mammoth meat
Likes: Eating, cute animals, listen to stories, sleeping and bathing (in a river or pond as long if it is't to deep)
Dislikes: Being hungry, being bullied, hard work and exercise
Siblings: One older sister (Annie) and one older brother (Jon)
About her: Aya is just a average cave girl. Her family lives in a tribe. When she was born she was thin and small. Her parents were worried if she would survive so they fed her as much if they could what gave her a big appetite. She's still short for her age but surely is't thin anymore, but chubby almost fat. She's a cute girl, sometimes a bit curious. Her older siblings sometimes tease her but she the pride and joy of her parents and grandparents.

Name: Cassandra
Time area: Middle ages somewhere around the 17th century
Is: A princess
Age: 7
Size: Fat
Eyes: Light blue
Hair: Long blond, shiny, straight hair
Favorite food: Anything sweet
Wears: beautiful dresses and gowns
Likes: Eating, dresses, jewelery, tiara's and let female servants make her pretty
Dislikes: Being hungry, not being listened too, exercise and dirty clothes
Siblings: None
About her: Cassandra is a princess. The only child so her parents spoil her a lot. If she wants something, she just have to scream and she gets it. There are always servants ready for her. She loves sweet stuff and eats that a lot what made her fat and gave her also a big appetite. She is't really mean but since she gets everything she wants since she was born she does't understand that some people don't have much money. Since she never has to do anything she's pretty lazy. She can get really angry if you ignore her or make her clothes dirty. Do you want to make this future queen, queen sized?

Name: Jester (still a girl)
Time area: Middle ages somewhere around the 17th century
Is: A jester (duh)
Age: 6
Size: Normal
Eyes: Green
Hair: Orange with wild spikes (however mostly hidden under a jester's hat)
Favorite food: Sea food
Wears: A half red, half green costume with a jester hat and bells
Likes: Eating, preforming, telling jokes, sometimes a practical joke and dancing
Dislikes: Critic at her preforming, people without humor, being ignored and saying she is't funny
Siblings: A twin brother (Jack)
About her: Jester and her brother are both even at a very young age jesters. They're a very comical duo and together they put on good shows. They look alike like two drops of water except She's a girl and her brother is a boy and her hair is long however that's mostly hidden under a jester hat. They life with the servants in the castle of the king and queen. Jester would love it if she for once would be able to totally pig out.

Name: Erica
Time Area: 9th century
Is: A viking
Age: 7
Size: Fat
Eyes: Brown
Hair: Wild dark brown hair
Favorite food: Meat that you can rip right of the bone
Wears: She does't really care
Likes: Eating, Listen too stories from her father, wild viking parties and archery
Dislikes: Being hungry, hearing she can't do things because she's a girl, working at the land and taking care of animals
Siblings: None
About her: She's a viking girl and daughter of the chief. She's pretty lazy if it is about chores but loves eating. That's why she's pretty fat but most woman in her village are kind of heavy so nobody cares but she does have a big appetite. What she wants is to go with her dad to plunder some villages. She practiced a lot with archery and became pretty good. But her father does't want to take because... She's a girl.

Or do you want another girl?
1.title: First choice in history

choices: Follow Aya, Angeica and Annie checking fruit
Aya sneaks out the cave before they can go
Aya fakes being sick so she can stay in the cave
11.content:
It was a beautiful sunrising. It promised to be a warm and sunny day. A bright blue sky. Birds were singing in the trees while animals and humans woke up.
Aya however was still in bed. Curled up under her blanket of mammoth fur. It was nice and warm. She turned once to the wall of the cave and tried to fall asleep again. She heard sounds and knew that her family woke up.
However she was happy. I had gotten warmer the past days. That mend summer was coming. Aya loved the summer. Because that mend there was more food. The only thing she did't liked about the summer was that the mammoths were gone. She loved mammoth meat. But she normally only could eat it in the winter. Maybe late autumn or early spring. It depended a bit of the weather. However she also liked the summer because that mend it was warm outside.

"Aya. It's time to wake up!" Annie yelled and pulled her blanket of her.

"Hee. I was trying to sleep!" Aya mumbled angry.

"Come on. You slept long enough. You don't wanna miss breakfast." Annie said.

That one simple last word breakfast got Aya's attention. Aya had a big appetite. In the stone age you need to eat whenever you could. Then at least you had some extra fat for the times when it was harder to find food. However Aya had been very lucky. Her father was a very good hunter and mostly could get some meat. Her mother knew exactly which plants and roots you could eat so they mostly had food.
But since Aya was kind of small her parents made sure she got enough food. This made the little cave girl very chubby. Almost fat. But Aya did't mind. Her parents surely did't mind it. She thought she looked a lot like the mother. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/venus_of_w... The mother of all living things. Who gave birth to any human and animal. Everything cam from out her womb. She was the goddess. Looking like her was't a bad thing.
However her siblings however did mind that their little sister got so much attention. Especially Annie. Jon just accepted it but Annie sometimes teased her little sister.
Aya put on a on a dress made of deer skin a waddled to her parents. Who were sitting around their fire.

"Ah Aya there you are. It's nice weather. If this continues for a few days we can eat eat outside." Her mother said.

Aya smiled however she did't care if they ate outside or inside, as long if she got food.

"Diana said she spotted a group of deers. Near the waterfall." Aya's father Groom said. "If we can catch some of those we have food for a few days."

The deers Groom was talking about are't the normal deers we have today. These were a lot bigger. There was about a length of two yards between the antlers. But sadly enough those animals are extinct a long time ago. But not in the stone age.

"We're gonna check if some fruit is ripe." Aya's mother Angelica said with a smile.

Aya moaned softly. She knew that this mend walking and if the fruit was ripe carrying it back to the cave. It was hard work, and Aya hated hard work. But she also knew that there was no way out of it. If the fruit was ripe she had a chance to take a bite when they were there.
11.title: Aya the cave girl

choices: She wants that servants make her pretty
12.content:
Cassandra opened her eyes. She looked outside. Cold weather with a good chance of rain. It was also kind of cold in her room. She reached out and pulled at a cord. A minute later a servant walked in.

"What do you want your highness?" She asked polite.

"It's cold. Could you make a fire?" Cassandra asked friendly.

"Of course. I must admit it is kind of cold in here. It's the time of the year."

Cassandra looked at the ceiling while rubbing her beautiful big belly. As a princess and future queen she of course needed to look beautiful. If she looked at herself in her mirror she always thought she looked beautiful. She loved wearing nice dresses and always loved it when a servant did her hair, or used some make up for her face. She never need to do those things by herself. Her servants did it all for her. They even helped her dressing herself. She could do it herself but liked it if somebody did it for her.
The servant finally made a fire and soon the room was getting warm.

"Should I go?" The servant asked.

"No. I think I'm ready to get up. Help me get dressed. I would like... a pink dress today."

The servant walked to a walk in closet. Cassandra had dozens of dresses and gowns. As princess she could easily get them. But she also outgrew them kind of fast. Not in height but in size. She finally found a pink dress that would probably still fit her.

"How about this one your highness?" She asked.

"A perfect. Put it on." Cassandra ordered.

It was a bit of a struggle. The dress was tight on the overweight girl but the servant was able to squeeze her in and pull up the zipper.
Cassandra looked at herself in the mirror and liked what she saw. Especially how her belly pushed against the fabric of her dress.

"I would like some breakfast." Cassandra said. "Some sausages, three eggs hard boiled, six toast covered wilt jelly, a omelet with two eggs and a pie."

You may think this was a bit much for a seven year old girl but this was a normal breakfast for the spoiled princess. She walked to the dining room. She sighed when she did't saw her parents. They were busy again. She knew it was hard work ruling a kingdom but still she did't liked it if they were't here.
A few minutes later a servant came with the food. Cassandra took her fork and knife but ate very well mannered. Since she was a toddler she was educated in the etiquette. But the most important reason was that she wanted to keep her dress clean. She could become furious if her dress became dirty.
She wondered what her parents were doing while she ate mannered but fast her breakfast.
Some time later Cassandra had eaten all the food she ordered for breakfast. She laid back with a swollen belly and put her hands on it.
12.title: The spoiled princess

choices: Cassandra is finally and properly full- what should she do with her day?
121.content:
Cassandra, Princess of Burgundy, was stuffed. Totally stuffed. Stuffed beyond belief. As she sat there, rubbing her dome of royal belly, she was sure there was nobody in the kingdom who could be as stuffed as her. She opened her mouth to order a belly rub, but instead she burped. Loud and long she belched, and just like that, she was hungry all over again. She called for more. "The same again, but six eggs this time, and have the cook send up some ham as well!"

Before too long, and before too many growls of hunger from the fat young princess, second breakfast had made its way up to her royal bedchamber. The cook had delivered on the ham, and done quite well- it was glazed with some sort of honey sauce and tasted perfectly delicious. In a few minutes all of that was gone as well, and now the princess was sure she was stuffed. She was full, totally, completely, ridiculously-

Then, her dress was rent in two, and she suddenly had more room. This time, she called for cake- two of them, light and fluffy, like she liked. She laid a hand on her pale, pampered globe of belly, and hoped that these thirds would be enough to satisfy it.
121.title: She's still hungry

choices: On the way over there something happens
1212.content:
After she devoured the cakes she laid back in her chair and let out a loud belch. Now she was properly full. She felt kind of stuffed. She knew she ad a big appetite but she could't remember she had ever eaten this much. Maybe it had something to do with the time of the year. Was there a time when girls got hungry?
Then she saw her dress.

"Oh no! My dress ripped." She moaned. "I loved this one."

Cassandra hated it something happened to her clothes. If someone made her clothes dirty or ripped them (did't matter if it was on purpose or an accident) she became furious. But when she outgrew them that was something she did herself. She did't became mad at herself. But she could't show herself with a ruined dress. She pulled her cord again and again a servant appeared.

"What is it your highness?" She asked.

"My dress. tore in two. So I need a new one. One that is't so tiny."

The servant took of the old dress of the princess. When she saw the princess in only her underwear she was a bit jealous at how beautiful fat the princess was. But of course she did't say that. She looked in the closet. She hoped she could find something. If their princess kept stuffing her face like this she would soon have outgrown every one of her dresses and gowns.
Lucky she found some bigger ones in the end of the closet. She took another pink dress and walked back to the princess who was rubbing her round belly. She smiled while doing it.
The servant looked at it and could't help it.

"Eh can I touch it princess?" She asked.

"Hm... well... okay. But you have to rub it!" Cassandra said.

The servant smiled hearing this. She rubbed the full, bloated and swollen tummy of the princess and liked doing it. Cassandra liked it too. It did feel nice that her tummy was rubbed now it was so full and swollen. After a few minutes Cassandra looked at the servant.

"All right that was enough. Now put on my dress."

"Of course you highness. Right away." The servant said

She put the dress on her princess and was relieved it still fitted. But it probably would't take long before she would outgrown this one too. Perhaps it was better if she told the king and queen. Then they could buy some new bigger dresses and gowns for their fat growing daughter. She always liked it to get new clothes.

"Hmmm I think I go outside. To the village."

"Are you sure, your highness? I mean the village is no place for a pretty princess like you."

"Yeah but mom and dad are away. So I don't have anything to do. Besides you go with me right. To keep an eye at me." She said and waddled outside.

"Of course I will." She said.

This really was't what she expected to do with her day. but making sure the princess was happy and safe was her first priority. It always had been.
1212.title: A swollen belly

125.content:
As Cassandra contently massaged her stuffed belly, a servant came bearing news.

"Milady have you enjoyed your breakfast?" the servant asked

"Why yes it was quite scrumptious." Cassandra answered patting her happy belly.

"Gracious as always your highness." the servant said in response to the princess's graceful tone.

"Well I do enjoy proper etiquette." the chubby princess said as she readjusted her body in her seat.

"Indeed, however I have news..." the servant responded
125.title: a servant approaches her

1251.content:
"It appears that your parents have returned to the castle and should be here to see you very soon." the servant spoke.

"EEEEE! Mommy and daddy are here!" squealed the jubilant princess. "Quick, tell me is my appearance acceptable, should I have my hair done?" Cassandra frantically asked in hopes of appearing perfect for her parents.

"You look perfectly fine, your excellence." the comforting servant said.

Cassandra stood in proper position anxiously awaiting her beloved parents. The regal lass grew joyful as she could hear footsteps approaching.

"Cassandra we're home!" simultaneously shouted the king and queen.

In entered the couple, her father a handsome, fit man only in his thirties, and his wife, a beautiful woman with long blonde hair(Cassandra took after her) along with supple, smooth skin with a body that more then met society's standards. The queen heaved her tremendously fat physique towards her cherished daughter. The sight of the queen's bouncing breasts, jiggling belly, thundering legs, and wobbly arms held out filled Cassandra with a soothing pleasure.

"Mommy!"

"Cassandra!"

The two squealed as they embraced each other in a plushy hug. Cassandra was enveloped in her mother's overwhelming breasts and belly fat.

"Oh sweetheart how has it been? Have you been eating well?" asked the queen.

"yes, I've been eating lots of tasty foods, see." Cassandra said grabbing her belly roll.

"I knew you would do a good job nourishing your body." said the king.

"I think mommy's done a good job too." Cassandra said grabbing a large fold of fat off the queen.

"Well a lady's got to keep up her appearance especially a queen." boasted the queen.

"I'm so happy that you both are here---"RIPPPP Cassandra's words were interrupted by her dress ripping.

"Oh no my pretty dress." frowned the princess.

"Don't fret dear, its just one of those things that beautiful women must endure." the queen consoled.

"Besides we brought you some gifts." said the king opening a box with an extravagant dress.

"That's not all." added the queen pulling out a huge bag of exported chocolates. "I hope you have room for these in your belly."

"I always have room for sweets!" Cassandra replied filled with glee reaching for the chocolates.

The king and queen had the rest of the afternoon to spend with their daughter. Cassandra than...
1251.title: your parents are coming

12511.content:
"I think it's better if I first put on my dress. I can't walk around in a ruined dress. Besides I want to try on my new dress."

The king snapped his fingers en the nearest servant ran over to him.

"Help my beautiful daughter put on her new dress." He ordered.

"Of course your highness." She said.

They went to Cassandra's room where the servant helped Cassandra out of her ripped dress revealing her fat body. Her love handles, her rubbing thighs, fluffy upper arms, big belly and even some fat around her chest. A body so beautiful almost every other girl in the kingdom would kill for. It showed that the girl who this body belonged too came from a wealthy family. Well that was true. You could't became more wealthy then the king, queen and princess.
The servant care full took the new dress. She sighed relieved when she saw it was a few sizes bigger then her old one so it would probably fit her easy. The king kept track on his daughters growing body. Well her body was growing. Maybe not in the right way but it was growing.
In the meanwhile Cassandra put the chocolates in her mouth.

"Care full highness. You don't want to have chocolate stains on your dress now do you?"

Cassandra stopped eating. No matter how much she liked eating and how much she liked chocolate, she hated it if her dress became dirty. Especially a new dress. The servant had more then enough experience dressing the fat princess and soon the new dress was over the large body of the princess.

"So? How do I look?" Cassandra asked turning around.

"Perfect you highness." The servant said telling the truth. Most girls would also kill for the dresses as for her body.

"Great. Now I can go back to my parents. I don't see them that often. They're always away." Cassandra said fast grabbing the box of chocolates.

"Well they of course need to rule the entire country. That's a lot of work. You'll see when you become queen."

Cassandra knew she would once be queen. She did't really knew about that. It was a lot of work. But you could also do a lot of things. You could eat whatever and whenever you liked. That was a good thing. You could get the best dresses. But being away so much to make sure everything in the country was going fine... that might be less fun. But she was the first born so she had right at the throne and she did't had any siblings... yet. Who knew her mother was still young enough to get another child.
Finally she reached her parents and ran over to her father who hugged her.

"How was it?" She asked excited.

"Well there were some problems. We need to make a well for a village, and another village had problems with some robbers. But we got them. Another village was complaining about some wolves."

"Do they eat little pretty princesses?" Cassandra asked scared.

"They normally go after animals. Like our sheep's, pigs and chickens. But they might be dangerous for little kids. But the mostly hunt during the night. Around then you're safely inside. No wolf will harm you. But we can't have them eating our sheep's, pigs, and chickens. That's our food."

"And we love food." The queen added. "Just like you Cassandra. Are you sure you eat enough? That dress seems a bit wide on you. I don't want my daughter to become a thin twig like some of the village kids."

"I won't mommy I promise." Cassandra said with a greedy grin.
12511.title: Being king and queen is a lot of hard work

choices: the queen reminisce about past times
125111.content:
"Now enough chatter let's eat." suggested the queen clapping her hands, a signal for the staff to bring in lunch.

"Oh boy I can already smell it." Cassandra gleefully squealed followed by a growl from her belly.

"Now lets make your new dress a little tighter on you sweety." the queen said pushing Cassandra over to the dining table, anxious to see her only daughter fatten up. "Come on sweety, take your GROWLLL- uh seat." the queen's words were interrupted by her own voracious stomach.

"teehee looks like mommy's hungry too." Cassandra giggled feeling a deep connection with her mother.

"She sure does, she should have a big feast." the king remarked, pleased with his ravenous girls.

"Yeah she should eat a really really big cake." suggested the young princess.

"We- well of course I'm hungry, a high class, sophisticated woman such as myself should wield an impressive appetite which mirrors her flawless corpulent figure." the queen said attempting to recollect her dignified composure after her very audible stomach growl. "A figure that you'll have one day sweety." the queen added as she sat her plushy buttocks down, giving the rest of her copious flesh respite from the strenuous standing.

"Ah here's lunch." the king stated.

The servants brought in a feast consisting of a wide variety of delicacies meeting the most opulent standards. As expected the two ladies piled on their plates, the queen monitoring her growing daughter, ensuring she gets her necessary nutrition. Luckily the queen had nothing to worry about for her daughter had an admirable appetite accompanied by an unquenchable sweet tooth. Both the queen and princess had plates each piled with heaps of food while the king took a more modest helping.

"Daddy eats so little!" Cassandra said noticing the differing proportions as she forked some food into her gullet.

"That's because he's not a lady dear. You see ladies deserve lots of food, for it will make them fat and beautiful." the queen lectured as she readied herself for a fierce stuffing.

"Indeed Cassandra, fat looks so pretty on women, so they need to eat large quantities of food." reasoned the king.

"Sounds delightful to me, I love eating!" Cassandra replied.
125111.title: Time for a BIG lunch

1251111.content:
Cassandra quickly yet elegantly shoveled loads of high calorie food down her mouth, much to the delight of her parents. Her parents watched with joy as the large heap of food upon the young princess's plate rapidly diminished as her cute belly grew tightening her new dress. Displaying no signs of struggle from such a large meal, for a little girl even one of royalty, Cassandra's jolly demeanor manifested a genuine content. She was truly living up to her parents' high aspirations

"My Cassandra you truly are blossoming into a beautiful princess." the king complimented his wellfed daughter.

"Yes you've really made some progress. Oh I remember back when you were younger sitting down with you eating desserts together trying to get you to gain weight." the queen said fondly reminiscing the past.

"Ooh tell me about that." Cassandra pleaded.

"Well back when you were thin-"

"THIN! But I thought I was always a cuddly fat princess?!" Cassandra interrupted her mother's shocking statement.

"Actually Cassandra, you were a little slim." the queen confessed.

"Yes Cassandra you nearly had us worried." added the king.

"I find that hard to believe." the princess honestly spoke.

"It is true dear, your slender waist caused us concern so I made it my duty to fatten you up into the cute plump princess you are today. Back when you were thin, I'd pay you numerous visits during the day to have mother daughter snacks. I'd bring my queen size lunch and give you some, of course I'd eat most of it and what you ate I had to force it upon you. I even had to bribe you with new dresses to get you to eat extra. But that all changed the day I brought a whole chocolate cake smothered in icing. Oh I remember how your eyes lit up upon the sight of that marvelous dessert. I gave you a slice and you gobbled it down, and how overjoyed I was when you begged me for more, why I hardly satisfied my hunger. Realizing you had a sweet tooth I took advantage of it and frequently brought you desserts which you would happily eat. Why before I knew it you had fattened up into a beautiful chubby princess. Your thin legs had plumped up, your arms were chunky, and your belly was nice and flabby. We were so happy." the queen claimed.

After the story, a servant walked up to the king and whispered something in his ear. The king stood up and said to the queen...
1251111.title: the queen reminisce about past times

choices: Kim tell us something about yourself
Sadly enough we need to go
12511112.content:
"Well Cassandra I have a surprise for you." He said with a big smile. "You can come in Kimberly!"

A thin girl with shiny raven black hair walked in. Her clothes were't as beautiful liked the gown and dresses of Cassandra but a lot better then some of the clothes the girls in the village wore. Her blue eyes seemed big in her thin face. She kept her head bowed. She was about Cassandra's age and height.
Cassandra looked at the girl wondering what was the surprise.

"This is Kimberly. She's the daughter of a good friend from me. A duke. Too bad the robbers took everything he had and his castle was burned too the ground. However Kimberly survived. She's the daughter of a good friend from me. I could't leave her behind. But I thought it also would be nice for you if you have someone you own age to play with while we're away.

"You can look up." Cassandra said. "I would like it to see your face."

The girl looked up and Cassandra smiled. Te girl seemed nice but perhaps a bit shy and thought she was't allowed to look at the royal family unless when told. Cassandra liked this. She must admit she was a bit lonely. Sure the servants were nice for her, since she was the princess, but still they were servants not real friends. And doing things she liked was still not easy with servants. Sure she had several servants, She liked most of them but a real friend would be nice.

"Thank you daddy. This will be great. Right Kimberly!"

She said something. But it sounded so soft Cassandra did't heard her.

"Sorry I did't heard you." Cassandra said friendly.

"It's Kim." She whispered. "My full name is Kimberly but everyone just calls me Kim."

Cassandra looked at her. She looked a bit scared. Why? Sure she was in company of the king, queen and princess, but if her father was a good friend from her dad she should know him.

"We bought some knew stuff for you Kim. Since all you old stuff got lost in the fire. The stuff is in your new room. The one next too Cassandra's room. Cassandra perhaps she can have some of your clothes that you don't fit anymore." The queen said.

"Really? I mean she can have them if I don't fit them anymore. That's fine with me but I think they look like a tent on her."

"Well we have a terrific tailor the queen said."

"Now..."
12511112.title: Kim

choices: Cassandra and Kim get to know each other
125111121.content:
“Now Kimberly, tell us about yourself.” The queen said. Kimberly spoke “Call me Kim. Kim Montague. My father was James Montague and my mother Cersi Stark. They were the duke and duchess of Dasterly Rook, of Maribor.” She began to cry silently. “That was until the band of robbers called Jack’s Sparrows decided to lay seige to the castle. I only escaped alive due to a rather convenient well.” She began to cry openly now.

“These Jack’s Sparrows are abominations worthy of a full military response,” the king said. “I will lead a band at once. Wifey, I suggest you stay with Kimberly and Cassandra for this operation, as you are rather unfit for it.” he continued, patting her stomach to emphasize his point. “No problem there, my dear. I was hoping to give Cassandra lessons on royal etiquette anyhow. It is time she took a greater part in managing the kingdom.” “I shall be off then,” the king responded.
125111121.title: Kim tell us something about yourself

125111122.content:
"Unfortunately we must take our leave girls." said the king regrettably.

"Yes ta-ta for now dears. Oh and Cassandra do be sure to eat enough." the queen added.

"I will mommy!" Cassandra happily replied as she watched her mother's chunky buttocks sway as she walked away.

Once more Cassandra was bereft of parents but at least now she had a friend to share her time with. Once again, Cassandra eyed her new companion, observing her long black hair, her blue eyes, and her skinny body. Kim was clearly nervous, still lacking the confidence to meet Cassandra's gaze. Even though Kim was scrawny and timid now, Cassandra felt confident that she could have pull Kim out of her shell. One way that the princess thought of was putting Kim in one of her outgrown 'smaller' dresses.

"So Kim how about we go put you in a really nice dress?" Cassandra suggested.

"Um i-is it really alright for a girl of my status to wear a dress designed for a princess?" Kim asked quivering.

"Of course it is!" Cassandra replied with gusto wrapped her chubby arm around Kim's boney shoulder.

Cassandra lead Kim to her bedroom, her arm still tight around the cautious girl. Kim felt Cassandra's flabby side against her, the soft fat squishing against her provoked an admiration in the new girl. Kim then noticed Cassandra's belly bounce as she walked, enviously staring at the supple flesh. Upon arriving in the princess's bedroom Cassandra picked out a gorgeous dress for her new friend. Kim couldn't believe her eyes, the dress was truly awe inspiring and she got to wear it.

"Here try it." Cassandra said handing Kim a captivating red dress.

"I really get to wear this!?" asked a stunned Kim.

"Yes, I really love this dress but I outgrew it a long time ago. If I were to even try putting it on I tear it into a million pieces. So you should wear it, now go try it on." Cassandra insisted pointing Kim to a changing closet.

Within moments Kim emerged wearing the divine dress bearing a feeling of jubilee.

"You look good in that dress." Cassandra said even though the dress was hanging off of her.

"I feel so pretty." Kim stated.

"Now let's celebrate with a..." Cassandra suggested
125111122.title: Sadly enough we need to go

choices: While they eat Kim tells why she's so thin
1251111221.content:
... huge cake!"

"A huge cake? Are you hungry again? I thought you just ate." Kim said in disbelief.

"Well I have a second stomach special for cake." Cassandra said with a giggle. "Besides you did't ate. Don't you want some food?"

"Well I guess I could eat something."

"Do you like cake?"

"Well yeah of course I do."

"So lets ask for a huge cake to celebrate." Cassandra said and pulled at a cord to call a servant. "I love cake. I also have a big appetite. But you noticed that already.

A servant soon arrived and after Cassandra asked for the cake she focused on Kim again.

"Are you sure I can wear this?" Kim asked. "I mean you're a princess. I'm just the daughter of a duke. And thanks to that robbers I have nothing. Well you parents bought some stuff for me but that's all I have."

"Kim from now on you live here together with me. You can wear any dress and gown that I have outgrown... and believe me that are a lot, and you can ask every servant whatever you want. Just pull the cord in your room."

"Can I... am I allowed... to... call a servant for something?" Kim asked surprised.

"Of course you can. Why should't you be allowed, and if they refuse anything tell me and I will talk to them. The never say no to me."

"Well thank you. I was't sure if I was allowed to were you gowns and dresses or use your servants. I mean... I'm not like you.... a princess. Without my house and parents I'm just a homeless girl. A tramp. You're royalty. And I'm allowed to dress and be treated like a princess?"

"Well I guess I'm higher in rank then you but yeah. After all most dresses don't fit me anymore but theý're very beautiful so I'm happy if somebody else can use them."

Kim smiled weakly. She seemed to become a bit more comfortable. Cassandra friendly smiled at her and looked at the dress Kim was wearing.

"Even that dress is still a bit wide on you. Well you're awfully thin. Just like some of those village girls I sometimes see.

"Yeah I always used to be thin. I would like it to be a bit more like you. Whit such a big beautiful belly like you. I would like that very much."

The next moment the door opened and a huge cake was brought in.

"Well Kim let's put some meat on your bones." Cassandra said.
1251111221.title: Am I allowed to do all those things?

12511112212.content: As Cassandra and Kim ate, they talked. She tried to throw in latin to determine Kim’s actual status in society, as she was suspicious about her new friend’s parentage. Much to Cassandra’s surprise, Kimberly knew latin, and was actually more conversent than herself. Both of them were interested in each other’s lives from then on. Cassandra in particular was interested in why Kimberly was so thin. “Why are you so thin? Even not being as wealthy as the king, you should have gotten at least a little weight on you. Your father was a duke after all, and all dukes have wealth matched only by my father,” Cassandra said. Kim burped loudly, rubbing her stomach. “Do you really want to know?” She asked. “Yes. I am interested.” Burping again, Kim began her tale. “The shortest version ever is that there were not enough resources to go around for five daughters, and I was the youngest daughter...” “five daughters,” Cassandra interrupted, “for a duke should not have been terribly difficult to support.” Kim continued “Indeed. Despite not getting as much as a girl of my ages should have, I still had a decent stomach. But more organized banditry arose one day. It not only raised the price of food, but forced my father to spend most of his resources in taming them. Despite this, they grew in strength. One day, they assaulted my father’s castle itself. The siege was repelled, but I lost a lot of weight. Not even a sixmonth later they came back and burned the inner works to the ground. I only survived as I was able to escape out the back entrance. A peasant family then took me in, not knowing who I was. I lost what little weight I had regained working the fields. I would have died in that house if I had not known Latin. Your father just happened to come through my village on his campaign of revenge, and he saved my life.” “That sounds horrible. You went through a great deal.” Cassandra said, still not comprehending what she had gone through. “Indeed. But I am here now” Kimberly said, looking at her stomach.“I have had enough for now. You can have the rest,” she said, passing what remained of her portion of the cake to Cassandra and heading to her room. Cassandra finished the cake by herself.
12511112212.title: While they eat Kim tells why she's so thin

125111122121.content:
Sunlight slowly crept over the kingdom pushing away the darkness. Putting everything in a golden glow. Waking up every animal and human. Cassandra was no exception. But she was too lazy to get out of bed.
Cassandra barely needed to do a thing for herself. Servants were ready for her twenty-four-seven. She just needed to scream and she got what she wanted. She even got help getting dressed. Since she barely needed to do anything she got pretty lazy.
She just pulled her cord and a few minutes later a servant was in the room.

"What is you desire your highness?" She asked polite.

"First make a fire. It's kind of cold in here. Second, Ask the kitchen too make a big breakfast. Third help me get dressed."

"What about your new friend?" The servant asked while she made a fire.

"Oh yeah Kim. I almost forgot her." Cassandra said.

The next moment The door opened and Kim walked in with only a night shirt covering her thin body. She smiled friendly at Cassandra and walked in bare footed.

"Brrr. A bit chilly in here." Kim said with a weak smile.

"Then come in my bed. It's warm under the blanket. It's a big bed, room enough for three girls. Come in. Go on!"

Kim Thankfully got in Cassandra's bed. She crawled to her friend to and suddenly felt a bump when Cassandra's fat round belly touched her flat almost non existing belly. Kim liked feeling the fat belly of her new friend. She looked at Cassandra.

"Can I... am I allowed too... would you mind if I... touched your... belly?" Kim asked nervous.

The servant looked up for a second but soon started working on the fire again.

"Eh... sure. Why not?" Cassandra mumbled.

The next moment she felt the thin fingers of Kim playing with her fat. Kneading, pulling, pushing and rubbing it. Kim was very happy doing this. Especially now. Before she had eaten. Her fat was still soft and squishy. Like a nice big pillow. Both girls started giggling and enjoyed this.

"So... a big breakfast for two then?" The servant asked.

"Yeah the same like yesterday. But double since I ate a second one after the first. You remember what I had yesterday?"

"Of course highness. How about you little girl. What would you like?"

"Eh I guess I have the same like her." Kim said.

"Eh are you sure?" The servant asked. "It's not a problem but... Eh I think it's a bit too much for you. Cassandra has a healthy appetite. I don't think you can finish it."

"Eh how about the same then but a lot smaller. How is that?"

"That seems more wise. I will tell the kitchens. After that I'll come back too help you get dressed."

After the servant left Kim crawled closer to Cassandra sinking a bit in her fat.

"I'm am a bit jealous at you. You have such a beautiful fat body. I hated it that I lost all my weight. I would like it more to become a fat girl."

"Well why should't you be able to become fat. Just wait. I will help putting some meat on those bones of you. We're gonna make you a fat girl." Cassandra said.

Kim smiled widely.
125111122121.title: Belly play

125111122122.content:
Cassandra woke up with the sun as she did now. Not wanting to move, she summoned a servant. She appeared a few minutes later. “What do you require, my lady,” she said. “First, make a fire. Secondly, order a good breakfast. Finally, help me get dressed,” Cassandra said. “Very well. What do you want for breakfast?” the servant asked. “twelve sausages, eight toast covered in jam, two pies, and a triple layer cake. With milk.” “And your dress?” the servant asked “The blue one with the red trim on the sleeves and black trim along the stomach.” As Cassandra got dressed, she realized that what was once the biggest dress she had was now tight on her. The thought pleased her.

A little later than Cassandra, but still early in the morning, Kimberly woke up. Taking off her nightgown and standing naked before the mirror in her room, she rubbed her stomach, her beautiful, swollen stomach. It had grown considerably in the month since she had met her new friend, but she knew she could become a much bigger girl. She was bigger once. Getting dressed in a red dress, she decided to call a servant using her pull cord. A few minutes later, a servant appeared “What is it you require?” she asked. “Breakfast,” Kimberly said. “I would like four pieces of toast with butter, some sausage, bacon, and two eggs. With apple juice to wash it down.” “Very well. Anything else?” came the response. “No,” Kimberly responded. As the servant left, Kimberly rubbed her stomach in anticipation of the coming meal.

“Here is your breakfast, miss Cassandra,” A servant said as he put each plate before her. “Thank you,” Cassandra responded. She began to eat immediately. In her typical style, the food vanished very quickly. In barely half an hour, she had managed to completely eat everything. Her stomach was a round little thing that strained against the fabric of her dress, and never before had she been so full. She pulled on her chord and called a servant again. As she appeared, Cassandra spoke “Prepare me a sling. I wish to inspect the castle. Make sure it had snacks.” “Yes, my lady,” the servant said.
Kimberly laid back in bed and felt pleased with herself. She had eaten more for breakfast than she had in a long time. After she finished with her first order, she placed a second for two cakes, and a third for bacon. And her stomach was packed because of it. The formerly flat stomach had developed into a curve that started at the waist and continued from there. Breathing heavily, Kimberly got to her feet and walked down the stairs of the tower. Panting, she opened the door to the castle greenhouse, where she often lay after a meal. She lay down on the soft mattress that was there for her at all times and rubbed her belly, the heat of the sun warming her.

Cassandra took another bite of the provided pie and watched as her stomach strained against her dress. Her tour of the castle had proven most interesting, and she took note of several flaws in construction and decoration that would be rectified. Everything from rotting cables on the drawbridge to minor errors paintings. She spent the entire first part of her day doing such things until lunch rolled around. And she had no idea how what she would do with lunch.
125111122122.title: after a month of friendship

1251111221221.content:
"Well lets go to the dining room. It's time for lunch. I would like something to eat."

"What ever you want your highness." her servant said, who almost could't believe she could still eat more.

"Where is my new best friend by the way? You know? Kim?" She suddenly asked.

"Ah yes. Well normally if she is't doing anything with you she's in the greenhouse. I must admit it's a very nice place to..."

"Can you be so kind and get her after your done getting me to the dining room?"

"Of course your highness. Everything for the princess." Her servant answered

Kim was still in the greenhouse enjoying the sun. She pulled her dress up to her chest so she easily could rub her round belly. It had really grown and she planned to make it bigger. She maybe would never be able to beat Cassandra in being the fattest but she could become a nice second. She and Cassandra became good friends. Playing games, talking about clothing, jewelery, playing and of course eating.
She heard to door of the greenhouse open and fast pulled her dress down.

"Ah miss Kimberly. Princess Cassandra asked me to come get you for lunch."

"Oh! Okay. Great I was getting hungry anyway." She stood up and looked around. "It's so nice here. Oh look. Those are my favorite plants."

She stopped at some strange plants. The servant would have expected some flowers with girl liked Kimberly but these plant did.t seem that special at all. Suddenly he noticed a fly. He went sitting on a leaf. The next moment the leaf closed like a mousetrap. Capturing the insect. Kim chuckled.

"A plant that likes eating just as much if I and Cassandra." Kimberly said while she walked to the dining room.

The servant fast walked after her.

"Eh excuse me but... what just happened there? I mean what;s happening to that fly?" The servant asked.

"That fly. He gets digested. That plant is called the Venus flytrap. It a carnivorous plant. He eats insects. Whenever a insect lands on a leaf it closes and then the insect gets digested."

The servant was surprised. His purpose was serving the princess. He did't knew much about plants. Hearing that there was a plant that really ate insects was something totally new for him. It scared him a bit but he was trained to act normal. No matter what.

"Ah Kim! There you are. I just ordered lunch. What do you want?"

"Let's see... how about three sandwiches, two pies, two cakes, some bacon and sausages. Oh and apple juice. Hm, I love apple juice. My parents used to call it liquid gold before they... well... never mind."

Cassandra noticed that Kim never talked about her parents. She could understood why. If she tried to image how it felt when you heard you lost your parents... it seemed more then awful to her. So she never asked Kim much.

"You know I'm glad you're here. I mostly needed to eat alone. Except when my mom and dad were here. But you noticed... mostly they're not here. I know they need to rule the country... so I don't blame them but still... It would be nice if I saw them more often. So I'm glad you here, so I have someone to eat with. Eating is't so much fun alone."

"Well I must admit I also like it here... and of course I also like you."

The next moment their lunch arrived and both started eating.

1252221222.title: Those little brats

12522212221.content:
Adrian with a lot of food. He smiled when he saw her and walked over to her.

"Finally I found you. You were suddenly gone. Did you changed?"

"Yeah. Two brats threw pies at me. My face was covered in pie just like my dress! It was ruined!" Cassandra was very proud at her dresses and gowns and became furious if somebody made them dirty, even if it was an accident. "So Annabelle took me to her room to take a bath and to look for a new dress. It's a nice dress and all but those brats will pay for this. I'll take revenge... but... not right now. I'm hungry. It's time to eat first!"

Cassandra fast started to eat. Cassandra ate perfectly mannered but incredibly fast. It went down so fast that Adrian wondered if she did chew the food. He did't thought that she had time for that. But Cassandra seemed to be happy and that was the most important thing to him.
Suddenly he smiled and took a fork and brought it to her face.

"Eh... what are you doing?" Cassandra asked confused.

"F... feeding you. I thought it would be fun. D... do you mind?"

"No. Not really. I just did't expect it. But sure it sounds like fun."

Adrian smiled and slowly took food to her face what disappeared with one single bite.

"It this good?" Adrian asked.

"It's nice buuuut. Can you feed me faster. I'm really hungry. You don't have to be gentle. I would't mind it if you would be a little rough while feeding me."

"Really?" Adrian asked.

"Yeah. But be careful you don't make my dress dirty. It's from Annabelle. Now come on."

Adrian and Cassandra both had a lot of fun. Adrian liked it to stuff her and Cassandra liked it she did't need to do anything except to eat without even moving.
12522212221.title: Feeding

Cassandra and Adrian looked into each other's eyes as Adrian's face came closer to Cassandra's face. Her heart was beating fast as she was sure that he was about to kiss her.

"There you are Cassandra" said Annabelle's mother as she interrupted them.

"Darn it, why is the universe against me today" though Cassandra. "Is there something you would like to talk about dear aunt?"

"As a matter of fact there is, boys come here please" said Annabelle's mother as her two sons came out from behind her.

"Annabelle told me what they did to you and upon learning this I gave them a stern talking and now I believe they have something to say to you" said Annabelle's mother.

"We're sorry that we threw pies at you, it was very mean and we promise that we will never do it again" said one of Annabelle's brothers.

"Well I since you apologized I suppose all is forgiven" said Cassandra.

"That is wonderful to hear. Now then you two shall go up in your rooms and go to bed without any supper" said Annabelle's mother.

"But mother we apologized!" said one of Annabelle's brothers.

"No buts young man, now up to your rooms" said Annabelle's mother more sternly.

After they left the room Cassandra and Adrian went back to their feeding session. After a few minutes Adrian began to talk again.

"Have you truly forgiven them?" asked Adrian.

"Oh heck no, I only said that as to not upset my aunt. Believe me once I take my revenge those two will wish they were never born" said Cassandra.

After that Adrian just kept feeding Cassandra more and more and...
125222122212.title: Someone walks over to them

1252221222122.content:
Cassandra wolfed down everything what came in reach of her greedy mouth. She even bit in Adrian's fingers two times. Luckily enough she noticed it were fingers before she did real damage to them. Adrian did't seem to mind. Both enjoyed this very much. Cassandra even wondered if he maybe could become her boyfriend. He came from a wealthy family else he could't be here so that was no trouble.
But the problem came when she suddenly heard a embarrassing and sadly but familiar sound. The sound of ripping clothing. Her dress ripped right at the front in the middle. She did her best too hide it. What bothered her most was the fact that this dress was from Annabelle. She hoped she would't be mad at her.
Most other people at the party were too busy too notice this. But Annabelle suddenly walked over to them

"Oh Annabelle I'm so sorry. Your dress..." Cassandra started.

"Ah don't worry about that dress. We have a terrific tailor here in the palace. I also already asked some servants to clean your dress. They have cleaned dresses from this kind of stuff more then once. Or do you think my brothers never did that to me. Sometimes I wish I was a only child. Just like you." Annabelle said.

"Well It's not always great being an only child. I must admit that I rather don't have bratty siblings like you... but I would like to have a sister like you. Someone to hang out with, or do games, or... "

"Somebody you can borrow clothes from." Annabelle said with a grin. "Perhaps we can better get out before people started to notice your dress ripped. It's a bit embarrassing. Don't you think. Come let's go to my room."

The three kids walked, or in Cassandra and Annabele's case it was more waddled to Annabelle's room. They fast entered her room and Annabelle closed to door and sighed relieved.

"So we made it. But I'm afraid it's gonna get hard finding a bigger dress for you. Most are even tight for me and for you we need a even bigger one. Most of my dresses are made especially for me by my tailor. He measures me every now and then she knows my clothing fits perfectly."

"I have a difficult time finding clothes that fit." Cassandra said. "Luckily my parents buy new ones often. Else I needed to walk around naked."

"Those girls from the village don't have to deal with those difficult problems. I see the toddlers of them running around naked all the time. Those girls seem to hardly have any clothes." Annabelle said.

"Well most of them don't have any other clothes. Also they're so thin so they don't have the problem their clothes don't fit them." Adrian mumbled.

Cassandra pulled of the ripped dress and wrapped Annabelle's blanket around her.

"You can sleep with me. My bed is big enough for three girls. Even if the're a bit overweight."

Cassandra smiled. She and Annabelle always slept together if they visit each other. So they could talk a bit with each other.

"I also still need to think of a way to get back at your brothers. They'll pay." Cassandra said.

"Well my mother already punished them and send them to bed without supper. But if you want to teach them a lesson I'll be happy to help. Aha. Here it is."

She hold up a pretty blue dress.

"This one has several rows of buttons on the back so you can make it a bit bigger. " Annabelle said while Cassandra put it on.

Annabelle fat started to close the buttons. The dress fitted Cassandra perfectly

125222122212212111111.title: Let's try this again

12522212221221211112.content:
"Oh it's morning already. Look outside. It's sunny." Cassandra said.

"Oh. Is it already morning?" Annabelle asked with a smile. "Then a servant could get in anytime to..."

She was interrupted when someone knocked on the door. After a: "Come in!" From Annabelle a servant walked in.

"Good morning your highness's. What do you two want for breakfast?" She asked and bowed for the two girls.

"I want a lot of sausages, 5 sandwiches, 6 backed eggs, 3 boiled eggs, some fruit and 5 toasts with jelly and a two cakes, and fruit juice to wash it all done. I guess that will be enough to start. What do you want Cassandra?"

"Eh... I think I have the same." Cassandra said slowly.

The servant nodded and left the room while Cassandra and Annabelle got dressed. Annabelle got a beautiful blue dress. But when she turned she saw that Cassandra was trying to squeeze her beautiful, obese body in one of her dresses. But it did't seemed like it was gonna fit.

"Eh... Cassandra... I don't wanna be mean but I don't think that's dress is gonna fit you. Even if it does it will probably rip during breakfast. I think it's better if you look for something that fits... instead of someone that looks nice." Annabelle said carefully.

"*sigh* I guess your right. I have this trouble at house all the time. What is your biggest dress?"

"Hmmm." Annabelle said and rubbed her chin while she walked into her closet. "Too small, too small, way too small and Ewwww! Why did my parents buy this one? Too black, too tight, I was gonna use this one for my ball next month... But I guess you can use it now. My parents bought it a few sizes bigger so it would still fit me by then. But I'm not sure it will still fit me. I outgrow clothes pretty fast."

However the dress fitted Cassandra perfectly. The two girls waddled as fat if their chubby legs could carry them to the dining room. There parents were already there.

"Nice that you two could join us." The father of Annabelle said.

Cassandra wanted to sit on her chair but her cousin stopped her.

"Wait a second Cassandra. What is that on your chair?"

Cassandra looked surprised at her seat. There was something on it. It seemed to be some sticky stuff.

"What is that?" Cassandra asked.

"I think it is glue. I also think that those two are responsible for that!"

She lifted the tablecloth and Cassandra saw the brothers of Annabelle. One of them holding a can of glue.

"Well You two little brats! I should..."

"Boys, that was very mean!" Their mother said." Cassandra and her parents are our guests. You should treat them with respect and honor. You don't want to give our family a bad name. Now say you're sorry."

"We're sorry Cassandra." Both said but Cassandra could clearly see they did't mean it, but she suddenly got a idea.

"It's okay if can have your breakfast! From both of you!"

"What?" They both yelled. "You can't do that!"

"Oh I think she can. It's a good punishment. Perhaps it will teach you two too behave. Don't even think about asking someone else for food. Because if I find out and I do you two will be in very deep trouble!"

"Fine. But can we go then." One of them asked.

"Fine you can leave." The queen said.

The next moment the servants came in with the breakfasts.

13.content:
Jester looked looked surprised at the table for her filled with food. Cakes, pies, pizza, pastries, sandwiches, mashed potatoes, but what mostly caught her eyes were the fish, shrimps and lobsters. Jester loved sea food. She started to eat right away. Cramming the food in her mouth with both hands. Don't minding manners. It seemed like she was all alone so who would care? She ripped meat from bones, swallowed stuff without barely chewing it. Wolfed down everything edible that came near her mouth.
Her belly soon poked out between her pants and shirt. She kept stuffing her face and her belly kept swelling. Growing bigger and rounder.
Jester liked this. She was busy eating the fish and lobsters when she heard a voice.

"Jester you need to wake up!"

Jester opened her eyes. She was still the same. No table full with food in front of her. No big round belly. Not even chubby, just flat. Jester looked disturbed at her twin brother. They looked the same like two drops of water apart from the fact that she was a girl and he a boy and her hair was longer. She was aware that in about five, six years there would be another difference. Or two to be exact.

"Why did you need to wake me up. I was having such a great dream." Jester moaned.

"Well dad is't around so that means that I'm the man of the house. So you..."

"The man? Come oooooon. You're a boy. Should't I be in charge. I'm the oldest."

"Only by two minutes!" Jack said grumpy.

"Best two minutes of my life." Jester mumbled with a smile.

"Well I think we can better practice a bit. The kings brother comes with his wife and daughter."

"His daughter. That fat one?" Jester asked.

Jester remembered her from last time. Pretty friendly and nice girl. Also very fat. Jester thought she was nice but at the same time she was very jealous at her. This girl was so fat.
Jester lived in a room in the castle of the king. She her brother and her father had always been jesters. And because the king thought they were pretty good and he liked good entertainment they got a room just like the servants. Nothing special but at least they got a roof above their head, protection from the bad weather, and enough food to stay alive without being hungry.
But Jester loved eating. It was a secret she never told anyone. Not even her twin brother. But what she really wanted was to pig out at a table full with food. Just like in her dream. Stuffing her face with both hands. That is what she wanted.
But also a secret was that she liked it to be fat. That was the reason she was so jealous at that girl. She wanted to be fat too. Not that fat was a problem. It was a sign of health and wealth. A sign that you would be great for carrying children. Every girl wanted to be fat but wanting and able to become were two different things.

"Yeah I believe it are those. So wanna practice?" Jack asked.

"Nah!" Jester mumbled and stroke through her hair. "Not yet. I'm hungry. First I want breakfast. But after that we can practice."

Practice was what they both did a lot of the day. Thinking of new tricks, jokes, dances, small plays. Since almost no one could see the difference between them if they wore their hats they could do some very funny things.

This day was't different from any other day. After breakfast she practiced every thing with her brother until they knew for sure they knew everything right.
That evening they put up a great show. People laughed and clapped loudly. Jester saw the fat girl. She was even fatter then before. Suddenly the fat girl looked up and said:...
13.title: Jester

choices: It's for Erica time to finish her chores
14.content:
Erica was lying in the hay. Enjoying the sun. Rubbing her big belly that formed two nice juicy rolls that she loved to play with when she was alone. The warm sun made her drowsy.
Suddenly a shadow fell over her. Erica opened lazy one eye. But when she saw who it was she got up right away.

"Eh... Hi mom." Erica said trying to look sweet and innocent.

"Yeah. Hello. Did you have a nice nap? A nap when I asked you to clean the stables?" Her mother asked.

"Why do I need to do that. That animals get shelter, food, and water. Can't they clean their own stables?"

Erica was pretty lazy when it was about doing chores. Like taking care of the animals. Working in the field. piking fruit and vegetables. Too bad for her all those things included food and Erica loved eating. She was pretty good at it too. You could clearly see that by taking one look at her huge belly, flabby thighs and big butt. There was even some fat at her chest. She had also bowl pink cheeks and a second chin. Erica had a big appetite. But Erica's mother and most other woman in their village were kind of heavy so nobody cared about it. However part of their size was muscle because the hard work on the land but that was't the case with Erica.

"Do you really expect a answer?" Her mother asked. "While you father is gone I expect you help a bit with the chores."

"Then why did you only take me? Why did't you take a sister or brother? Then he or she could help."

"Well we tried. We're still trying. Perhaps you get one. Now we need to get back to work. That includes you too young lady!"

"But I'm hungry!" Erica whined.

"Well... I guess we can take a short break and get something to eat. I'm kind of hungry too."

Erica's mother knew her daughters big appetite so she made sure there was enough food on the table so she could also eat herself. Erica started stuffing her face. If you saw her eat she looked more like a pig then a girl. Erica had totally no manners but at the other hand her father also did't had any manners when it was about eating so she did't really blamed her.

"I can't figure out where you putting it all." Her mother said with a friendly smile.

"In my belly!" Erica yelled. "Is daddy coming home today?"'

"I don't know sweet hart. That depends on the weather. But I think he will soon..."

She was cut of when the look out shouted: "Ship! There's a ship coming our way!"

Erica's mother (Carol) and even Erica forget their food and went over to the quay. All other people of the village joined them.

"I see their sails!" Someone shouted.

"Is it one of our ships or from somebody else?" A other asked.

"Can't tell yet. It's too far."

But when the ship came closer they saw it was the ship of their man. They cheered loudly and started waving. A few minutes later she ship went into their harbor. Erica's father, the chief was the first one who jumped out.
Erica and Carol ran over to him ans he hugged his wife and daughter. He too was a big guy but it was for a great part muscle. He had a wild brown beard with mustache. A scare under his right eye and black and brown clothing. A sword and dagger at his belt and the strength of a bear. He also more a helmet.
Authors note: The helmet's of Vikings did't have horns. Sure they had helmet's but without horns. The mistake was made when they first looked in viking graves the also found drinking horns. They thought the were originally attached to the helmet's. Later they found out it were drinking horns. So vikings wore helmet's but without horns.


"Did you bring me something Daddy?" Erica asked.

"Of course sweetie, and I also have something for my terrific wife. And tonight... we have a feast. We stole some great things!"

Everyone cheered. Erica too. She loved viking feasts. There always was lot of food. She was gonna eat herself to the point of bursting and grinned widely.
14.title: Daddy comes home

When Tharlock got back on his feet he began to speak whith great excitement ''Erica I was out in the woods for target practice and you'll never belive what I found'' ''what did you find'' ''it's hard to describe it's one of those things you have to see to believe''. choices: Maybe there is, maybe there is't
14521.content:
Erica fast went sitting next to her father and smiled at him.
The tables were full of food. Roast pigs, cows, chickens and every other kind of animal. Erica had a big appetite but so had most man and also some woman. There were also several huge barrels filled with beer. Erica knew that at the end of the feast most men would be so drunk that the would fell asleep at the table and woke up with a terrible hangover. However no matter how terrible the hangover was, at the next feast they did it again. With being only 7 years old she only drank fruit juice just like the other kids.. She looked almost drooling at all the delicious meat.

"It was great!" Her father shouted. "We plundered a lot of villages. I will tell you exactly what happen first we..."

Erica filled her plate with food while she listened to her father. She enjoyed hearing the stories of her father. She hoped that she once would be able to tell stories about herself. But her father still refused to take her. Because she was a girl, and because she was just seven years old. She could understand that he did't wanted to take her because she was a bit young even while she was tall for her age. But she could't understand why her father did't wanna take her just because she was a girl. After a few years she would be older that would solve the first problem but she was't able to change her gender.

"Men I have something important to tell you!" Her father suddenly yelled.

Everyone stopped eating, talking and drinking and listened to their chief. He stood up. He was big and very impressive.

"We've done a great job! I'm proud at you all! You're all great fighters! But now, I wonder how good out kids are!"

Even Erica stopped chewing for a moment. She wondered where this was going.

"So we have a archery contest! Just for the kids!"

Erica for once forget the food. An archery contest for the kids. That sounded interesting. But she soon realized most other kids also looked smiling with sparkling eyes. A lot of the young kids practiced archery. Swords and axes were too heavy for them and spears were too long so bows and arrows were the only weapons the younger kids could use.

"Is there also a prize?" Delila asked.

Erica looked curious at her father.
