Hair: Black with gold stripes to a bit above her shoulders
Favorite food: Pigs meat and grapes
Likes: Eating, watching fights in the arena, being treated like a princess and looking at watching others get eaten
Dislikes: Being hungry, being bored, if people don't listen to her and darkness
Siblings: None (yet)
About her: Romy has on strange hobby, She likes eating. She not only likes it to eat herself (she likes that too) but also seeing others being eaten. Especially seeing how people are eaten by lions (or other wild animals). She was learned since she was a baby that those people were't important so she never really cared. But she likes eating and trying new foods. She also does have a big appetite and is able to get everything what she wants. No matter how weird and freaky it sounds.

Do you want to pick on of these girls to get fat, round and soft or do you still want another girl and time?
15.title: More girls and more times

151.content:
Lucy cried. Up in the high tree. She always loved it to climb in this tree. From here you could see the entire village without being seen. She saw it. How a woman was tied to a pole. Even from this long distance she saw that it was her mother. Clearly. She cried and saw how the people but branches around her feet and put them on fire. She saw how the fire finally also got to her mother. How she was screaming and she finally died and how her corpse kept burning. until there was nothing left then a pile of ashes.
She cried her eyes dry. She felt exhausted. What now. She had no dad. People probably thought she was a witch. Just like her mother. The witches child. Even if they did't burn her... then what? living on the street? Perhaps being stuffed in a orphan home? Or on the market finding someone who was willing to take her in home?
Four different options. All four not really something you would look forward too. The only other option was... run away. That seemed the best option. She knew very well which plants you could eat. She was used to eat small meals. Her mother lately had trouble making money. She climbed down. Whipped her tears away and started walking.

"I guess I can be lucky that it's nice weather. Also that I was away looking for spices an heard those men talking.... Why did they burn my mother. She was't a witch. She was a christen. She went to the church. Just like me. It does't make any sense."

At the other hand she saw many other ways how to kill witches. She had seen other people who got burned. She water test. Throw someone in the water with a heavy stone. If she came floating to the surface she was a witch.

"Now I'm thinking about this, no one ever came floating to the surface."

She also heard something about a scale some where else. People needed to be weighed. If you did't weigh enough you soul had no weight and you got burned. A lot of people moved over there,

"We should have also moved over there too. At the other hand my mother was kind of skinny."

She herself had a normal weight for a girl of her age and size. However she loved eating. At least she loved eating good food. Like the food her mother made... what she would now never make again. Tears started running again. She did't cared. She was all alone. She had no one. Not even a pet or far relative. At least not one she knew about.

"What can I do now. Just walk until I can't walk anymore?"

She looked up at the sky. It was getting dark. Perhaps it was better to find some shelter. But where? That was a good question. She moaned. She did't really thought this through. Well she did't thought people would look for her. Just a helpless eight year old girl... what could she do? Not much. That's for sure.
Everyone was scared of witches. Even the priests were scared of them.

"Perhaps I can go to another village. Far from here. Where they don't know who I am, and then I...." her voice trailed of. No matter in which village she ended up the options were the same. Living on the street, in a orphan home or asking if someone was willing enough to take her in home. Or perhaps they thought a kid that came out of the woods was a witch and they would burn her.

"I don't really get a choice. What then? Stay here in the forest until I die of starvation. It was fine now but... What when it get's winter? I can find fruits, vegetables and nuts but what about meat and fish. I don't know how to hunt for my food. What can I do?"

Suddenly she got a little bit hope. She saw
151.title: All alone

1511.content:
A little light. She looked up at the sky. It was really dark now. She already saw some stars. She walked closer and saw the light was coming from a window in a small house. Lucy thought it was a bit strange. Who would want to live all alone in a forest. It was still a long walk to the nearest village.
She came closer and smelled something delicious. Lucy had a normal weight for somebody her age and height, but she was't happy with that. She would rather have a big round fat belly. Like some of those rich girls had. Who were munching on candy from the moment she woke up until the moment they went to bed. They never shared a single crumb with other people. Lucy did't liked them but she could't deny they looked good. She also liked eating but the past years her mother barely made any money. She was used to eating small meals. She could live on them but she would rather eat huge meal. Really pig out and eat until you belly was round and full.
But could she come in?

"I can try. What harm could it do?"

She knocked on the door. She heard some noise. Suddenly the door opened. She saw a young woman. She must be somewhere in her twenties. long blond straight hair, a tiny waist but with big boobs. She wore a long black dress.

"Well well. What have we here?" She asked slowly.

"Ehm... well hello. Eh could I come in? I'm lost in the woods and it's getting dark and I have no food."

"Oh poor thing. Come in."

Inside it was warm. there was a fire burning in the fireplace. Lucy loved fireplaces. She many times fell asleep in front of them.

"You wait here. I will be right back."

Lucy went sitting in a big chair and looked around. There was another big chair in the room a desk covered with papers wit a small chair. The she saw shelf's filled with books. Books? The only ones she knew who could read were priests and doctors. Some other shelf's were filled with strange liquids ans some jars. All labeled. But she could't read. She wondered what was in them. But she knew that not everything was what it seemed.. She looked at the sealing and saw some plants hanging upside down. That was normal. She did it at home all the time. With her mother...
She could't help it and started to cry. Suddenly the woman walked in.

"What's wrong? Did you hurt yourself?"

Lucy looked at the woman. She seemed so worried. Lucy did't care anymore and between cries she told her mother was burned because people believed she was a witch. The woman listened calmly without interrupting her. After she was done the woman tried to comfort her.

"That's terrible. So that's why you were walking alone in the woods. Where were you going?"

"I don't know. I have no relatives. Not that I know. I'm now known like the daughter of a witch. If I come back they probably burn me as well. If not then were can I go?"

"All those lies about witches. They're not so bad." The woman said. "I'm sort of a witch."

"You're a witch?" Lucy asked and got the feeling like it got colder in the room.

"Well I'm nothing like the stories they tell. I don't eat or hurt kids or babies, I can't spread diseases, I can't make the milk sour, I can't let the harvest go to waste and I don't worship the devil. I don't have a witch sign and I don't want to hurt anybody. Perhaps the're witches who can do that but not me. Sure I make potions and ointments but those are all to help people. But if you do that people still think you're a witch and still think you're evil. That's why I live alone here. Deep in the forest.

"But you have so many. I believe you have enough for a entire village."

"Well there are three people who know I live here. My brother, the doctor and his assistant. I give my potions and ointments to them. They sell them and use the money to buy food and clothes and other stuff I need and give that to me. Oh I almost forget."

She left and returned with a plate full of food. It smelled delicious and Lucy was hungry so she ate. The woman sat down and looked at her and said:"You can stay here if you like. Become my student."

Lucy stopped chewing for a moment. Become the student of a witch. That sounded idiot. But at the other hand... if she really was't evil. Besides where else could she go? And she knew some things about spices, potions and ointments. From her mother. But still.

"What do I need to do then?"

"Well I will teach you how to make potions and you need to help me with that. Help finding spices and plants. Help in the garden. I will also teach you how to read and write."

"Write? Is't that only for priests and doctors?"

"Why should it be only for them? I believe you will learn it easily. You seem pretty bright. I also have a extra room you can have."

"How about this food? Do I get more delicious food."

"Yeah you will. I will also teach you how to cook."

That was enough. Lucy would stay here and become some sort of witch. A good one.
1511.title: The house and the woman

choices: A big diiner for a big girl
152.content:
"Can you lean a bit more backward. Perfect. Now don't move."

The only thing that did move was Trudy's mouth that got a smile. Trudy was model for some time now. Strange how the life could go. A artist saw her once and wondered if he could paint her. For some money of course. Trudy's mother said yes and he made a beautiful painting of her. He told some others about her and since then Trudy was asked sometimes to be a model. Trudy was good at sitting or standing without moving. That was exactly what the artists wanted. The fact Trudy was fat also helped. Fat girls were seen like beautiful.
Look at the paintings of Rubens and Bortero
Trudy did't mind to pose in nice clothes or even nude like now. Artists liked to paint her because she was adorable and looked kind of pretty. Some artists also used her just to see how a fat body looked like. After that they made it a bit taller and added a bit more female curves and finally they made a beautiful paining of a voluptuous woman.
Trudy did't really mind if they painted her or more adult version of her body. She did't mind painting of her in fancy clothes or without clothes. But she hated bad paintings. She did't mind strange things but abstract things was something she disliked. Paintings must look like something. Not just some colors together.

"There. I'm done." The artist said.

Trudy looked at the painting and smiled. It was a garden. Full with existing and non existing plants. Also a pond with a waterfall. There was she. Next to the water. one leg pulled up and the other leg hanging down. With her beautiful curly dark brown hair.

"She looks good. I think this is really your best work." Trudy said and started to get dressed.

"Well thank you. It's time for you to get home. It's kind of late." He said.

Trudy pulled down her shirt. It was getting very tight and showed her bellybutton. Not that she minded that. It was snowing outside. She put on her jacket, hat and mittens. She almost wanted to go when she suddenly remembered the most important thing.

"Eh the money please." She asked sweetly and polite.

"Of course. Oh and I have something for you."

He handed her a envelope with the money and gave her a chocolate bar. That made Trudy always smile. She loved chocolate. She ate a lot of it. That was part of why she gotten pretty fat. But that was a good thing because people thought she was beautiful and artists wanted fat ladies and girls to paint. If she kept this body she would stay a model. As long if fat girls were seen like beautiful. But how could that ever change?
Trudy stepped outside. She heard the snow crack under her feet.She fast started to waddle home. She was also hungry. Well her mother always saved some food for her. Trudy was one member of the family that made money. She was very proud that her daughter was a model and made sure she got enough food and a bit more so she kept her beautiful curvy body.
After a short walk she arrived home.

"Hello there's my beautiful modeling daughter. How was it sweet hart?"

"All right." Said Trudy and handed her mother the envelope. "Can I have dinner? I'm starving."

"Sure you can. Just wait a couple of minutes." She said and started cooking
152.title: Trudy the model

1522.content:
"Here you go sweety." said her mother, plopping a platter in front of her daughter with a rather generous portion of meat drenched in gravy accompanied by lots of buttered bread. The one thing that was absent from her plate were veggies, Trudy loathed them. They didn't meet the girl's palate and since they weren't fattening her mother didn't force them upon her, more room for fatter foods she figured. Trudy inhaled her meal to her mother's delight.

"Mmmm now weres my dessert?" asked the gluttonous girl.

"Don't worry sweety I would never forget that." replied the mother bringing out a chocolate cake.

"Oh its looks delicious." said Trudy with eyes lighting up.

After the model finished her cake, she leaned back in contentment and rubbed her belly, while her mother began cleaning up.

"Now you just sit there Trudy and let your dinner settle. Afterall I don't want my pretty daughter exerting herself." the mother said removing the dishes.Trudy just sat there watching her mother work.

"You know mom, you'd look so much more prettier if you were fat." Trudy said.

"Oh if only I could be!" answered the hopeful woman scrubbing dishes. "But as long as you're fat, that's good enough for me." said her mother.

WAHHH! Suddenly her baby brother, Lucas began crying.

"Oh dear, could you get that Trudy?" begged her mother.

Trudy was happy to help with the baby. She picked up Lucas and pressed him against her soft fat which quickly placated the baby. The mother than glimpsed at her kids noticing how graceful and dignified Trudy looked as she consoled the baby, marveling at her daughter.

"wow what composure, she really was born for modeling." the mother thought.

As Trudy comforted her brother....
1522.title: A big diiner for a big girl

15222.content:
As Lucas nestled his head into his sister's fat body, she heard some chattering voices approaching. To Trudy's dismay it was the neighborhood girls. Trudy disliked the other girls because they were skinny which she found annoying.
"Hi Trudy want to come out and play?" asked a scrawny blonde girl.
"No thanks." Trudy politely declined.
"But why? We all want to run around the town with you. You're so pretty and fat, we could impress alot of people." a slender raven haired girl added.
"Maybe if you didn't run around like animals you could grow some fat on your bodies." Trudy said holding Lucas.
"But sitting around is boring." said an energetic girl. Trudy struggled to understand why the other girls would want to run around all it did was make her sweaty and tired.
"Come on Trudy!" a skinny girl pleaded.
"Mom!" Trudy resorted to calling on her mother to extinguish the situation.
"Sorry girls but Trudy has to watch her figure so she has to stay here and eat. But I'm sure she'd love to spend time with you if you had food." her mother said. "Awwww! Fine see you later." the thin girls waved their goodbyes somewhat disappointed.
"Thanks mom. Honestly I can't see why those girls can't just fatten up so they can be pretty." Trudy said putting Lucas down as he had settled down.
"Now sweety not every girl is lucky enough to be supplied with lots of food." the mother said handing Trudy a tasty chocolate bar.

choices: Trudy makes a small move and her dress rips
152221.content:
Two days later Trudy was posing for a painting in a beautiful dress. Like she was some kind of princess. She liked this dress. However no matter how big the dress was it was still very tight. At least for her. But when she took her pose she saw a few girls outside running around. She was thinking about them.

"Come on Trudy! I wanna see a smile. You're a happy princess. You get a lot of food and that clearly shows."

"Yeah. It's just that... well I saw some other girls. They look awful. So skinny you can see their bones. I don't understand why don't they want to become beautiful and fat just like me? They would just need to stop running around so much and eat more."

"Well Trudy... some of those girls can't get fat. They could stop running around. But they can't eat more because... There is no more. They don't have any more food. But if they had more food they might wanna get fat. You're so lucky you're already fat and with the money you make you earn enough money to stay fat. But a lot of other people don't have that much luck."

"Oh that's terrible. Can't we help them?"

"I'm afraid not. There are so many. If we would give them money we would become poor ourselves. Even if we would get a lot of money we need to split it between so many people that they would't get much money anyway. No we can't do much. But the rich ones. The mayor, the dukes, the church. They could do something."

Trudy got a bit scared. She was raised with the Bible. That god made people after his own image. Saying that the church could something but did't... that sounded almost like he had no faith in God. But she must admit that the church had a lot of valuable sculptures and paintings. And those priests also seemed to be well fed. And they had barrels full of wine. God was good, but the she doubted the priests were.

"But they make thieves this way. That's too bad."

"How do they akes thieves that way." Trudy asked without moving lips what was the reason why she did't said the M. (It's impossible to say the M, B or P without moving your lips, try it)

"Well if people don't have enough food and get very hungry they do anything to get food or money to buy food. even.... steal it. I know it's wrong but sometimes people have no choice. If you have a wife and seven kids and you only get a nickle for working in the mines it's hard to get enough food for them. Working in the mines is also pretty dangerous work. Sometimes there are accidents and some die. Other have problem with breathing. If a man dies what's gonna happen to his wife and seven kids? How are they gonna get food. Beg for money or steal it."

Trudy had done enough modeling to look like a happy, joyful princess. But deep in her hart she felt a bit bad for those people. But she did't think she could do much about it. Besides it was't like she did nothing. She worked for her money. Fine it was just sitting still but she got money for it. A lot of those other girls were't able to sit still for a minute.
152221.title: The make thieves this way

choices: use the recipe on other girls
1522211.content:
As Trudy grew dejected from the conversation, there was a knock on the door.

"Hold on Trudy. Come in!" the painter hollered.

In entered a girl chewing on some bread, roughly Trudy's age and surprisingly the same weight. Maintaining her pose, Trudy glanced at the fat girl. The girl had long blonde hair, blue eyes, snow white skin, and was bulging in her taut dress.

"Um are you the painter?" the girl inquired.

"Why yes I am. You must be Julia, please come in." the artist replied bringing the plump girl in.

"Trudy this is Julia, she will be modeling with you for this painting. She's new to this so try to make this easy." the painter said.

Remaining in position Trudy complied and worked beside Julia. The two models assumed their positions as the painter captured the image. Trudy had become rather professional but Julia was fresh to this work and had trouble remaining still but it didn't become problematic.

After a while the painter was finished. "Good work you two, here's your payment." he said handing the girls a generous payment.

The two girls walked out and Trudy wanted to talk to Julia.

"So Julia I noticed that you're still new to modeling." Trudy stated.

"Yes, I've been trying to get into modeling for some time now but I was constantly getting turned down for being too skinny." Julia said.

"Too skinny!? But you're so fat." Trudy exclaimed in astonishment.

"Thanks I am quite plump now but not too long ago I was rail thin." Julia spoke.

"Really? what did you do then?" Trudy asked growing interested.

"Well you see I always wanted to be fat like the beautiful women in the paintings, but my family was poor and couldn't afford to buy enough food to fatten me up. But my mother stumbled upon an old family recipe while looking for spare money. Turns out that the recipe was really cheap and super fattening. Within days I went from a scrawny girl to a full figured beauty." Julia said.

Enthralled by Julia's story, Trudy wanted to...
1522211.title: a fellow model

choices: She asks if  her mother could tell it to the other woman
She tells the other girls the recipe
15222111.content:
"Do you by any chance know the recipe?" Trudy asked.

"Eh... yeah. I need to help my mom make it. I think I can remember what's in it. Why? Do you want to become fatter?"

"Well... that too... but what I really wanted to do is to help those poor underfed girls. They look like walking skeletons. I think they would be much happier if they were fat. But they can't afford more food. But with that recipe they can become fat. So they look good."

"Good idea... but... don't you think they will take our jobs? If they become fat, Artists will ask them to pose for paintings instead of us."

"I think you worry a bit too much. Besides I wonder if those girls are able to sit still for a minute. I also don't know if they're fine to pose naked."

"You let some artists paint you naked?" Julia asked surprised.

"Sure. Why would't I? It pays good. There are so many artists who paint their models naked. So what's the point. It's just one more painting between all the others. I don't really mind. As long if they pay enough."

"Yeah. That's why we do this for is't it? The money."

"Well... the money is important, it's the reason why we do this of course. But I'm fat and I'm proud at it. I love it to show my curves, and I don't mind it to sit still for some time. I don't have to do anything. Just sit still and do nothing, and I get paid for that. Easy way to make money. If that has to be naked so be it."

"I find it hard to sit still for so long." Julia asked. "Not that I'm that active... but to sit totally still is different from just being a bit lazy."

"Anyway, I feel bad for those other girls in the village that are't able to get fat like us. With that recipe the at least have the chance to gain some weight. I can also gain a few extra pounds. That's always a good thing." Trudy said and smiled.

"Well I guess it's better for those girls to gain some weight. But I just hope they don't take our jobs."

"They won't trust me. Or perhaps we need to pose with them. That's no drama. Now tell me the recipe. I have a pretty good memory. Especially when it's about food."

"All right listen carefully."

Julia told exactly what she needed and Trudy listened carefully. She repeated everything once to be sure she remembered everything right. But finally Trudy had the recipe fresh in her memory. She thanked Julia and waddled home.
Outside it was white. Trudy could see her breath. She was happy she did't lived so fat fro this artist. She hated the cold.. Cold was nice when you were inside by a nice warm fire. Not if you needed to be outside.

"Ah Trudy nice you're home." Her mother said when Trudy walked in."How was it?"

"Fine. I need to work with another model. She's new in this world but she's nice. She even give this recipe. She said it's for very fattening food."

Trudy repeated the recipe and Trudy's mother carefully wrote it down. She always tried ways to make her daughter fatter. Trudy smiled but now she also needed a way to make sure the other girls knew about this too.
15222111.title: The recipe

152221112.content:
Without a moment's waste Trudy's mother made the recipe and served it to her daughter.

"Okay Trudy lets see if this works." the mother said.

Trudy began eating the concoction and immediately noticed how filling it was.

"Oh wow mommy this is really filling!" Trudy exclaimed after swallowing the heavy substance. "Nom nom I've never eaten anything like this."

"Really? Let me try...Wow! This is so thick! This is marvelous Trudy! Making this cost practically nothing! Nom" the mother squealed taking another sample.

"Hey mom maybe now you can be fat." Trudy exclaimed imagining her mother three times her size.

"I don't see why I can't." the mother joyfully replied as Trudy continued eating Julia's recipe.

The recipe Julia gave her was successful. Trudy had put on another layer of plush fat over her already plump figure. Waddling her way to another artist's studio for another lucrative job. Trudy noticed how her clothes had become tighter as her belly strained the fabrics of her dress. The neighborhood girls were playing leap frog, skipping, and somersaults, But when the sight of Trudy's heavier figure entered their line of vision, the skinny girls instantly dropped their activities and rush over towards the chunky model in amazement.

"Trudy you're so fat!" squealed one of the scrawny girls.

"Is that real?" said another slim girl poking Trudy's bloated belly. "Wow its so soft!"

"How do you do it Trudy? Please tell us." a slender girl begged.

"Yeah tell us how you can get so nice and fat." requested another underweight girl.

"Well alright, there's this recipe that's really filling and cheap to make...." Trudy began.
Trudy then told the girls the potent recipe the girls than all ran home to their mothers, feverishly eager to fatten themselves up and become beautiful. Trudy smiled as she felt that she really did a good deed, helping those girls become beautiful. Trudy than continued on her way to the studio.
152221112.title: She tells the other girls the recipe

A week went by and Trudy's waistline grew. Outside Trudy clearly saw some changes. It looked like every girl ate the recipe she gave them. Sure most of them were stick thin to start with. Sure they gained some pounds. But before they were fat or even chubby that might take a while. But each gained a noticeable amount of pounds. They looked a lot better then first and they did still run around but not so much like before. However everybody was happy with the gaining of the girls.

"All right Trudy I want that you are almost naked. But we use a silk scarf to hide your private parts. A bit like Amor. You know. That cupid that shoots arrow's through the harts of people. That makes them fall in love."

Trudy knew Amor but found it a bit strange idea. A lot of people still believed in god and the devil but that a cupid shoot an arrow at you to make you fall in love... no she did't believe that. But it was a nice story. But as far if she knew bows and arrows were only used to kill people or animals. Or a fun thing at a contest. But even then still very dangerous.

"I don't mind if I have to do it naked." Trudy said calmly while she stripped. "I posed naked before."

"That's not necessary. But I'm glad you could pose for me. You're a lovely girl."

Trudy smiled but she was glad she could pull her clothes out. They were awfully tight lately. She also knew very well why. She really needed to ask her mother for bigger clothes.

"I like posing. At least for good artists. You make nice panting's. But I really hate abstract art. Or paintings were you need to see something in. I never understood those things. Show something in some shapes. I like just a normal painting where you can clearly see something in. Just some people having a picnic. Or young girls together in a garden. It's not wrong to use some fantasy but please make a good paining."

"I do my best." The artist said and smiled.

"I also once met an artist who painted me sitting on a flower and added wings on my back. Like a pixie. That was also fun."

"By the way Trudy. I heard there's a famous artist coming to town. I think he would love it to paint you. He hardly smiles and is't very friendly but he's a very good artist and pays very well. Should I tell him about you?"

"Yeah I would like that."Trudy said and took a pose with the scarf."

"All right now. Don't move. Hold that pose. Could you try to smile a bit more? Perfect!"
1522211122.title: Abstract art

15222111221.content:
Trudy felt relieved posing out of her ever tightening clothes, her growing body made her outfits cumbersome.

"Ah Trudy you truly look beautiful" the painter said eyeing her pudgy body. "You're a blossoming flower" said the artist as he captured her image.

Throughout the endeavor, the artist noticed how chunky Trudy was from her legs to her belly. Her body, along with her long brown hair emanated feminine grace.

"Annndddd Finished! Excellent work Trudy." rejoiced the satisfied painter as he finished immortalizing the model.

"Wonderful" said Trudy breaking free from her pose and handing the silk scarf to the painter.

"I swear Trudy you're one of a kind. Would you like to see the painting?" asked the amiable painter.

Trudy had begun to put on her dress "Uuuhh hrmp c'mon oopph yes just give me a second. Grrr oh I'll put it on after I see the painting." Trudy said dropping the daunting task of dressing herself for the time being.

Leaving her tight dress on the floor Trudy walked to the proud painter and his new work and became immediately delighted at the image before her.

"Woooowww!" Trudy uttered as she gazed upon the beautiful image of herself as Amor, admiring how fat she was. Trudy remained in awe as she walked back to her dress that is until she had to put the small uncomfortable dress on again.

"Groan! Gasp! There we go...whew!" an exasperated Trudy declared successful in putting on her taut dress. Trudy bulged in her straining dress with the seams continuously growing tenuous.

"Here you go Trudy, here's a little extra for a job well done." said the satisfied artist.

"Why thank you" Trudy gracefully accepted " oh and do put in a good word for me with that skilled artist." Trudy added.

Trudy exited the studio, smiling from all of her well earned money and knowing exactly what she wants to do with the extra. With her bonus cash, Trudy went to a candy store and purchased a rather large chunk of delicious chocolate. Trudy gleefully consumed the sweet creamy treat as she heaved her heavy body home.
15222111221.title: Continue

152221112211.content:
Trudy arrived home bursting with excitement.

"Mommmmyyyy" Trudy sung. "Guess what a really skilled artist wants to paint me!" Trudy gleefully stated.

"Why thats marvelous sweetheart!" said her mother in the kitchen "Take a seat dear I'll have a snack ready in a minute!" her mother yelled.

Trudy walked to the table and saw Lucas in his high chair. "Hi Lucas." Trudy sweetly said patting his head.

Lucas giggled as his elder sister showed him some affection.

"I hope you're hungry. Uh sweety why is there chocolate on your face?" the mother happily said noticing Trudy's lips.

"Oh I made a little extra so I bought some tasty chocolate." Trudy answered..

"Well that's nice." Trudy's mother said as she carried in a huge batch of cookies and placed them on the table. Trudy immediately dove in grabbing a hot gooey cookie.

"Mind if I join you?" Trudy's mom said grabbing a cookie herself.

"Sure mom." Trudy answered before noticing something about her mother "Wow mommy you're getting fat! You're so pretty!"

"Oh isn't it wonderful and its all thanks to that recipe." mom proudly said as she started fondling her bulges.

Before the recipe Trudy's mother was tragically slender, sacrificing her curves to keep her daughter beautiful. But thanks to the miracle recipe, she was finally able to eat highly fattening foods at a really cheap price, resulting in the woman doubling her weight. Her arms developed flab, her legs thickened, her belly ballooned, her bottom widened, and her boobies blimped up causing her dress to rip under the new pressure. Even though the food was cheap, clothes weren't so her mother had to continue wearing the same torn dresses which exhibited exposed bulges and cleavage, but she was more than okay with that because she finally had gorgeous flab now.

"WAHHH!" Lucas cried.

"Aw come to mommy." she said picking up baby Lucas.

Lucas instantly smiled as he nestled his head into his mother's soft body. Lucas giggled as he hugged his mother's warm fat, gripping her soft rolls. No one was happier about their mother's weight gain than Lucas, he loved his new cushion.

"giggle I think Lucas likes your fat too mommy." Trudy said munching on a cookie.

"Is it true Lucas? Do you like having a fat mommy?" mom said seeing a content baby pressing against her augmented breasts. "Well I'm glad you like it Lucas. Now Trudy be sure and eat those cookies, I'm sure this painter wants you nice and plump." she said.

152221112211.title: At home

1522211122111.content:
The wind was blowing snow flakes through the air. Trudy could't wait until it would be summer. She liked the summer more. There was the house where she needed to be. She walked inside and brushed some of the snow of her hat.
She opened a door and saw a big hall. A woman walked over to her.

"Hello little girl. Can I help you?" She asked friendly.

"Eh... Hello. I'm Trudy. I'm the model." She said and smiled.

"Ah so you're that girl. Follow me."

The woman led Trudy to a door. She knocked and waited.

"Come in." Somebody said with a hard voice.

Trudy walked inside. Then she saw the artist. Long with black hair and a very muscular. He looked at Trudy and pulled up one eye brow.

"What is it?" He asked.

"Eh... I'm Trudy. I'm the model. I was asked to come to pose for you."

"You? Well you're surely not really what I expected. I know I would get a young girl. But I did't know it was this young."

"Well sorry to disappoint you." Trudy said a bit offended.

"Who said anything about disappointing?" He asked. "I'm not disappointed. Not at all. You're perfect. You're not what I expected that's true but you're perfect as my model. Really. I wanted a young girl."

Trudy took of her hat, mittens, jacket and scarf. The looked interested at the young model.

"Hmmm. Very pretty too. Those brown curls look really beautiful at you. You look great. Especially with that belly of yours."

Trudy smiled and stretched herself. The moment she did another button popped of her blouse. Trudy realized she really needed to ask her mother for bigger clothes. She already lost about half of her buttons. But she heard this man payed good. She would ask her mother after she was done.

"Fine let's get started. Would you mind it to pose naked. Don't worry. I wanted to get a good view at you love handles to paint. Not you vagina."

"I would't mind if you did." Trudy said calmly while she pulled her clothes out. At least it was warm in the room. There was a big fire burning in the fire place
Trudy stripped and heard the man mumbling in a approving way and smiled.

"All put your arms a bit more down. Right hold that. Smile a bit wider. Fantastic. Stay that way."

Trudy waited patience not moving a muscle.
1522211122111.title: A perfect model

152221112212.content:
Trudy happily walked home munching on her yummy chocolate not possessing a care in the world. That is until she heard a shout.

"Hey tubby!"

Trudy didn't know how to take the comment until she saw a skinny girl approach her possessing a mean scowl on her face.

"Hey chunkster! I've got a bone to pick with you." said the confrontational girl.

"Umm yes?" Trudy answered already irritated with the skinny girl. Trudy hated skinny girls, she found their bodies to be weird and ugly.

"You've ruined everything around here with your stupid fat." growled the belligerent skinny girl.

Stupid fat? Trudy never heard fat being demeaned like that. Fat has always been revered for as long as Trudy can remember. A fat body was coveted by all women.

"What are you talking about boney!?" Trudy responded.

"You made all the other girls fat!" said the scrawny lass.

"And hows that a problem twig?" Trudy asked filled with annoyance and a little curiosity.

"Now that all of the girls are fat, they're too tired to run around all day. We used to skip, jump rope, and climb trees until dusk but now they get tired too easily and end up sitting around playing with their dumb fat." pouted the scrawny girl.

"Well if you ask me its an improvement. A fine lady has better things to do than get sweaty and tired from childish exercise, like being responsible and nourishing her body. Besides they were so ugly when they were thin. But now that they've got some fat they look much more pretty." Trudy boasted.

"Oh yeah well I think being fat is boring and stupid." answered the rebellious girl.

"Maybe you should fatten up." suggested Trudy.

"Hmmp as if. I like being thin so take that!" pouted the slim girl angrily stomping off.

Despite bearing anger towards the crazy girl, Trudy was also bewildered by the idea of a girl wanting to be thin. She sure didn't want to be thin, she loved her fat and others did too. What kind of a girl didn't want to be plump? Trudy pondered this notion as she walked home.
152221112212.title: something happens along the way

1522211122121.content:
Trudy reached her house and when she entered she was greeted by her mother and by Lucas. However she was't sure what Lucas was saying but it sounded nice.

"Hello honey. Tell me how was it?" Her mother asked.

"It was fine. I even got a bit of extra money. That I used for some chocolate." Trudy confessed.

"That's no problem. If you've done so much good work you deserve a treat. Besides, chocolate helps you to let you body stay nice and fat. Perhaps it even helps gaining another pound. That and that new recipe."

"Yeah... about that recipe... I might have given it to some other girls." Trudy said slowly.

"You think I don't know that. I also talk with other mothers. I know they got the recipe, and they're all very happy with it. It's cheap, easy to make and it gives them and their kids some extra fat, what makes them look a lot better, and they also have some extra fat for when they don't have much food. Also a nice layer of fat protects you against the cold. So they're all very happy with it. All girls are happy that they are becoming fat and pretty. Everyone is happy with it.

"Not everyone. I just met a girl. A real twig. However she was angry at me. angry that I gave other girls the recipe. Because since they gained weight they became less active and rather sit around playing with their fat. She called it dumb fat. I thought she should fatten up, and you know what she said? She said she liked being thin. I don't see how that is possible."

"Well so one girl is angry at you. That does't matter. You made a lot of families very happy. So many people are happy with this. Only one girl is angry. That's a price I'm willing to pay. A lot of others too. Don't care about one person who's angry while you made so many other persons happy."

"Yeah... I guess I should be happy about that." Trudy said and smiled weakly. "Oh before I forget I heard a very skilled artist is coming to town. He pays a lot of money, aaaaand, maybe he wants to paint me."

"Oh that's great honey. I'm so proud at you."

"Yeah but mom... I might need some... bigger clothes. Mine are awfully tight. Probably because of all the extra weight," Trudy said and slapped her belly making it jiggle.

Her mother did't seem happy. She loved Trudy and did't want to deny her clothes, but clothes were expansive. She would probably outgrew them soon too. But she could of course make her clothes a bit bigger. That would't be to hard.

"This little piggy went too the market. This little piggy stayed home." Trudy started to sing.

Lucas always liked it when Trudy was singing that song. It was the best way to calm him down. Suzy went sitting with him on the couch. Lucas looked smiling at his sister. He leaned for over and landed on her fat belly what was his favorite part to lay on. He liked it to be on his sisters soft warm fat. Even while it was a bit harder now because of her recent meal.

"He's just hungry. I make a bottle for him." Her mother said.

But when she was doing that the doorbell rang. Her mother looked outside. wondering who was coming at this hour. She returned later with a letter.

"Guess another artist wants you to be his model." Her mother said and fast read the letter and gasped for air. .

"What is it Mommy?" Trudy asked.

Lucas looked a bit grumpy because Trudy stopped singing.

"A famous artist want to paint you. You won't believe how much he's going to pay you. He wants to paint you, but he also want to hire you for his class. He teaches art to students. So he want to hire you twice. One time for him alone, and one time for his entire class. You don't have a problem with that do you?"

"I don't see why I would have a problem with that." Trudy mumbled.

"That's a good thing. Because this man is gonna pay you a lot. He heard from you from some other artists and he really wants you. But you never been a model for a entire class."

"I don't see that like a problem. It's not very different from what I do normal. It's just a few people instead of one."

Lucas started to softly punch Trudy since he wanted her started sing again. But he was just a baby so his punches were't really hard and Trudy was a bit to occupied to notice.

"Great. I'm so glad you doing this. You don't mind doing this do you? Because if you don't I would't force you."

"Really mom I'm fine doing this. All I need to do is to sit still and don't move. That's pretty easy, and I get paid for it. If I need to do it in fancy dresses or naked I don't really care. However especially around now I like it when they have a warm room. It's not nice to pose naked in a cold room. It gives me goosebumps."

"Yeah I understand what you mean. I'll tell him that you do it. It's in a few days."

Trudy suddenly noticed the punches of Lucas.

"All right. All right now where were we. This little piggy had rose beef to eat. This little piggy had nothing."

Her mother came back with a bottle for Lucas. While she gave him the bottle she looked at her daughters fat belly.

"It's in just a few days but let's try to make that belly in the meantime a little bit bigger."

"I would like that!" Trudy said with a grin.

When Trudy woke up she ate a large breakfast that her mother made for her. After she was done eating she was to walk out the door.

"Good luck with the artist today Trudy" said Trudy's mom.

"Thanks mom" said Trudy as she walked out of the house.

As she walked Trudy was thinking about the artist that she was going to visit. He was known as Leopoldo Gepetto, he was a famous artist known for his beautiful paintings of fat girls. However he hasn't had a new painting for over ten years. So it was a surprise to Trudy that she received a letter from him. Trudy arrived at the address that was written in the letter and knocked on the door. A while later it opened revealing a young man in his late twenties.

"Hello are you mr Gepetto?" asked Trudy.

"No, I'm his nephew Ezio. I help take care of my uncle" said Ezio.

"EZIO WHO'S AT THE DOOR?" asked a voice yelling in the distance.

"It's the model that you request for today uncle" said Ezio.

"Oh then send her in" said Leopoldo.

Ezio then led Trudy to a large room where she met Leopoldo Gepetto who is in his early seventies, had long white beard and was bald.

"Ah, you must be Trudy, please to meet you" said Leopoldo as he shook her hand.

"Please to meet you too sir. So what would you like me to do?" asked Trudy.

"Well first I would like you to wear this toga and then just lay on that couch" said Leopoldo.

Trudy did as instructed and wore the toga and laid on the couch. After a few hours Leopoldo was done.

"I do believe that this is my finest work" said Leopoldo as he showed the painting to both Ezio and Trudy.

After he showed the painting to them both he paid Trudy and gave her two chocolate bars much to her pleasure.

"Alright here's the money I owe you. Now you do remember that I also want you to model from my class tomorrow right?" asked Leopoldo.

"Of course I do" said Trudy.

"Excellent, then I will see you again tomorrow" said Leopoldo.

With that said Trudy then walk back home.

The next day Trudy walked through the snow covered streets. Snow flakes were falling from the sky. Trudy wrapped her scarf tight around her head. She hated how cold it was. She saw a few kids throwing snow balls. They seemed to have fun. But Trudy had work. She was kind of proud that she worked. Her mother did't earned much money but raised two kids on her own. She did lover her and her brother and was very good for them. So she was happy she earned some money for the three of them. The earning of the money also made it able for her to eat enough to keep a big belly what most artists liked to paint. She must admit she also liked having a big belly. She knew Lucas liked it also and her mother also liked her big belly. Everyone won.

"Ah here it is." Trudy said and looked at a big building.

She walked up the steps and knocked on the door. The door opened and a tall man looked down at the little figure.

"How can I help you?" He asked with a deep voice.

"Hello. I'm eh... Trudy. I was supposed to be model for a class. Could you tell me were that is?" Trudy asked while she brushed the snow out of her hair.

"Of course miss. It's on the second floor. up the stairs first door at your right. Class 101." He said with his deep voice.

"Thanks. I think I can find it then." Trudy said and walked up the stairs.

She was surprised how big it here was. A lot of artists only had a small attic. It was hard becoming a famous artist. Only a few of them really became famous in history. But She probably would never be named. Perhaps century's later people would see paintings were she posed for. The people would know the artist, the name of the painting and what was on it. But no one would knew the name of the model. Of course not everybody had a model. Some people just draw things from out their heir head. But some people really painted strange things. She did't mind painting things that were't real but she did't really like paintings that made totally no sense.
There was the door. She knocked and walked inside. She saw a lot of men looking at her.

"Ah great. There we have our model." Leopoldo Gepetto said who was sitting on a chair in front of the others.

All the men had a white canvas in front of them and paint on a board and a few brushes. Some also had a tiny very sharp knife. Trudy knew they used that to scratch away paint. She looked at Leopoldo Gepetto.

"So what do I need to wear? Nice dress? Toga? Nude? I don't care." Trudy said calmly.

"Well I thought about it. I Thought about it very long. I think it's best if you pose naked but with a scarf. Something like that little kid with wings that shoot's arrows that make people fall in love."

"Oh you mean Amor." Trudy said. "Yeah I know a bit how he looks."

She stripped and smiled when she saw a big fire burning in the fire place. And she needed to pose right in front of it. She let Leopoldo Gepetto put the scarf around her.
Then all started painting. Trudy hold perfectly still she only blinked a few times with her eyes but apart from that she did't moved.
Leopoldo walked from one artist to another. Sometimes complaining a bit, sometimes giving advice and sometimes complementing them.

After an hour of posing it seems that the class was done and Leopoldo was walking from one artist to the next.

"Good, good, you've improved quite a bit, good, you definitely need improvement, I don't want you in this class anymore" said Leopoldo as he was either complementing or criticizing his students.

All the students were packing their stuff and going home and Trudy was putting her clothes on and was about to leave until Leopoldo stopped her.

"Not so fast Trudy, I would like you to stay just a little bit longer" said Leopoldo.

"Well you see after I'm done teaching this class I usually tutor this boy" said Leopoldo.

"Alright I guess I could stay a little bit longer" said Trudy and as she said that a boy entered the room.

"I'm here for my lesson mr Gepetto" said the boy.

"Good timing Alphonse, I would like you to meet Trudy she will model for your painting today" said Leopoldo.

"Okay Al, so what do you want me to do?" asked Trudy.

Trudy did as Leopoldo said and sit still as Al was painting her with Leopoldo giving him some advice. After half an hour Al was done and it she was a beautiful painting and Leopoldo agreed. Leopoldo than paid Trudy and asked her if she could come again next week and she said yes.

Don't move... that's all and you get paid for it. So he told to some of his friends who told their friends and so on. Now I pose for ever artist who pays me. As long if they pay me I pose in whatever they want. Dresses, fantasy clothing even naked if they want me too. I don't really care. At least those way I make money. That way my mom is able to take care of me and my brother. She also makes sure I eat enough to keep my big belly since that's what most artists like."

"Well makes sure he buys you food." Her mother said with a smile.

"Just a few finishing touches and.....there all done" said the artist.

"Does that mean we can eat the food now?" asked Trudy.

"Sure go right ahead" said the artist.

With that said the girls immediately began to eat the food. As they were eating Trudy and Ariël were talking to each other.

"Say Trudy don't you have an appointment with Leopoldo Gepetto in a few days?" asked Ariël.

"Yeah you're right. Do you know him?" asked Trudy.

"Of course I know him he's an old friend of the family" said Ariël.

"How does your family know him?" asked Trudy.

"Well you see when my mother started out as a model Leopoldo was the first artist who painted her. Then he recommended her to many of his artist friends and after that they became close friends, he even gave her away at her wedding to my father" said Ariël.

"Wow! So has he ever painted you?" asked Trudy.

"Yes he has in fact he was the one who painted me as a child" said Ariël.

After they ate all the food they decided to leave so that Ariël can go home and take a nap. When they got outside they saw two carriages with Alphonse standing next to one of them.

"So how did it go?" asked Al.

"It went very well thank you for asking, now I'm going home to take a nap. Would you like to join me Trudy?" asked Ariël.

"No thanks I should be getting home now" said Trudy.

"Would you like me to give you a ride home?" asked Ariël.

"That's okay I'll just walk home" said Trudy.

"Is it okay if I walk with you?" asked Al blushing.

"Sure, if you want" said Trudy also blushing.

With that said Ariël went straight home while Al and Trudy started walking to Trudy's home while holding hands making them blush even more and as they were walking.....
15223221112222121111212121.title: The artist is finished

choices: Fast forward to the next apointment with Leopoldo Gepetto
152232211122221211112121211.content:
"So you like my sister?" Al suddenly asked.

"Oh yeah she's great. It's fun to meet another model. A model that's fat. Just like me. Most girls in the neighborhood are very thin. I can see their ribs."

"Well you don't have to worry about that with Ariël. You won't even feel her ribs. With all that fat around it."

"The fat and the fact she has huge tits. True those are also made with fat. Well I'm sure we will never be able to feel and even less able to see them." Trudy said. "And I don't need to. But what I mean is: I just don't think skinny girls look that good. See those paintings all artists make. That are paintings of fat girls."

"Don't get this the wrong way Trudy but believe me. There are hundreds of artists. But only a few of them are able to really make money with them. You can become famous and immortal with making paintings if you're good at it and people like your work. But if not, you won't make any money and no one will ever know or remember your name."

"But... you're an artist too. Soooo are't you afraid that happens to you?"

"Well I thought about that too. However Mr. Gepetto thinks I can really make money with it, and he is a famous artist himself so he should know that. I'm still young. Perhaps my paintings have success before I'm an adult. If they do, I don't have to worry."

"What if they don't?" Trudy asked.

"Well my family is pretty rich. So I'm sure they'll help me if I'm in money trouble. But I'll worry about that later. How about you?"

"Well, I get paid anyway. Does't matter how good or bad the painting is or if people like it. However I hate bad art or that abstract art I mean come on a toddler can make that. But well the artist get's fame from a painting, the painting but the person on it... get's forgotten." Trudy said with a fake sad look.

"Well... I will remember you. Perhaps I can make painting of you and call it my girlfriend Trudy. At least that way people will remind you."

"That means if the painting get's famous. Well I guess that will be no problem. If Leopoldo Gepetto want to give you a private lesson again. How do you wanna paint me? Nice dress, playing, having a picnic, nude?"

Alphonse blushed deep red after hearing the last word. He tried to hide it by looking another way.

"Come on." Trudy said. "Don't act so prudish. It's no big deal for me. I have posed naked for artist hundreds of times. Sometimes the want me to wear some fancy clothes and all. Well I don't really care. I wear whatever they want or don't want."

"Are you never a bit well... nervous. Posing for a famous artist? Perhaps thousands of people will see that painting of you. Perhaps millions. does't that bother you?"

"No not really. I posed so many times it became... normal. No big deal. Besides it's not if I see those people. Well this is my house. I can better hurry up. I don't want to miss dinner. I'm not the size of your sister but still I need a lot of food to fill this belly and make it even bigger. See you Al!"

Alphonse walked back to his house thinking about how he would paint Trudy.
152232211122221211112121211.title: About artists and models

1522322111222212111121212112.content:
The time went by fast for Trudy as was making her way to Leopoldo Gepetto studio after eating a large breakfast. When she arrived she was dead tired from all the walking but had to composed herself so she could look professional. When she did she entered the building where she was greeted by Ezio.

"Hello, I'm here for my appointment with Leopoldo" said Trudy.

"Follow me I will take you to my uncle" said Ezio.

They made their way to Leopoldo's chambers and as they were walking Trudy noticed many paintings of fat women as old as 50 and as young as 5. Trudy though that these were memorabilias of Leopoldo Gepetto's very long career. They arrived at his chambers where he greeted them.

"Ah Trudy it is good to see that you are on time, unlike Alphonse" said Leopoldo with frustration.

"Alphonse isn't here yet?" asked Trudy.

"No he is not. That boy has an amazing talent whe it comes to painting, unfortunately it cannot be said about his punctuality" said Leopoldo.

Just as Leopoldo finished that sentence Alphonse entered the room.

"I'm sorry for being late Mr Gepetto you see-" said Al before he was interrupted by Leopoldo.

"I don't care what excuse you have as long as you don't be late ever again in the foreseeable future" said Leopoldo.

"So what are we going to do today?" asked Trudy.

"Well today I was thinking we could have Alphonse paint you..." said Leopoldo Gepetto.
1522322111222212111121212112.title: Fast forward to the next apointment with Leopol...

15223221112222121111212121122.content:
"Nude. Most great artists from now paint woman nude. If Alphonse want to become a great artist once he also need to practice to paint woman nude. You're a very pretty girl. You are a model for some time now, I'm sure you posed nude before."

"Oh yeah. Many times. First time felt a bit strange. But after the third time it became normal."

She looked at Al and noticed he blushed so deep red his head looked like a tomato. She giggled and started to strip.

"I saw some of your paintings. They're very nice. By the way who is that little girl? I saw a few paintings of her."

Gepetto's face suddenly seemed to become old and sad. His voice sounded broken.

"That's my daughter. I painted her... often." He said.

"You have a daughter. Can I meet her?" Trudy asked.

"No you can't. She passed away a few years ago." Al whispered to her.

Trudy slapped her hands for her mouth.

"Oh Mr. Gepetto I'm so sorry. I did't mean to..."

"It's all right. You could't know. My daughter... yes she passed away. But I can remind how she looks when I look at the paintings of her. But We're not here to talk about my paintings or models. This is about you two. Do you have something in mind?"

"Well I don't really like standing for a long time so I rather sit. That way you also get a better look at my belly and love handles.

"Why don't you sit at this couch. You can lean."

Trudy pulled one leg up the couch and leaned against the arm rest. She smiled perfectly. Al almost started but suddenly he stopped.

"Wait a second." Al said, and left the room and returned a moment later with an apple he handed Trudy."So that looks better. With an apple in her hand.

Gepetto looked carefully at what Al did. And nodded and sometimes mumbled a bit. Trudy sat perfectly still except from blinking with her eyes.

"Really Al this is the best thing you ever painted." Gepetto said. "I knew you were good. But when I see this I almost would think about it to give up painting and make room for the new generation. Almost!"

"Thanks." Al said while sweat was dripping from his face.

He painted carefully using small brushes. Looking carefully at Trudy. She wondered if he still had trouble that she was naked. She posed naked for so many artist so she really did't care. It was't her first time and surely not her latest. After doing it so many times it became normal.
Finally Al slowly put his brush down and whipped his forehead.

"I'm done. It's finished." He said.

Trudy fast walked over to them to see the panting. She was surprised how good it looked. It was fantastic. It almost looked real. And Al had been right that the apple in her hand did look good.

"Amazing." Gepetto said. "Al this is without a doubt you best painting ever. Would't you agree Trudy?"

"You bet I do. Al this is wonderful... But is has been a while and I became kind of hungry!"
15223221112222121111212121122.title: Nude model

152232211122221211112121211222.content:
As Trudy was putting her clothes on, Ezio entered the room.

"What is it Ezio?" asked Leopoldo.

"Do you remember the appointment with the blond haired girl?" asked Ezio.

"Yes but that isn't until tomorrow" said Leopoldo.

"Well she's here now sitting in the living room. Should send her away?" asked Ezio.

"No that won't be necessary, we are already done here. Just give me a chance to tidy up this room and I'll be ready for her" said Leopoldo.

Trudy and Alphonse said their goodbyes to Leopoldo and left the room. As they were making their way outside they saw a young girl sitting on a couch. They went to her to go say hi and on closer look she was about their age, had long blonde hair, blue eyes, white skin and was pretty fat in fact she was about Trudy's size. She was also eating a loaf of bread.

"Hello there" said Trudy startling the girl. "I'm sorry I didn't mean to startle you. My name is Trudy what's yours?"

"My name is Julia" said Julia nervously and Trudy noticed.

"Is this your first time modelling?" asked Trudy.

"No I've model a couple of times before, it's just that this is the first time that I've ever pose for one of the big name artist" said Julia.

"Well don't worry about it. Sure mr Gepetto is a little bit stern but deep down he's really a nice guy" said Alphonse.

"Really?" asked Julia.

"Yes really. You know Al and I were thinking of going somewhere to eat and you could come join us after your appointment with mr Gepetto" said Trudy.

"I would love that so much" said Julia excitingly.

Just then Ezio came in and told Julia that Leopoldo Gepetto was ready for her. At the same time Trudy's belly growled.

"It's going to be agony waiting for Julia's appointment to end" thought Trudy. Then suddenly Julia came up to Trudy.

"Here you go you can eat this while you're waiting for me" said Julia as she handed the loaf of bread that she was eating earlier to Trudy.

"Thank you Julia" said Trudy.

Trudy and Alphonse waited for Julia outside in the carriage. After a few dozen minutes Julia came outside and Trudy and Alphonse waved hello to her and gesture her to get inside the carriage.

"So where are we going to eat?" asked Julia.
152232211122221211112121211222.title: Someone comes in

1522322111222212111121212112221.content:
"Well I think there's more then enough food at Al's house. At least if we are allowed to go and eat there." Trudy said.

"Of course you can. I'm sure my mother is fine with it. Besides we do have more then enough food. We need food for Ariël." Al said, and the carriage started to move.

"Ariël?" Julia asked. "Who is that."

"That's Al's big sister. She's sure a big sister. She's huge. She's friendly and all, don't worry. But she can eat a lot. Compared to her what we can eat are just appetizers."

"Really?" Julia asked. "I have a reputation to eat a lot. Well of course you don't get a body like this if you don't eat a lot. But well I guess you know everything about that. I mean you're about the same size like me. Artists like to paint fat girls because the look better. So I've posed a couple of times. How many times have you been a model?"

"Well... I don't know. I did't really count. But I've been a model for a few years now... I really don't know but many times."

"A few years? Wow. So you have way more experience then me. Ever worked with other great artists?"

"Sure. Some of them had huge houses, but some others had... just a attic. Guess those with a attic were't very famous yet. But anyway they paid and that was the most important. I need to make money."

"Yeah. Making money is pretty important."

Al did't said anything. His family always used to have money. He never really realized that some people really needed more money.
A few minutes later they arrived at Al's house and walked in.

"Hi mom. I brought two friends. Trudy and Julia. Both of them are hungry so if you have some food for them..."

"Sure! Go sit down girls I will bring some food right away. Ariël will soon also wake up from her nap."

"I can't wait to meet your sister." Julia said excited.

"Just wait until you see her." Al said with a smile.

The next moment Al's mother put some food down for the two girls.

"Here you go. Go ahead eat as much if you like. We always have more then enough food. We always make sure we have enough food. We need to with a girl like Ariël." Al's mother said with a smile.

"Yeah but I'm stuffed, and by the looks of it you're too. Perhaps we should call Ariël. I'm sure she can finish the food." Julia said.

"I bet the food, also the green and mouldy stuff and everything in the bakery and she will still have some room left." Trudy said.

She looked at her own belly that was pretty big. She gained a lot the past days. That was partly thanks to all the food she ate with Ariël. Also the fact that thanks to Alphonse she was able to use the carriage instead of walking to get somewhere. It did made her a bit lazy. But she was well aware of that. Especially today after walking to the market with her mom.

"Oh I totally forget my mom. She's still upstairs."

The next moment the door to the cellar opened and both mothers walked in. Smiling when they saw the two girls with their swollen bellies.

"See. I thought they would be here. They both have a big appetite and I know my Julia. Seems you had a fun time, right Julia?"

Julia opened her mouth. But what came out was: "BUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRP!!! Oops. Excuse me." Julia said and blushed. "But yeah we did had a fun time here. We were both a bit hungry and it would be a shame to let this food go to waste."

"That's true. But you did't eat anything green or mouldy? Because if yo do that you could get really sick." Julia's mother said.

"Don't worry mom. We're fine. We did't eat anything green or mouldy." Julia said.

"Say what is wrong with all this stuff?" Trudy's mother asked.

"Nothing really. But if something is on the shelf for more then two weeks we need to get rid of it. But it does't wanna say that after two weeks it's bad. We just can't sell it anymore that's all. But with a daughter like ours its handy too have some extra food."

"Yeah I know what you mean." Trudy's mother said and smiled. "But what's gonna happen whit this food."

"Well Julia eats it or it get's old, green and mouldy and then we throw it away. Why?"

"Well if I could have some of..."

"If you want it take it. It's free since we can't sell it."

Trudy's mother looked for some bread and a two pies and thanked the parents of Julia. After that she left but it was a bit hard to get Trudy on her feet thanks the her recent feast.
152232211122221211112121211222111212111.title: Swollen bellies

1522322111222212111121212112221112121111.content:
Trudy and her mother said their goodbyes to Julia and her parents and made their way home. As they were walking they were talking about Julia and her family.

"That Julia is a nice girl and so is her family" said Trudy's mom.

"Yeah they are and have you seen how chubby Julia's baby sister was? Who knows maybe she'll be a fat model like her sister" said Trudy.

"That would be nice since the world needs more fat models" said Trudy's mom.

They continued walking until they finally reached their home. When they arrived at their home they saw a carriage and Alphonse standing in front of their home.

"Alphonse? What are you doing here?" asked Trudy.

"Hi Trudy, I was going to give you this but I saw that you weren't home so I decided to wait so I can give you this in person" said Alphonse as he gave Trudy a letter.

Trudy took the letter from Alphonse and read it. It was an invitation to Ariël's birthday party which according to the letter is two days from now.

"So will you come?" asked Al.

"Of course I'll come" said Trudy.

"Great! See on Sunday" said Al as he left in his carriage.

Trudy and her mom went inside and thanked Miss Glemcer for babysitting Lucas.
1522322111222212111121212112221112121111.title: Arriving home

1522322111222212111121212112221112121111.content:
After dinner Trudy looked at the letter. Her mother walked in.

"Lucas is in bed. Everything all right with you? It looks like something is bothering you."

"I'm fine. Wait... no. It's just that... Well it's Ariël's birthday. I don't have a clue what I can give her. I mean her family is rich. What can I give her? She has everything her hart desires. Servants, cooks, a bath big enough for her. What can I give her?"

"Well something does't have to be expansive. It's about what people like and need."

"What does she need? perhaps another servant to help move her body?"

"Trudy that's ridiculous. We can't own a servant ourselves and we're not gonna give a servant to anybody else."

Trudy let her head smack on the table.

"But then what am I gonna give her? I don't have a clue what she likes. Apart from eating and modeling."

"I think you're worry too much. Ariël invited you because you're her friend. She does't care if you give her a fantastic gift or not."

"Yeah perhaps." Trudy said and leaned back in her chair. "I normally don't get invited to parties. Mainly because I don't hang out with those twig girls. There so thin. They move so much. I get tired if I would move that much."

"You could ask Julia. I guess she's invited too. That you can give something together."

"Hm that's not a bad idea. I guess I can ask her tomorrow. Can I perhaps also eat a bit more when I'm there."

Trudy's mother looked with a smile at her fat daughter. All the juicy love handles that made her daughter such a fantastic model. She was happy her daughter was so fat and she wanted to keep Trudy, and make her even fatter. Trudy liked this and made sure she kept fat and was getting fatter.

"Mommy... I'm still a bit hungry. Can I have some more?"
1522322111222212111121212112221112121111.title: A present

choices: "We can ask Alphonse what she likes"
"We can follow her around to see what she likes"
1522322111222212111121212112221112121111.content:
Trudy woke up to a beautiful morning. She quickly ate her breakfast and went straight out the door.

"Trudy where are you going so early in the morning?" asked Trudy's mother.

"I'm going to Julia's bakery, so that we can think of a present to give to Ariël for her birthday" said Trudy.

Trudy started walking to Julia's bakery which was a long way from home. She arrived at the bakery tired and gasping for air. She saw that the bakery was opened so she went inside.

"Hello there. Trudy was it?" asked Julia's mother.

"Yes that's me, I am here to see Julia is she here?" asked Trudy.

"She's at the cellar right now and feel free to help yourself to something while you're there" said Julia's mother.

Trudy said thank you and made her way to the cellar. When she arrived she saw Julia eating.

"Hi Trudy, what are you doing here?" asked Julia.

"Well first of all did you get an invitation to Ariël's birthday?" asked Trudy.

"Yes I did, I was going to come to your place to discuss what we could give her as a present" said Julia.

"So do you have any ideas what to get her?" asked Trudy.

"None whatsoever I've only met her a few days ago so I have no idea what to get her" said Julia.

The two girls just sat there thinking about what to get Ariël for her birthday until one of them spoke up.

"I got an idea" said Trudy.

"What is it?" asked Julia.
1522322111222212111121212112221112121111.title: Tomorrow

choices: Alphonse know's something Ariël would like
He also does't have a clue
1522322111222212111121212112221112121111.content:
"We can ask Alphonse what she likes. I mean he's her brother. He has known her his entire life. He should know what his sister likes, apart from eating."

"Yeah but if we gave her something to eat she swallows it in a few seconds and it's gone. You know how much fits in her stomach. She can eat a entire wedding and still has room for much more."

"Yeah your probably right but I like Ariël, and I also like Alphonse. There my friends. Just like you." Trudy said and swallowed a cake.

"Well... I guess we need to stop stuffing our faces and walk over to them."

Trudy moaned.

"Don't you have a carriage we can use. It's a pretty long walk."

"My parents own a bakery. We're not very rich. We earn enough to live from, and we have enough food but we can't afford a carriage."

The two girls got up and after they put on their jackets, hats and mittens, and told Julia's parents were they were going they walked to the house of Alphonse.

"It's snowing again." Julia said. "I don't like it if it is so cold."

Trudy opened her mouth to taste a few snow flakes.

"Hm Alphonse and Ariël have a carriage." Trudy mumbled.

"Yeah but they're very, very rich. If I had so much money and a bunch of cooks who would cook huge amounts of food for me each day I would't be a lot fatter then I am now."

"Well I saw your sister. She seems to also have a healthy appetite." Trudy said and grinned.

"Yeah you bet she does. She's such a little piggy. But I love her. If she keeps gaining like this she can perhaps also become a big model."

"That would be nice." Trudy said.

The two fat girls needed about two times to rest a bit to catch their breath but finally reached the house of Alphonse and Ariël. Trudy knocked on the door. Alphonse opened the door.

"Oh it;s you two. Come in. Come in. Ariël is upstairs taking a nap."

"That's good. Because we came to ask you a question." Julia said brushing the snow from her hat.

"Yeah. Ariël invited us to her birthday party but... we don't have a clue what we should give her. I mean what do you give a girl what has everything she wants?"

"So we thought that you maybe know what she wants or what we could give her."

"Well..."
1522322111222212111121212112221112121111.title: Ask Alphonse

153.content:
Olive curled up in her blanket. She knew the sun was up but she just wanted to stay in bed. She closed her eyes. She hoped she would fall asleep again. But now she woke up it was hard to fall asleep again. She also knew that everyone needed to help. There was always work to do at a farm. That was just what she hated about it. She knew she was pretty lazy but she did't cared. There was't much she cared about. Except eating and sleeping. That and stories. She loved stories. Telling stories and hearing them. She had a lot of imagination like most young girls of six have. She rubbed over her belly. She was kind of chubby. She liked that. Besides she looked good with this. Guys liked chubby girls. She wished she could get fatter. She dreamed that she could stuff herself once somewhere.

"Wake up!" Time to work!" Her father Marcus yelled.

She turned around and pretend she did't heard him. She heard the others getting up and get ready. Maybe they would't notice she was still in bed. If she just...

"Wake up! You lazy weasel!" Her sister suddenly yelled in her ear.

"Hee. Auw my ear. Did you really have to shout in it?"

"Well I need to make sure you woke up." Betta said while getting dressed. "Since your so lazy! Don't deny it!"

I did't deny it. Olive thought by herself. Fine I am lazy but I'm beautiful.

"We need to help dad. Everyone here needs to work. You too."

"But I hate working. I don't want to work."

"Who does't work does't eat!" Her father yelled.

Olive kept her mouth shut since she knew that her dad would keep that promise and no food was even worse then hard work. She stretched herself once and started to get dressed. Well at least it was warm. hard work was far worse when it was wet and cold.
Her mother handed her a basket.

"Go pick berries. Don't eat them all like you did last time. We did't forget." Her mother (Nana) told her.

She remembered. She must admit it was a fun time. Just eat the entire time. But it was less fun when her family found out. The punishment was so bad so she would't forget it. She did't. She would eat one single berry. that was for sure
Olive was alone in the part were the berries grew but she liked that. Now she could think of the rest of her story. She liked it to make up stories. She often told them to her grandfather. She would like it to tell them too little kids but she was the youngest. Well she knew her sister was seeing some guy. So perhaps she would get a cousin in a few years

Around 5300 BC it was very normal to get kids around you teenager years.

being the youngest in a family of ten was sometimes a little hard. Grandma also used to live with them but she died two years ago. And her aunt was pregnant but the kid died at birth. Well that was tragic but it happened more often. She sighed.
Her stomach was rumbling. She would like it if she could become really fat. Well the good thing about the life here was that there was always food. In the old times you need to hunt or look for food. Now it was outside your door and you could even get food in the winter when nothing would grow. Well that was a good thing. With a big appetite like hers it was good to have always some food ready.

"I hope it's soon time to eat since I'm starving."
153.title: Olive a farmer's daughter

1551.content: "Now take a deep breath in miss Partington." Miss Lucille, the elderly maid said as she began tightening the corset around Mary's torso. "Oomph, not so tight Lucille!" Mary gasped. The Partington family were holding a ball at their esteemed estate tonight and only the wealthiest families were invited. "Sorry dearie, it's just...that your err...well" Lucille struggled to find the words to describe the youngest mistress of the family. Mary Victoria Elizabeth Partington was heiress to a rich food company, Partington Foods Incorporated was one of Great Britians and United States largest food suppliers. Because of this the Partington family was well feed off, including young Mary. At her current age 5, she weighed over 180 pounds. Her pumpkin sized stomach, added to her stubby legs and arms. Despite this Mary was overall happy with her stuffed figure. It also gave her an extra layer of cuteness. "Big boned!" Lucille finally finding the proper word to describe it. "There all done." Mary admired herself in the mirror in her new dress, barley managing to cover her greedy gut poking out. "Thank you Lucille!" Mary courtesed.
