1551.title: Mary

15513.content:
"...wait till the party tonight. Then I have more room in my tummy for the extra tasty food."

Mary disliked being hungry but she made exceptions for the fantastic parties they had. Then there were tables filled with plates of delicious food and tasty treats and Mary was always able to eat a lot of the food. She had a huge appetite. It clearly showed at her figure. Even while it was now stuffed in a corset. Mary disliked corsets but ladies were supposed to wear corsets and she wanted to be a proper lady. She came from a rick and wealthy family with proper etiquette and manners. She would never do something what would bring shame to the family.
Mary was also incredibly spoiled. Since she was the first and only child from a rich family She could get everything her hart desire. Mary was interested in three things only. Food, parties and reading. Even at only the age of 5 Mary was able to read. Mary's intelligence was almost as big as her appetite. She had been home schooled. Mary was very bright and learned very fast and since she was the only child the teacher could easily go a bit faster and Mary picked up reading very fast.

"Ah honey you look perfect like always." Her mother said with a smile. "What a lovely perfect girl I have. You're with a doubt the best I ever made."

"Well daddy did half of the work." Mary said.

"Half of the work? Come on. He gave his... eh... stuff to me. I needed to carry you for nine months in my belly. I looked like a fat cow. I had trouble walking and getting up and down the stairs. By the way you were kicking all the time! after that I needed to get you out. Do you know how painful that was? Man don't know how hard it is for woman to get kids. Even then you still need to raise that child. That's also hard work."

Mary wondered how much effort her mother put in raising her. It were normally servants or Nanny's who did things like put her in bath, dressing her, cared for her and everything else. Sure her mother loved her in her own way, but if Mary needed help it were the servants and Nanny's who did things for her.

"Sorry for the kicking mommy. I did't knew it."

"Ah It's all right honey. I forgive you. But you look lovely. Are you ready for the party tonight."

"I'm ready mommy. Oh do we have cake tonight?"

"Of course Honey. Would't be a party without cake."

Cake was a big weakness of Mary. She loved cake. She was addicted to it. No cake was save around her.

"The corset is a bit tight mommy." Mary said pulling a bit at her dress trying to put some less pressure on her body.

"It's a corset honey. It's suppose to be tight. You wanna look good tonight."

"Of course I do!" Mary yelled.

"That's a good girl. No can you please leave me alone. I still need to write another chapter for my book."

Mary sighed. Her mother was busy writing and around that time she had no time for her. Her father was busy planning the party. No siblings to play with. What now?
15513.title: Mary growing up

155132.content:
Mary with little to do made the short trek to the reading room to occupy herself away from her parents. The reading room contained wall-to-wall, floor-to-ceiling bookshelves. She was mostly limited to one side of the room too, where the children's books were, but she was quickly approaching an age where she would impress her parents by picking up something more difficult and educational.

Mary liked many subjects, but she had a childish weakness for animals, plants, and food. Mary automatically drifted to a small section with some older cookbooks their kitchen staff wasn't using or whatever Mary asked them to borrow, and she kept them in here. She loved the pictures of the food the best but she also picked up a surprising amount of knowledge from these books. The ingredients alone helped her practice fractions and arithmetic, as well as teaching her about plants, utensils, and other items from around the world, and so forth. This made her parents proud enough to turn around and brag to their friends about how smart Mary was, even if they weren't sure where the knowledge was coming from. The kitchen was also proud of this. They definitely knew how Mary was learning, and they were proud of it. Mary was a darling to all of the chefs.

Almost everything came back to food for the well-fed child. She saw no reason to change things up today and thumbed through her favorite cookbook. In the desserts chapters, she'd found her favorite recipe - tres leches cake - and worked on memorizing it.

It didn't take long for Mary to make herself hungry doing this. Her belly rumbled quietly. My tummy is so cute when it cries, thought Mary, idly stroking her tummy. She liked feeling hungry as long as it wasn't too extreme because next, she would stuff herself, which felt even better, and her tummy made cute noises while it was digesting, too. She thought about what she wanted and called for Lucille.

"Lucille, bring me some cake," she ordered.

"Of course," Lucille responds immediately and departs for the kitchen. Despite Lucille's warning about not indulging minutes earlier, the kind, old maid often doted on the Partington's little girl the most herself. Lucille thought of her and cared for her like the granddaughter she never had. It was hard for her to say no to Mary about much, particularly food. It was no wonder how the girl who ate till bursting so often had quite the ravenous appetite. An appetite that only grew the more Mary challenged herself, the more food she packed down, and the older she got.

Mary's eyes went big when Lucille came back with a huge slice of the milk cake that she was reading about earlier. Lucille gave her the fork. Mary was starting to get hyper like, somehow, the little butterball was going to jump in the air and scream in joy!

Lucille stopped her by pressing a finger to Mary's lips. "Be careful not to stain your clothes," she said, "and we'll keep this snack our little secret." The maid pinches Mary's cheek affectionately and leaves.

Mary wasted no time and used the fork to shovel the cake in her mouth in large pieces. Mary sighed, having practically inhaled the cake.

She patted her tummy, already fondly remembering the treat. The cake sat heavily in her tummy though, and it felt good. She wanted more of it. There was no way that one piece was going to satisfy all of the hunger in the large girl, but the party was probably soon. "Ooof, I want more," Mary whines to herself. (Just outside and peeking through the door was Lucille, who giggled quietly to herself when she heard Mary. I overestimate how long that girl can go without food, Lucille told herself as she left to do something else.)

The more Mary stroked her stomach, the more things she found that she disliked. Her tummy was taught, and not the soft puddle of goo she liked to massage. She could feel the bones and lacing holding back a wall of fluff that normally stuck out in a beautiful, big, squishy ball. It dug in so tightly, she hated it.

Mary tried to take a deep breath. The pressure only made her hurt and made the corset groan with the effort of blubber trying to escape. "Stupid thing!" said Mary, fed up with it.

Mary was grumpy and just wanted to eat her way out of this thing.
155132.title: Read a book

1551321.content:
Mary occupied herself for some time reading books and looking at pictures until it was almost time for the party. She slowly waddled downstairs. Mary was't active. With no siblings and no school friends since she did't went to a normal school Mary did't had much contact with other kids so she did't do much games with others. She mostly sat in her house on her fat lazy butt reading while wolfing down huge amounts of food. She had gotten so fat that any exercise had gotten hard for her so she did't do it.
She smiled when she saw plates with delicious treats. They looked so delicious it had been worth being hungry for some time. She licked her lips but knew she should wait. She could't start eating until the other guests arrived. That was't polite ad she had good manners like a good lady. The same reason why she wore a corset. Even while she hated it. But she dressed and acted like a good lady just like she and her parents wanted her to be.
Soon the first guests arrived. Mary polite greeted them and soon the room was full and this was the time Mary had been waiting for. She started eating. But slowly and mannered careful that she did't get any stains. While talking to everyone.

"Well I do like garlic. Of course not pure garlic but butter with garlic or garlic on vegetables tastes pretty good," Mary sad to some people.

"It also helps against those mean vampires that try to suck your blood," A man said.

"Not just vampires. Century''s ago people knew that garlic was good for keeping evil things away," A woman said.

Mary clacked with her tongue.

"Perhaps but I only knew garlic like something that helps make other stuff taste delicious. It really does. Now we even have garlic powder. We use garlic in some of our food. Gives it that extra taste."

Mary was talking with a piece of food in each hand. She liked the party but there was one thing that was a little uncomfortable for her was her corset It was really getting tight. Mom told her that a corset was suppose to be tight. That might be, but the corset started to feel very tight now. She wolfed another treat down and licked her lips.

"She's so smart. My kids don't even know what garlic is," A woman said.

"Yes she's the smartest kid I've ever seen. So polite and well mannered. A good little lady. The perfect daughter.."

"I wish I still had a daughter," A older man said.

"What happened to your daughter old chap?" A man asked.

"We were on a vacation. Like always my daughter wore a corset. We were on a high cliff and suddenly she complained she could't breath. I thought she was just being a bit silly but suddenly she froze and the next moment she fell of the cliff right on the huge sharp rocks below. She was dead the moment she hit the rocks. She was just seventeen. I still miss her every day."

Mary was so caught up in the story of the man she even stopped chewing for a moment. It seemed awful to her to lose a child. And also terrible for the parents. She decided to stay way from high cliffs. She wondered if that corset was just as tight as hers. The next moment some servants brought some cake inside. Mary stopped thinking clear. Her mouth started to water. She started stuffing the cake in her mouth even before the servants put the plate down. She almost inhaled the cake. Enjoying every bite.

Suddenly a loud ripping sound omitted across the ballroom, all eyes averted toward Mary Partington. The music came to an abrupt halt, the room fell into complete silence. Mary's dress had torn a hole at the front, her enlarged belly showing her pale global stomach. Mary at first confused looks down, blushing slightly embarrassed at this situation. Various guests look in both disgust and wonder at the young Partington heiress. All eyes staring down at her newly exposed gut sticking out.


"Oh my, such a vulgar display" An older woman whispers.

Lady Partington rushed to her daughter's predicament, standing in front of her. Trying to block Mary form the prying eyes of friends.


"Ladies and gentlemen..." Lady Partington starts nervously.

155132111.content:
"Excuse us for a moment." She said and too her daughter tight by the wrist and dragged her out of the room. After that upstairs to her room. Mary had trouble keeping up with her mother.

"Well that was great!" Her mother said sarcastic. "Mary what just happened."

"Mary looked at her with a face as red as a tomato. She did't knew exactly what to say. Her eyes were starting to get watery when she realized what the people had said. It was really hurtful. Everything had gone perfect. People saw her like perfect. The perfect daughter that everyone wanted. At least until…
She looked down at her big belly. It ripped her corset. She did't know she stuffed herself so much that her corset could't take it.

"Mary do you realize how much you embarrassed me, us. Now everyone is gonna see me as the mother with a daughter that looks like a overfed pig. Do you realize how ashamed we are now?"

Mary looked with watery eyes at her mother. She felt so embarrassed and humiliated but it did't seem like her mother was trying to comfort her. It seemed more like she was angry at her.

"But I... but I... I did't want to . I just had a few snacks and suddenly… well my belly ripped through. I'm sorry."

"Hmmm." Mumbled her mother. "It seems like you're really sorry. So now lets get you a new corset. One that does't rip after you have eaten half of all the food on the party."

"I really did't mean to mommy. I don't know how this happened."

"I know how this happened! Because you're too fat! It's because of your gluttony. That's one of the seven sins remember."

"Yes mother I know. Gluttony, sloth, greed, envy, pride, wrath and lust. Watch out for them. Wait… you're looking for another corset? Why?"

"Well for you of course. So you can continue the party."

"What? I can't go back down there. You heard all the mean things they said about me. Now they know I only look so good thanks to my corset."

"So what? Most woman there wear a corset. Only they don't eat so much it breaks. Some wear wigs. Or do really think that's their own hair? No way. But if you don't go back they have won. I'll show them our daughter can go back with her head high! No matter what has happened."

Bring her back to the facility to do weight gain related tests on her
1552.content:
It was the hight of world war 2 Hitler was raining terror all over the world and in the heart of the German occupied Poland a little girl named Anya Tłuszcz was taking her part in the resistance to stop the Nazi party and take back her mother land after her father was killed by the Nazis.
She hated the Nazis with a passion and wanted nothing more then to see the Nazis pay for there crimes.

For a young skinny girl like Anya she was a big help in the resistance as she helped bring supply's helped with plans and tactics and even got into fights with Nazis. For such a young girl she could hold her own and when she has the chance she can take a fully grown Nazi all by herself with no struggle,
The resistance thought she was a brave spirit and she became almost somewhat of a legend around Poland for her acts.
But these acts caught the eye of the Nazis too...

In a Nazi research facility a few of the Nazis were reading the paper and read about how Anya Tłuszcz helped sneak into a Nazi base and plant a bomb that killed over 50 Nazis and was a big blow to the Nazis in Poland.
A pretty blonde female Nazi officer named Kristin Klum was reading about her and said "Hey Huns look at this the resistance is making this girl named Anya Tłuszcz there poster girl isn't that sweet?

Her Nazi freind a big scary Nazi named Huns said "Errh..I cant believe that's what's in the paper now some stupid brat managed to kill are men it makes us all look like jokes..."
Kristin said "I dont know Huns I found a picture of the girl besides being a tad bit skinny she's rather cute dont you agree? she said as she showed him a picture of Anya Tłuszcz to him.

Huns said "I think she looks like a little brat that's what I think."

Yes we're gonna test the weight gain serum on you. Well we could get some books for you and some paper. Then you can read and draw a bit."

We tested this on mammals but not on a human. Maybe we react different. There are things that can cure diseases by a human but if you try to give it to a rat he goes bouncing like a soccer ball."

"So... you don't know for sure what it does?"

15522111.title: What is gonna happen

155221112.content:
"...siedemnaście...osiemnaście...diezwiętnaście...dwadzieścia."

Clank. Anya stiffened, stopped doing push-ups. What was that? she thought. She looked slowly around the room. It sounded again. Clank. Now it was very clearly the sound of a jackboot, hobnails clattering on the hard metal floor. Clank. Anya sprang up, ready to...what, exactly? Fight? She had no gun, no knife, no weapon but her own frail ten-year-old arms against a much older German. Run? She couldn't, she was in prison. At best she could give the German a little exercise. Clan-Clank. The Nazi had stopped. A single bead of sweat formed on her brow. She fancied she could hear him breathing, breathing down her neck...

...and then the clanks resumed, but quieter. The Nazi was leaving. Anya was safe.

She breathed a heavy sigh of relief, cursed quietly in Polish, and slumped to the ground.

"I have to get out of this place," she said to nobody in particular.

Just then, though, she saw it. Most people wouldn't have. It was merely a slight oddity in the pattern of the wallpaper. But Anya, who had slept in many a house on her way through Poland, knew exactly what it was.

"A vent!" she whispered excitedly to herself. "Dzięki Bogu, a vent!"

And she was right. It was, in fact, a vent; even better, one that she would fit inside. She beamed, and set to work unscrewing the cover with her thumbnail.

=======

The vent, she discovered, led to a small opening about ten feet off the ground. This would have been terrible for her had it not been for the ladder right next to it. Elated, Anya leaned out, grabbed the ladder, swung herself onto it and headed up to do a bit of reconnaissance.

The view was not a pretty one.

From her perch on the roof of the laboratory, Anya was able to see the entirety of the yard. Across the yard, though, was only one thing.

Despair.

The yard was entirely set up to be a brutal obstacle course. Many hundreds of men were running, climbing, and jumping through the course. Each time they completed it they jogged back to the beginning and went again. Surrounding the course, orchestrating the struggle, were the guards. A thin line of green surrounded the writhing mass of striped pajamas, shouting at the prisoners within to keep moving. Sometimes, the prisoners could not. One man tripped on a monkey bar and fell, unmoving, onto the stone beneath the course. A guard stepped forward, shouted something, then swung his rifle over his head and onto the head of the prisoner. Anya imagined she could hear the crunch. She winced and looked away.

The view was no better where she looked next. High walls, twenty feet at the least, surrounded the entire compound. Higher then those stood the guard towers, faceless, bristling with machine guns. And, around the perimeter, more guards, talking, smoking, and laughing as if the horrific events in the middle weren't even happening. Anya seethed with rage, but just then-

"F-Frau Obersturmbannführer!"

Anya looked down, shocked, only to see the woman and another guard...
155221112.title: A way out?

choices: After the food she's still hungry

1552211121.content:
They looked up. Right at her. She fast did a few steps back but knew it was too late. They had seen her. She could try to run but that would't do any good. It was at least six yards to the ground. If she would jump down she would most likely break some bones. Perhaps even die. The only save way of the roof was through a door. But those were locked. Even if they were't locked the came for her. She would walk straight in their arms. She sighed. This was one of her worst days ever.

A minute later some men came out the nearest door and she was picked up roughly and taken straight back to her room. A minute later Kristen walked into her room.

"Anya. I'm not easily impressed. But I'm impressed now. Escape through the vent. No one here has ever done that. None of the others would have fit in the vent but still. Well we never had a ten year old, thin girl in here of course. But that's besides the point. I'm impressed you were able to get out. Too bad you ended up on the roof. If we would't have looked up then... Well, I think you saw clearly that you could't escape. Even if can come past the guard how do you come over the wall. And do you think the guard towers are just for the view. You have no chance Anya."

Anya listened to this but she must admit that there was't a way over that wall. The only way out was through the gate. She should think of a way to do that. She looked angry at Kristen.

"Ah so that is my test subject." A voice suddenly said.

Anya and Kirsten both looked up and saw an old friendly looking man walk over to her. He smiled and put a suit case in the desk and got out a needle. He filled it with a strange liquid.

"Please do sit still. If you don't it's gonna hurt."

Anya did't listen and tried to get too the door which was locked. Kirsten looked at the two men who were busy repairing the vent.

"Could you two please hold her for a few seconds please. Be careful she's pretty strong."

It was't easy but after some time they were able to hold Tanya still for a moment and give her a injection.

"So. That was all. That was't so hard no was it?" He said and smiled.

Anya's stomach suddenly started to rumble. She now realized how hungry she was. She had been so occupied with the fact she was captured she did't put much attention to it but now she noticed it.

"Ah you're hungry. That's good. You get a delicious meal." The old man said.

"I bet it's full of poison." Anya said snappish.

"Oh no. It's not. Believe me. I need to see how your body reacts to the serum. You're no use to me when your dead. That would be a waste."

Anya looked at the the men who were busy with the vent. She saw they made sure she would'be able to escape through that vent again. Well that did't matter. She would end up on the roof again. From there she could't escape.
She was thinking when suddenly a man walked in with a huge plate filled with food. Delicious looking food. It also smelled delicious.

"Well Anya. Go ahead eat." Kristin said. "I will visit you later."

Kristin the old man and the men who were done repairing the vent walked out and left Anya alone.
Anya doubted for a few seconds. But she was hungry, and the old man was right she would't be any use to them dead and besides that it all looked and smelled so good. After one bite she must admit that it also tasted good.
Anya had't been able to eat much food lately. She could't be picky and ate what she could get. But that was't as tasty as this..

"Well I'm locked in here anyway. I might as well eat the food while I'm here." She said to herself and started to stuff her face. It had been a long time ago since she had a tasty decent meal.

1552211122.content:
"F-Frau Obersturmbannführerin!"

Anya, startled by the noise, peeked over the edge of the roof. Below, she saw one soldier saluting- clearly, the one who had spoken. He was saluting the woman from earlier, who, in the company of another soldier, appeared to be...leaving? Yes, thought Anya to herself, as she watched the two get into a staff car and drive out the gates, yes, they're leaving! I can find my way out!

And so, with typical Polish pluck, she jumped off the roof and landed on the nervous soldier's head.

The fight that commenced was totally unfair...for the German. Anya had experience and surprise on her side, so it was no great shock that within two minutes the German was dead at her feet, throat slashed with his own bayonet. Unfortunately, the only gun he was equipped with was a rifle, a gun far too heavy for Anya to sneak around with, so she stuck the bayonet in her belt and padded softly away.

Hours passed. At four, the prisoners were taken off the obstacle course; at six, half the guards went for dinner, and the rest ushered the prisoners to their barracks. Through all this, the little Polish girl snuck through the camp, slowly and quietly making note of entrances, exits, guard routes and gun nests. By seven, she was sure she had a complete picture of the camp.

And what a depressing picture it was.

There were only two gates, and both of them were watched at all times by constantly-manned machine guns. The walls were the same height-too high- throughout the camp, and the tops of these were studded with bits of glass and barbed wire to prevent any hope of climbing over. There was a small hole, partially covered by a bush, at the supreme northeastern end of the camp, but Anya was almost certain it was a trap, designed to give a slight hope of escape and then take it away in an instant. From her refuge beneath Barrack 23, Anya was certain it could not get any worse.

Then the sirens went off.

"Kurwa!" swore Anya quietly. "They must have found the guard!"

The camp, formerly still and quiet in the night, erupted into activity. Jackboots pounded on the hard dirt of the well-trodden field. Above her, the prisoners stirred into confused action, murmered whispers of various languages and the shuffling of feet muffling her hearing. Searchlights, bright and powerful, snapped on, sweeping the camp. In another barrack, a shot- perhaps it wasn't her they were looking for? Somewhere else, a motor roared to life. Anya clutched the grass and prayed to God.

155331.content:
The sun was shining. It was a nice day with a bright blue sky. It was warm. It had been pretty warm the past weeks. In the green fields you could hear crickets and fruit started to grow. It was a nice time for everybody.
On the dusty road came some heavy footsteps of a girl with a stuffed look. She played a bit with her hair while she walked further through the fields. She ignored the sound of the crickets. She did't cared so much about crickets. She stopped when she saw the first houses of a village.
Slowly she walked closer. She could see the people. The kids and adults seemed to be doing great. They looked well fed. Not fat or chubby but not starved like in some other villages. Further she saw a castle. Perhaps the home of a count. But looking at this people he took good care of them. Better then some others. Some had no trouble killing people on their land. She walked further but kept hidden around corners and in the shadow. Trying to keep a low profile. But her belly let out a loud growl.

"Hee. Something here smells good." She said and sniffed.

The delicious smell came from a nearby open window with a pie cooling on the windowsill. Jessica licked her lips. But she knew she needed to be careful. Just taking the pie would be stupid. That was what amateurs would do. First you need to be sure no one was looking. Be sure whoever was inside would't see you taking the pie, and be sure it was easy to get away. But Jessica knew exactly how she needed to do this. She had done this many times.
She walked closer to the window. The other people were around the corner. She looked inside. The kitchen was empty. But be careful. There was always a chance somebody would come in. She looked over her shoulder. It was a short distance from here to the forest. She looked one more second inside. The next moment she grabbed the pie and ran straight into the forest. Some further she stopped too catch her breath.

"I hope this pie was worth this." She mumbled to herself.

The next moment she buried her head in the pie and started eating like a starved animal. Soon the entire pie was gone in her round belly except was was on her face. With a chubby finger she rubbed the remains of her face. Afterward she licked her finger clean and burped loudly.

"That was delicious. apricot stuffing I believe. I think I stay here for a while. The people here seem to have it okay. They would mind If I take some food."

Jessica knew very well that the people would mind. More then once she saw how angry people were. But that was't her fault. She was abandon by the age of 5. What else could she do. At least this way she was able to get food. She was always a hungry and fat girl. Her belly was round and needed a lot of food to become full. Jessica liked her big belly. She thought it looked beautiful and some other people thought that too. Some people even thought she was pregnant. But that was silly. She never had a boyfriend. Leave alone had sex with a boy. She was't interested at boys. However she once heard that there was a time she would be interested in boys. She decided to think about that when it was that time.
However since some people thought she was pregnant they were nice to her. Thinking they need to take care of her and her baby. giving her food.
But she could never stay long at one place. It they found out she was't really pregnant but just fat and stole food she would be in big trouble. She knew that too. But she only stole from people who could miss it. She never stole from poor people. That would be just wrong. They hardly had any food at all. No but the rich people. Counts and dukes. Those people were sometimes so fat that their butt hang of the edges of their chair. They could easily miss some food. The people in this village seemed to have enough food. Else you could't make a pie.
She rubbed her round belly. She was still hungry. She could look for more food in the village. But she could also go to the castle.
155331.title: Pie thief

choices: Knocked On The Door, Wanting Sympathy
1553311.content:
Jessica decided that it was better for her to start in the village before hitting the castle. Maybe she could get some sympathy from the villagers before they discovered her rounded middle was nothing more than a well-fed ball of fat. Besides, if the Count or Duke or whoever ruled this village discovered her deception first, she would be chased out of the village quite quickly.

Like before, Jessica stocked the village with the stealth and cunning that had kept her little fat girl tummy so well fed. She kept to the shadows and tiptoed as lightly as she could. It was actually quite impressive just how little noise the overweight 9 year old made.

However, the silence was quickly dashed as her tummy rumbled again. She looked around in fear but was relieved to see no one noticed her. She rubbed over her gut, trying to sooth it's cries for more food. She knew she couldn't be mad at her tummy though. After all, the smell of an evening meal cooking was enough to coax her hungry tummy to speak up.

She followed her nose and quickly came upon a house that looked like it was inhabited by an elderly woman. She peeked through the window and could also she had ample food over the fire. Surely, she wouldn't miss a little now would she?

Jessica smiled deviously and licked her lips before she...
1553311.title: She looks for more food in the village

choices: Waking up for a midnight snack
15533112.content:
Knocked on the door. Perhaps the people inside would give her food. That was easier then taking it. Besides when she started taking food they very fast found out she had done it. Being only 9 years old she could mostly get away with it. Besides it was only some food. She was't a cold hearted criminal. If she would have been abandoned she would probably never became a criminal. She was pretty nice but she just needed to fill her belly.
An old woman opened the door. her hair was gray tight together in a knot. A wrinkly but friendly face. She wore a long black dress and walked with a stick. She smiled friendly.

"Hello there." She said friendly and squinted her eyes a bit. "You're not from around here, am I right."

"Eh... that's right. I just arrived."

"All alone." She asked surprised. "Without your parents?"

"I don't have any parents." Jessica said. "Could I maybe have some food I'm starving."

"Oh my dear child. Please come in. Of course you can have some food. I will make something for you."

"Do you live alone?" Jessica asked.

"No. Of course not. I have Silver an Ruby to keep me company."

Jessica saw two cats lying in the last rays of sun. She smiled. She liked cats. God (if he existed) made them perfect hunters. Just like she hunted for food.

"I also have four chickens for eggs, and two goats for milk but their now in the barn. I also have about a dozen of bats around there."

"Bats? Are they from you? And you keep them with the other animals? Are't you scared the suck the blood of your animals."

"Oh my dear child. To answer your questions, they're not my pets but the stay in the barn. They stay there with my other animals but mostly they're away during they night. They don't suck blood. At least not this ones. Those eat insects. I like them because they eat insects that could harm or hurt my animals... or me. I hate gnat's."

Jessica looked surprised. She really need to think again about those animals.

"You wait here. I'll make something for you."

Jessica went sitting next to the cats and started to stroke one. The cat got up on his feet and went sitting on her lap a started to purr. She liked that and did't noticed how long she did until she heard: "Dinner is ready."

She waddled to the table and was surprised. A big pan filled with baked potatoes. A huge bowl filled with salad, cheese, cucumbers, tomatoes, boiled eggs, and a lot of dressing. And two roast chickens. Her mouth started to water.

"Take as much if you like sweet hart." The woman said.

Jessica did't need to be told twice. She started to eat. On her own she mostly ate like a pig. But when she was among other people she started to eat polite with a knife and fork. However the woman was surprised how much food the girl put on her plate and how all the food ended up in the little girls big tummy. She was doubting when she first saw her but seeing how much she consumed she knew for sure her big tummy was't because she was pregnant. Not that she cared. She would't have treated her otherwise.

"I have a guest bedroom behind that door over there. You can sleep there if you like."

"That would be nice. Thank you." Jessica said.

She waddled over to the room and undressed. She crept under the blanket. As soon if her head hit the pillow she was out like a light.
15533112.title: A lot of sympathy

choices: Jessica Eats Everything In The Kitchen
The Old Woman Wakes Up Before She Finishes
155331122.content:
Jessica slept with a smile on her face. It had been a while since she got to sleep in an actual bed. However, that was only partially why she smiled. The other reason was that she had a nice full tummy. Nothing made Jessica more delighted than having her tummy filled to the brim with food...well almost filled to the brim.

Jessica's plump rounded middle let out a growl as the 9 year old woke out of her sleep. She looked down at the great bump, which like the rest of her body, was covered by her blankets. She gave it a pat and knew it was time for a midnight snack.

The little girl quickly got her clothes on and snuck out of her room to see the old woman soundly asleep in her chair. She wasn't going to wake her as she headed towards the kitchen. The hungry fat kid was delighted to see lots of food laying out.

"She won't mind if I have just a nice little snack." Jessica said as she licked her lips and rubbed her big tummy.

Of course, with Jessica, a "little snack" meant eating everything in the kitchen. After all, this woman seemed to have a lot of food. She wouldn't go starving because of her.
155331122.title: Waking up for a midnight snack

choices: If you want to leave you're free to go
1553311222.content:
Jessica started to stuff her face. No one saw her so why bother to show manners. She was hungry and the only thing she cared about now was getting food in her huge belly. She just wanted to eat. Some leftover potatoes, a whole bread, some cheese a bottle of milk.
She looked in a pan to see what was in it, but it accidentally fell on the floor. There was nothing in it She grabbed a drumstick and scraped the meat of it when she suddenly heard a voice.

"Are you still hungry?"

Jessica looked around and saw the old woman she was a bit scared but relieved when she saw the old woman still looked very friendly.

"I got hungry and just wanted a midnight snack." Jessica said trying to look sweet.

"Even after that huge dinner you're still hungry for more?" The old woman said surprised. "Well I now know for sure that that belly is full of food am I right?"

Jessica sighed. She might as well tell this woman the truth. After all she did't want to lie. Besides she did't really lied to her, she just did't told everything. That was different.

"Yeah there's no baby in here. Well perhaps a food baby. No I'm just fat. But I'm all alone. I have no parents. I have no home, no one who takes care of me. I just go from village to village and steal some food. But I don't steal from poor people. Only people who can afford it to miss it. Mostly counts and dukes and... well the people here seemed to have enough food."

"So you are a little criminal." The woman said.

"I don't steal money! I only steal food to feed my hungry tummy. And only people who can it afford to miss some food. I admit I sometimes use my belly to act like I'm pregnant to get food, and sympathy, and get out of trouble. But I can never stay long on one place or else they find out I'm not really pregnant. I'm not proud at it but what can I do? I'm just a little kid. If I would't steal I would starve."

"Yeah I understand." The woman said friendly. "You did't had much choice. You have a big belly to fill."

"You bet." Jessica said with full mouth.

"Well...
1553311222.title: A food baby

15533112222.content:
"Well child, if you wish to go free you can." The old woman told her as she walked over to the tubby little girl.

Jessica paused from sucking the last meat off her drumstick and looked back at the older woman.

"Really? Y-You're going to let me go?" She asked her.

The older woman sighed and replied to her,

"Yes. I know how hard the world is for an orphan. However, you best not remain in this town. I won't be so lenient if I hear you stealing food from any of our township's people." She told her, being quite stern with that last part.

Jessica gulped at the same time she swallowed her mouthful of food as the old woman told her this. However, she nodded and knew she'd have to move on quite soon. Hopefully, though, not before getting her tummy filled. She looked over the remaining food then back over at the old woman, wondering what she would do if she ate more.

The old woman gave Jessica a little nod and the tubby girl quickly began to dig in with renewed gusto.
15533112222.title: If you want to leave you're free to go

choices: Look for a place to spend the night
155331122222.content:
The next morning Jessica woke up in a bed. She rubbed the sleep out of her eyes. She suddenly remembered what happened last night. As far if she remembered she ate about everything in the kitchen before waddling back to her bed. thinking about food made her well... to be honest, the feast from tonight filled her up pretty good. She was't exactly hungry but she could eat something. She got out of bed and got dressed and waddled out.

"Oh great you're up." A friendly voice said.

Jessica saw the old lady looking friendly at her. With next to her a plate with some sandwiches on it. Jessica looked at the sandwiches and almost drooled.

"Are those... eh... those for me?" Jessica asked.

"Well since I thought you're leaving today I can at least let you go with a full tummy. It's almost midday you know. Then you don't have to steal food from any of my neighbors. They're my friends you know."

"Thank you so much. But how were you able to make these? I thought I ate everything."

"I did some grocery shopping this morning. What are you going to do now?"

"I don't know really. Where's the nearest village?"

"That way." The old lady said and pointed into the direction from the village she came from.

"Right. After that one." Jessica asked.

"Well there's a village over there. Over that mountain. But it might take a few days to get over there."

Jessica let her head hung. It promised to be a lot of hard work. But suddenly she remembered the castle. Perhaps she could steal some food from there, and get some food for in her backpack. Then she could eat something in those day's it took to walk mover the mountain. That was her best choice.

"I guess I go to that village. They already know me in the other one... and we were't really friends." Jessica said and wolfed down the last sandwich. "Thank you so much for every thing." Jessica said.

"Anytime sweethart."

Outside Jessica was wondering what to do first. She could go to the castle and look for food but at the other hand her tummy was full now. Perhaps she could better look for a place to sleep and go tomorrow to the castle to take some food and the leave. In the forest she could find some now and then a small house used by hunters. Jessica became pretty good at opening locks. However she only used them to sleep. She did't steal anything. However if there was food inside it would disappear in her stomach..

"Hmmm. Look for food in the castle.... or go look for a place to stay tonight. I could go already try to get over the mountain but without food that's going to be very hard."
155331122222.title: Where do I go from here?

choices: Coast Was Clear, Start Getting Food
Place Was Well Guarded, Head For The Hills
1553311222221.content:
Jessica was torn. Normally, she'd be overjoyed with the idea of sneaking into the castle and gorging her greedy, fat kid, tummy on everything she could get her hands on. The royals were rich after all and always had tons of food laying around.

On the other hand, she did promise the elderly woman she wouldn't steal anymore from the townspeople. She might have been a thief, and a gluttonous one at that, but she was a girl of her word...well sometimes anyways. However, she wasn't sure if the woman would care if the royals lost some food. Jessica was pretty sure she was referring more to the surfs in the township as opposed to their royalty.

Jessica finally decided that taking a quick peek in the castle wouldn't hurt. Despite the size of her tummy, and despite the fact that it was midday, Jessica was able to move with expert stealth throughout the town. She didn't want to be noticed by anyone else.

It took her a little while. However, she soon reached the castle on the edge of the township and waddled her way up to one of its windows. She peered inside with hungry eyes and noticed that the...
1553311222221.title: Go to the castele

15533112222211.content:
There was no one there. But something else was there. Food! Lot's of food. This was without a doubt the kitchen. Her tummy might be full but she knew very well that it would't be full for long. This opportunity was too good too pass. Soon she climbed inside

"Wow. What a fantastic kitchen."

Jessica had seen many kitchens in her short life. A lot of great kitchens from the royalty. Beautiful big kitchens. But this was without a doubt one of the best. Ovens, stews, knifes, pans. All stuff to make everything but Jessica did't cared about that. But she did care about the food. Only the food.

"This is fantastic. I can fill my backpack now and then go over the mountain. Yeah that's a good idea."

She started to fill her backpack. Breads, cheese, dried meat, fruit, even some vegetables. She was't a big fan of vegetables but a few were't so bad. She filled her backpack to the brim. She was almost having trouble picking it up. But the she heard something. Footsteps. All those times stealing she learned you need to be careful if you heard something. Fast she hide behind some barrels with potatoes. She looked through a tiny hole between the barrels. First person who cane in was a cook. The next person was a tall, muscled man with long dark hair. Probably the duke or something.
The she heard some more heavy footsteps. Her mouth fell open. She knew she was fat. She was aware of that. But this girl was even fatter then her. She wore a very expansive dress. She was about the same age as Jessica and had yellow blond hair and was very fat. Her upper arms were like pillows. Her cheeks were so bowl and pink you thought she had stuffed a tomato in each of them. Fer thighs had rolls of fat of their own rubbing if she waddled. Her butt looked like two watermelons but her belly was the biggest. Hanging to her knees with two boobs on top of it. Jessica had those too. Just fat of course but still... a nice start ahead on getting the real ones.

"I WANT FOOD DADDY! i'M HUNGRYYYYYY!!!! I WANT MORE FOOD!!! I'M STARVING!!! GIVE ME FOOOOOOOD!!!" The fat girl shouted at the top of her lungs.

"Wow what a spoiled brat." Jessica thought.

"Of course honey. Take what you like." The man said.

The girl started to stuff her face with everything edible in the kitchen. Jessica thought she was more a pig then a girl. Lucky her backpack was full. But now she needed to get out. Perhaps it was the best to wait. Hopefully they would go soon.
15533112222211.title: Plunder the kitchen

choices: Decided To Eat What She Had Packed
155331122222111.content:
Jessica watched in anxious amazement as the extra fat child worked her way through the kitchen. She knew she probably shouldn't being doing this and looking for a way out of the castle. However, the spectacle before her was to shocking to look away from.

The obese 10 year old ate like no one Jessica had seen before. As fast as her flabby arms could manage, the duke's daughter gobbled up the kitchen's food like it was nothing. Entire platefuls disappeared in mere seconds. Large pies were eaten down in one or two bites and at one point, Jessica thought she saw the obese child gobble down a ham whole!

This display went on for quite a while. Jessica could even see the obese kid's stomach growing through her dress. The daughter was just about to come over to where Jessica was when she paused in her eating. She lifted her head and yelled out one of her servants,

"I have to go to the bathroom! Take me there now!" The food-stained child demanded, her servant quickly helping her out of the kitchen and down the hallway.

Jessica knew this would be her only chance. The plump 9 year old grabbed her overstuffed backpack and very large pie before she wiggled her way out of the window. She happily munched on the stolen treat as she headed for the mountains, a little eager to stuff her own face now too.

After a short walk Jessica began to get hungry again. True, she wasn't as fat as the duke's daughter, but she was still a gluttonous child. The hungry little girl quickly...
155331122222111.title: She escapes

1553311222221111.content:
She looked at the food in her bag. Part of her brain told her not to eat and save some for later. But something else told her to eat. You're hungry so eat! eat! EAT!!! That part of her was stronger then the part to tell her to save some food. But while she was busy eating she was walking up the mountain. She told herself she needed the strength.

"This is gonna be a long walk." She mumbled with full mouth.

She thought a moment about that fat daughter. Jessica was't stupid. She knew very well she was fat. She was kind of proud at it and thought it looked beautiful. But that daughter was even fatter then her. She never saw such a fat child. But also she was eating like a total pig. Jessica also sometimes let herself go but not like that. That girl had never heard about table manners. There was just on thing in her head. Eat! But also she acted like a spoiled brat. She did't seem to care about anyone except herself.
She knew she also stole food from people. Perhaps that was't nice but she did't had much choice. Living on her own, without someone to take care of you.
But she did't acted like a brat. Apart from stealing food she thought she was pretty nice. Besides she normally only stole food from people who could miss it.
She looked up at the mountain.

"I sure hope I can find some food up there."

The wind started to get stronger. Jessica looked up at the sky and hoped it would't start to rain. She started to walk faster. It was still early but in her head she started to worry to what to do if it became dark. Was there perhaps a village at the top of the mountain. The woman did't said anything about that. but who knew. perhaps there was. Even only a couple of houses were fine. As long if there was food she was fine with it.
She walked further and further up the mountain. Her feet hurt but she was used to that. She walked often long distances and knew that as long if you kept walking it did't hurt that much. Besides she had a long way to go.

Some time later she wanted to grab some food bet felt a empty bag. She looked inside. The bag was empty. Had she eaten all the food. Now she felt how full her belly was she believed it. Why did she ate all the food. She could have easily saved some food. Especially since she took so much food. She really did't thought clearly when she started eating. What now. Well she could't go back. And with that girl around she did't thought there would be much food left.
She walked further and further and it was getting dark. It was also starting to get colder.. Jessica felt goosebumps over her arms while she walked further.
1553311222221111.title: Up the mountain

choices: Wait For The Family To Finish
15533112222211111.content:
Jessica was starting to get worried. She had been in the mountains many times before so she was used to the cold weather and rocky terrain. However, the sun was really beginning to set now and the air was growing colder by the second. Worse yet, the wind was starting to pick up. The 9 year old knew this was a very bad combination. True, her blubber did offer her some insulation but her clothes were not suited for a long stay in the mountains.

The poor little plumper was considering turning back and taking her chances in the town below when she saw it. There was a cottage not too far from where she was. Jessica smiled as she could get some clothes, shelter and most importantly more food for her greedy fat-kid tummy.

It didn't take long for the chilled child to sneak up to one of the windows and peer inside. The home was fairly modest and she could see a family just sitting down for their evening meal. A mother, father and two children, a boy and girl slightly younger than her. She could also tell from the muscled, no-nonsense, hunter father that this wasn't a place she wanted to announce her presence like she had with the old lady.

Jessica grinned a little deviously as knew she would have to sneak food this time. She...
15533112222211111.title: She sees a light

choices: One of the kids finds her
155331122222111112.content:
Her belly rumbled. She decided to look for some food right away. If she used the front door they would without a doubt see her. But there might be a back door. She waddled too behind the house and opened a door a bit. Behind it was dark and she walked inside. She let her eyes got used to the dark and after that opened her eyes wide.

"Jackpot." she whispered.

She saw several boxes filled with fruit or vegetables. She also saw a few skinned animals hanging from the sealing. She licked her lips. This seemed to be a pantry. She also saw some cans and looked in it a saw they contained milk. She even saw some eggs.

"Well I won't starve here." Jessica said.

She started eating an apple. Followed by some grapes. Who were fast followed by some plums and some apricots. She also ate some carrots, tomatoes, cucumbers and even a entire union. She let out a small burp afraid anyone might hear her.
She looked at the animals at the sealing. She would like to eat some meat but she knew that raw meat was dangerous. You could get really sick. She did't think this people would help her if she did get sick. But she looked a bit further and them she smiled. She saw smoked meat. That you could eat without having to worry to get sick. So she did. She drank milk from one of the cans. This was fantastic. She could really ate here so she ate her belly round. Fruits vegetables, smoked meat and fish. A lot of those things found their way to her belly. Finally with a belly swollen and bloated because of so much food inside it she felt full.
After that she looked at the food and knew she needed to do one more thing. She filled her backpack with food. She needed to be careful not to eat it all. She could eat some of the food here for breakfast. But she needed to have food for dinner tomorrow and breakfast the day after tomorrow. Perhaps she would find another house, but she could't be sure about that.
She leaned against the wall and noticed the wall was warm. She then knew why. It was the chimney. She saw a sheet and some bags. She used the bags to make some kind of mattress. She curled up against the chimney and closed her eyes and was soon gone to dreamland while her belly digested her huge meal.
155331122222111112.title: A feast

choices: A Village Just Out Of The Mountains
1553311222221111121.content:
Jessica slept pretty soundly with such a big full belly. The 9 year old was delighted to be so stuffed. She even smiled in her sleep while she absently rubbed over her bulging middle as she snored away.

Her stomach, which was already quite large, had grown a few inches from her most recent stuffing. Round but still soft to the touch, the 9 year old girl's stomach rose into the air like a great pale mountain covered by the sheet she found earlier. The food-filled dome surged and fell with each snore she took. Oh, how much fun it was for Jessica to have a full tummy!

The child slowly awoke as sunlight hit her face. It was now morning and the air, although still somewhat cool, was beginning to heat up. She slowly stretched out causing her big tummy to jut out even further. She grinned at this and patted her middle before she threw off the sheet and prepared to move on.

She slowly grabbed her backpack and brushed down her hair a little, wanting to look presentable in case she came across someone and needed her charm to get out of a situation...or into a kitchen. Giving one last look at the house that had been so good to her greedy fat-kid tummy, she took off looking for a place where she could have an even more filling breakfast.

It didn't take her too long to find...
1553311222221111121.title: Tomorrow morning

15533112222211111211.content:
...Another house. She looked through the window. She saw nobody inside. Careful she pushed against the door. It was locked. But then she saw a window. it was open. Not wide but it was open. She opened the window further and squeezed her fat body inside.
She had been right. No one was inside. But the stuff was clean. So she knew at least one person lived here. But were was he or she? Maybe still asleep. Or out. If the person was asleep he or she could wake up any second. If he or she was out she had hours of time. Her belly rumbled. She did had a backpack full of food but she wanted to use that for dinner and breakfast tomorrow. But perhaps there was some food here. She looked around and saw a whole bread. She grabbed it and pushed it inside her mouth and started chewing. Soon the entire bread disappeared in her stomach.

"BUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!! Oops. Excuse me. Wait what am I doing. I'm alone here. At least..."

She listened carefully. If there was somebody asleep here that belch probably woke them up. She listened carefully. But still heard nothing. She looked in the closets and found a box with some cookies she wolfed down. There was a bowl at table with some fruit that also was fast devoured and joined by a bottle of milk and big piece of cheese.

"That tasted good. But still I wonder who lives here."

Then she saw something out of a corner of her eye. It was a jar of honey. She tasted honey before. To her... it was fantastic. So sweet and soft. She loved honey but hardly had a chance to eat it.
She stretched out her hand to the jar but it was just out of her reach. But that did't stop her. She shove the stool over to the counter. Climbed up on the chair and grabbed the honey jar. She brought it to her lips and poured the sweet sticky stuff right into her mouth. After that she scraped with her finger the last honey out. She did't want too waste a single drop.

"That was a good breakfast. Should I go now or should I look for more food?"

She looked around and listened carefully.
She did eat enough for now but she could eat more and she also knew that she soon would be hungry again. She was thinking and then...
15533112222211111211.title: Breakfast is the most important meal of the day

155331122222111112112.content:
It was then Jessica noticed the door to the cellar. It seemed who ever owned the home needed a nice cool place to store things...maybe tasty food things. Needless to say, Jessica became very excited by that idea!

The tubby 9 year old smiled and sneakily opened the cellar door. After all, she wasn't sure if someone was down there and didn't want to get caught in her binging. Fortunately, she was alone but still tried to move down the wooden staircase with stealth, the plump child's well fed tummy causing the poor stairs to creak and groan under her weight despite her efforts.

When she reached the bottom of the cellar her eyes lit up. There were meats and cheeses lining every wall and even bottles of drink peppered throughout the room. Jessica's greedy fat kid tummy rumbled at the sight and she couldn't help but lick her lips.

A slightly devious grin came across her face as she waddled over and began to stuff herself on the first thing she could find, which was a large...
155331122222111112112.title: Noticed something else

1553311222221111121121.content:
...wheel of cheese. She took it in both hands and started taking big bites of it. Chewing loudly. The cheese tasted terrific. When the entire chhese was gone she took one of the bottles. She unscrewed the cap and took a sip and spit it out.

"Yuck what's this?" She asked and looked at the bottle.

She did't had a clue what it said since she never learned to read. However she knew the smell and taste. It was wine. She knew many people stored wine in the cellar. The person who lived here was no exception. Then she saw a few other bottles with some bright colors. She unscrewed the fist one and smelled. Just fruit juice. She fast started drinking trying to rid of the taste of the wine.

"Hmmm, What now. I really should starting to walk but... there's so much food here. perhaps just a small..."

Suddenly she did't think anymore. She just started to eat. She stuffed cheese and meat inside her mouth. Not eating. She ripped pieces of it like a starved animal. Chewing it like if she was starved. She did't thought clear anymore.
She kept eating until she suddenly woke up by a RIIIIIP!!! sound. She knew exactly what was going on She looked down and saw her shirt ripped. Well the underside until just beneath her chest. Sure this was't the first time a piece of clothing of her ripped. But now she could use a new one. Stealing food was on thing, but clothes...

"Well I just need one shirt..." She mumbled.

She took a look at what was gone.

"Did I eat all that? Well I must admit my tummy is full now. But I really do need a new shirt."

Finding fitting clothes was difficult. But mostly she just took clothes for teens or adults and cut of or rolled up the ends. They fitted around her tummy. She waddled upstairs. Still she tried to don't make a sound. But going downstairs she did't succeed and now going upstairs with even more weight was just as impossible. She walked to the stairs and hoped no one was home. But if there was they must be deaf or a really, very, very, very, deep sleeper.
She came upstairs and opened one door.

"Yeah. Great."

It was a bedroom of a man and woman. At least the bed was big enough for two people. She looked in a closet and found some shirts. She tried them on until she found one that looked nice, and most important fit around her tummy.

"Now I really need to go."

She decided to take her torn shirt anyway. Downstairs she grabbed her backpack. She put her hand on the door knob when....
1553311222221111121121.title: Ripped shirt

choices: A supernatural appetite and capacity to her stomach.
Whenever she steals food, she will be punished with the curse.
She will physically change regardless of her actions.
15533112223.content:
The old woman gave Jessica a discerning look, looking her over like a person checking the condition of an animal. A mischievous thought entered the old woman’s mind and she gave a wry smile. The woman calmly approached Jessica, making her slightly nervous as the woman started to rub her belly affectionately. “So, you’re a little thief and a shameless glutton, who uses your belly to get sympathy, acting like you’re with child, eh. The old woman said, cocking her eyebrow and giving Jessica an insulting sneer. Jessica pouted, and frowned at the woman, feeling the need to defend her reputation. “I told you, I only steal so I don’t starve.” Jessica yelped as she crossed her arms with a huff. “I like little gluttons like you.” The old woman said before she gave Jessica’s stuffed belly a painful poke with her bony finger.

“Ouch, what was that for lady?” Jessica asked backing away from the old woman, cradling her sore belly. “Just a little gift dearie, a curse actually, you see I’m not just any old lady, I’m a witch.” The old woman explained, Jessica panicked as she realized how much trouble she was in. “I’ll tell everyone you’re a witch.” Jessica said pointing accusingly at the old lady, who merely laughed at Jessica’s idle threat. “If you spill the beans, I’ll tell them you’re the little burglar that has been stealing food from around the kingdom.” The Old lady said with a smirk, the confidence drained from Jessica as she realized she didn’t have any leverage against the old witch. “I hope you enjoy my little curse, I’m sure it will get you lots of sympathy.” The old witch said with a sinister chuckle. Jessica looked at her little potbelly with a new found fear, only now realizing what the witch had said about cursing her. Not knowing what else to do, she fled from the old woman’s house in the middle of the night, running as far as her legs would carry her. She finally stopped running miles away from the village and plopped down under a tree and went to sleep the pain from the witch’s poke a slowly fading throbbing in her belly.

How will the curse affect her?
15533112223.title: A Witch's Curse.

choices: She decides to stay for a while.
She decides to escape before things get weirder.
155331122233.content:
When she finally awoke the next morning she was starving, her midnight snack having digested from her panicked flight. As Jessica groggily stood up and stretched, she noticed that her clothes still felt tight. Looking down she noticed a bulge in her dress, her pot belly still looking like she had a sizeable food baby. She examined her belly quizzically, the bump stuck out a few inches making her look like she had swallowed a small melon. She went over to a nearby brook and looked at her reflection in the water. She pulled down her dress, frowning at the way her belly stuck out. As she continued examining her reflection something worrying happened. Right before her eyes, her stomach swelled slightly larger. “Ahh, what just happened.” She squeaked exploring her middle nervously. Not knowing what to do and still feeling very hungry she ignored her worries and headed into the village.

As she skulked around the village, she noticed a couple was preparing a feast for a family gathering. Delicious roast, aromatic soup, ripe succulent vegetables, the food made her mouth water. She snuck up while the couple were chatting, and reached over the table to snatch a piece of roast. She didn’t notice until it was too late however that her bulging belly knocked over a tankard alerting the couple. “Hey, what are you doing over there, child.” The couple came over to confront her and Jessica recoiled in fear and instinctively started acting all sweet and innocent. “I’m sorry sir and madame I just so hungry, I was wondering if you could spare some food.” She said in an annoyingly cute way as she rubbed her belly.

The couple glared at her suspiciously but then their focus shifted to her round middle. As they stared at it their angry expressions softened until they became warm smile. “What a cute little child, she must be starving.” The wife said rubbing Jessica’s tummy, the action leaving Jessica confused. “No child should starve in this village, help yourself.” The husband said, the wife continued. “You know I would have loved to have a sweet little daughter like you.” The wife said playfully pinching Jessica’s cheek, which made Jessica blush. “Just look at you, you’re so skinny.” The wife said grabbing hold of Jessica’s round tum. When she said that Jessica paused, they’ll were joking right she didn’t look skinny at all. The ushered Jessica to a seat and started offering her food. Jessica was confused but gladly accepted their offering scarfing down the delicious meals as the couple affectionately fawned over her slowly growing stomach.

This morning Jessica had a round belly that rivaled that of a woman entering her second trimester, comparatively looking about five months pregnant compared to her small size. As she greedily ate the couple’s food, her stomach filled up and out, it started to look like she was seven months pregnant, very round and full. By the fourth plate Jessica started to feel full but the couple didn’t have any intention of stopping. “Thank you for your kindness but I don’t think I should eat anymore.” Jessica told the couple. “Nonsense you’re still so thin.” The wife cried making Jessica a little worried, she thought fast and put on her act again. “But I’m really sleepy.” She said in another sickeningly sweet way. “Oh, of course you poor thing.” The wife said and the couple helped Jessica up with some effort and lead her inside. Jessica found that it was more difficult to move around, her heavy belly causing her to awkwardly waddle.

She laid down in the bed and waited for the couple to leave. She knew something weird was going on. The couple seemingly wanting to fatten her up. Did this have something to do with that witch’s curse, she wondered.
155331122233.title: She will physically change regardless of her ac...

choices: She has another encounter with the old witch.
She has an encounter with a new stranger.
1553311222332.content:
Feeling like something worrying was going on, Jessica decided to make a break for it. She waddled over the window and opened it. She attempted to slide through but her round belly gave her a bit of trouble. She got stuck for a moment before falling out the window and painfully landing on the ground. She woozily waddled away quietly escaping from the affectionate couple. She wandered around town rubbing her tummy in satisfaction. As she walked about the village the smells of food being cooked all around the town distracted her. She became entranced with a certain smell and unknowingly followed her nose to a man cooking some savory mutton. “Hey there child, care for a taste.” The burly man cried snapping Jessica out of her blissful trance. She looked around seeing food vendors all around her, the man that called to her offering her a leg of mutton. Jessica was about to object when she noticed she felt a bit puckish, which surprised her given her current feast. “Well maybe one wouldn’t hurt.” She said to herself.

After she ate the delicious mutton, she wandered around the market place another vendor offering her more food. That one snack soon became many more as she waddled around the stalls. People would offer her food and she would gladly take it, happily eating as people would occasionally rub her growing gut. Meal after meal was offered to her, and as consumed more than anyone her size should be able to. Her stomach grew and grew until she looked at term, heavy with child if she were pregnant. Getting tired of waddling around Jessica took a seat on a bench so she could eat her food. When someone unexpected approaches her.
1553311222332.title: She decides to escape before things get weirder.

choices: Jessica tries to resist growing from the tempting adoration of people.
Jessica stubbornly defying the witch’s intentions relishes in the growth.
15533112223321.content:
Jessica was sitting on a bench scarfing down the gifts of food from the vendors, her stomach swollen from her feasting. Her belly looking like it belonged to a woman nearing the end of her pregnancy. Which wasn’t quite as large as it seemed given her small size. “Enjoying yourself.” A familiar voice asked startling the swollen kid. “You!” Jessica cried seeing the old witch who had cursed her. “I see you are enjoying my little curse.” Jessica didn’t even get up she just leaned back and continued to grab sweets. “Oh yes, people keep being nice and giving me delicious food and treats” She said with a smile slurping up some soup. “I can see that, I knew you were a shameless glutton, that would not hesitate to take advantage of my curse.” Feeling insulted by the witch’s accurate assessment of her personality, Jessica stood up with a bit of a struggle because of her gut, and confronted the witch. “So, what if I have a healthy appetite, It’s your fault people keep giving me food, who am I to refuse their offers.” Jessica countered with a huff, giving the elderly woman a smug smirk. “Some curse, what type of silly curse makes people be nice to you.” Jessica scoffed, the old woman just smiled at her wickedly, her gaze making Jessica feel uneasy. “Oh yes, people do give you things but that’s not going to help you with your little problem.” The witch said circling around the little girl, Jessica pondered the old witch’s words wondering what she was getting at. The answer revealed itself as Jessica’s tummy gurgle and swelled out larger making the girl look like she was heavy with twins.

Seeing how large her stomach had become left Jessica stunned and as she gazed at it in fear, the witch snuck up behind Jessica and placed her hands upon it. “That’s right little one, while people will lavish you with gifts, you’ll just keep growing rounder and bigger, I wonder how long you’ll enjoy it.” The witch cackled as she left Jessica alone cradling her stomach with worry. With the witch’s departure Jessica decided her next course of action.
15533112223321.title: She has another encounter with the old witch.

It was a nice day. The sky was bright blue and the sun was shining. It was clearly summer and it promised to be a warm day. Birds were singing. crickets were chirping.
On the roads between the green fields drove a carriage. A beautiful carriage. Highly decorated with beautiful designs on it and made from the best material. Of course the carriage of the royal family must be the best from the best. In front of the carriage and behind were some soldiers for protection. There were robbers or thief's in the woods sometimes.
Inside the carriage was the royal family. The king, queen and the two princesses. They might be sisters but that was about the only thing they had in common. Elizabeth was fat while her sister was skinny. Elizabeth's black hair was a big contrast with her sister blond curly hair. Elizabeth had a big appetite and hated exercise while her sister had a small appetite and loved exercise what was responsible for the sizes of both girls.

"Come on Elizabeth. Try to look a little more happy. You gonna meet your future husband."

Then or two kingdoms will become one. Then we have a bigger and stronger army so no enemy will dare to attack us."

"But suppose we don't like each other. I mean there must be some kind of love between two people. I all those stories at least."

"Fine. I guess you can have some cake. but promise me that you give that boy a chance. Who knows, perhaps you do like him. He's about your age so you must have some of the same interests. I think."

Emily and Elizabeth looked out of the window and saw a huge castle. It looked pretty nice. with a moat around it, several towers. At least it looked okay.

"Now just hope that boy is okay also."

...that she was going to hate him.
1553322111.content:
Edward von Hubitz, Prince of Saxony, was not a lad accustomed to nervousness. All his life he had been bought up to be regal, officious, strong; the kingship of Saxony demanded nothing less. Thus, he had faced all his prior suitors with decorum and tact; somewhat coldly, actually, mostly helped by the fact that he was attracted to none of them. In fact, the young Edward was rather drawn to the...larger side of life. Of course, his parents, rather busy with being King and Queen of Saxony, knew nothing of this; they did not expect Edward to marry for love, and had rejected all his previous suitors for political reasons. However, the large girl that was making her way in now was the Princess of Burgundy, and Saxony needed Burgundy's support, so Edward was not allowed to say no. Luckily, in this case, he was not inclined to. However, that also made him very nervous.

A bead of sweat dripped off of Edward's nose as he watched Princess Elizabeth of Burgundy struggle to walk the few more feet to the banquet table. It was very possibly the most adorable thing he had ever seen- though, once she reached the table and started shoveling the nearest item of food- a plate of potatoes- into her mouth, that image was rather shattered. Edward found her insatiable desire for food even more adorable, especially since she seemed to be tiring herself further with the simple effort of eating. Another bead of sweat rolled down his brow. He wished nothing more than to walk over to her and introduce himself, but all his princely courage seemed to have left him. How am I supposed to greet her? I don't even know that much French, what am I to do? She's going to hate me, I just know it... Thoughts whirled in his brain, causing him to lose track of the scene before him. He stood there, rooted to his spot, until:

"HEY!"

Edward jumped out of his reverie- actually jumped, about a foot into the air. "What- Who- What's happening?" he cried out, searching for the source of the noise. A giggle sounded from next to him, and his surprise quickly turned into a look of mild distaste.

"Oh, you're her sister, aren't you?" he said, with all the snideness he could muster with his limited French.

"I saw you looking at Elizabeth..." the younger girl tittered at him. "Do you like her?"

"I should not think," said Edward, lifting his nose even higher into the air, "that I need to answer my intentions to the likes of you."

Undeterred, the littler girl giggled again. "Don't worry! My sister's a big fatty, you don't need to do anything fancy! Just give her some food."

Edward was about to retaliate with something even snider when he realized she was right. "But what should I give her..." he mused aloud in German. What was it she said when she was walking up the stairs? Something...about...

"...CAKE!" he cried aloud, and raced to cut a slice.

By now, Elizabeth had worked her way through three or four very large plates of rich Saxon delicacies, and was feeling somewhat sated from her strenuous efforts on the stairs. However, she was still somewhat peckish, and was just about to reach for something else when someone started talking behind her.

"Erm...may I interest you...eh..." said the voice in heavily-accented, fumbling French, "...can I get you...um...would you like some cake?"

Elizabeth turned her heavy body around, rather slowly, and got a first look at the prince she was to marry. She immediately knew...

choices: Edward soon gives up the chase, and he and Elizabeth find a quiet place to be.
The chase is on- and it soon begins to bother the adults.
155332211112.content:
"Indeed." agreed the King of Saxony, Edward's father. "There are matters of grave importance that we all need to discuss."

Indeed, Herr König," said Elizabeth's father, the King of Burgundy, "You must have heard the news from Bavaria- apparently, they are planning something. They are raising an army large enough to rival mine."

"Yes, I have, Monsiour le Roi," replied Edward's father in French, "and, to make matters worse, I have also heard they are allying themselves with Denmark- who is similarly raising troops."

"Is that so? Well, I am sure Prussia could be leveraged to our side, but only if they get something out of it- and I am sure France wouldn't be happy if Prussia entered yet another war..." said Elizabeth's father, deep in thought.

"Perhaps Russia? Well, in any case, we should begin planning- if you would care to follow me, I have a map in my study we should peruse..."

The two kings walked away, deep in conversation. The Queen of Saxony laughed somewhat nervously.

"Well, my dear," she said to the Queen of Burgundy, "they may have a war to plan, but we have a wedding! Isn't that right, you two?" she cooed to the children, patting Edward on the head. The little prince groaned in response.

"Oh, isn't he such a dear child! I'm sure he and my Elizabeth will get along perfectly!" smiled the Queen of Burgundy. "Now, is there someplace we can talk? I don't want to ruin any surprises!"

"Of course, of course! Just come with me," said Edward's mother, and they, too, wandered away in conversation. Just like that, the prince and princess were left alone. Edward attempted to find the courage to resume conversation with Elizabeth.

"Um...well, how was dinner? Did you enjoy it?" he asked, looking into Elizabeth's deep brown eyes.

Elizabeth blushed somewhat, suddenly conscious of the amount that she had eaten. "Oh, it was simply-"

"BO-RING!"

Apparently, the two royal children were not quite as alone as they thought they were. Edward looked around in annoyance.

"Who said that? Come out, that I may berate you soundly for your insolence!" (Edward had a bad habit of talking far too fancily.)

Another giggle rang out, and a small, blond-haired girl crawled out from underneath the table.

"Oh, it's you," said Edward, mustering every ounce of sarcasm in his body. Elizabeth, on the other hand, cried out in surprise.

"Emily! How could you! You're going to absolutely ruin that dress!"

Emily stuck out her tongue in response. "Whatever, you ruined yours anyway! With all that food you dropped on it, I'm surprised it hasn't turned color!"

Elizabeth, thoroughly embarrased, looked down at the floor. Edward sprang to his feet, eyes flashing.

"Insolent fool! I should have your ears for that!"

Emily giggled yet again. "Sure, if you can catch me!" And, with that, she sprang off, sprinting away across the great hall.

"Why, you little- Get back here!" shouted Edward, racing after her.

"Oh, now come back- Wait- Rats!" cried Elizabeth, heaving herself to her feet and following slowly behind.

choices: Follow Edward- war is brewing, but council is boring.
