15533221111212.content:
The future bride-and-groom-to-be sat and talked for quite a while, of many, many things- of castles, of parents, of courtiers, of servants, of grounds and of each other. Through their conversations, Elizabeth learned that, beneath Edward's brusque and somewhat pompous exterior, he was truly a nice boy, and Edward learned that Elizabeth wanted nothing more than to eat and grow fatter- something he had never thought he'd find. She herself said that if she were to, one day, be able to do nothing more than sit on a soft bed and eat everything, she would be the happiest girl in the world. With that, Edward, good Saxon courage built to the fullest, put his lean hand on her soft one and said, "Elizabeth, I would like nothing more than to give you that future."

Her blush and wide grin spoke more than mere words ever could.

But, as with anything, the moment could not last forever, and in this case the end was bought about by the untimely appearance of one of the palace guards.

"Oh, Prince Edward, there you are! We've been looking everywhere for you!"

"Did it ever occur to you, Hermann, that perhaps I didn't want to be found?" Edward replied snidely.

"Please, sir, I wouldn't disturb you and the lovely lady," he paused to wink at Elizabeth, "if I didn't have to, but I must- the King is requesting your presence at his meeting."

"Ah, well, if Father calls I must go to him." Edward stood, and offered Elizabeth his arm, which she, after standing slowly, took. Hermann shook his head. "I'm afraid not- the Princess Elizabeth is needed for wedding plans..."

After a moment, Edward, unhappily, dropped his arm, and the two slowly turned away from each other. Edward told Hermann to take Elizabeth, and, with a last, forlorn look, Prince and Princess were separated.

1553322111121221.content:
Time seemed to stand still for a moment. Both Queen and Princess of Burgundy were absolutely mortified, fearing for the loss of a wedding and an alliance. Elizabeth feared she had ruined everything. The Queen, her husband's wrath.

Then, after a moment, the Queen of Saxony waved her hand. "Oh, dear! Clearly, our tailor doesn't know anything. We'll have a new dress made up in no time."

Elizabeth and her mother let out the breaths they had been holding. Everything would be alright.

"Come, my dear. Let's get your measurements taken, and properly this time," said the Queen of Burgundy, taking her daughter by one fat hand.

_________________

Meanwhile, Edward was having nothing so exciting happen to him. Normally, discussions of strategy would be interesting, but today all he could think of was his bride-to-be. She was perfect, the girl he had always dreamed of marrying someday- beautiful, intelligent, witty, charming...

...fat...

"Edward!"

"Eh?" the Prince cried, startled out of his thoughts.

"Edward, the King asked you a question!" his father shouted, sharp-pointed mustache bristling with rage.

"Oh, yes." The Prince paused, attempting to stall for time. "...what was the question again?"

Edward's father made an inconprehensible noise of anger. Elizabeth's father simply laughed.

"Come now, Frederick, can't you see he's preoccupied?" He leaned in conspiratorially. "Run along now. Better you like my daughter than not," he whispered to the prince.

"Oh, thank you sir!" Edward cried, joyously, and sped out of the conference. His father merely sighed.

"Really now, Phillip, you'll only encourage him."

"Is that so bad?" the King of Burgundy asked philisophically. "He's to be married soon, after all!"

The King of Saxony, despite his bristling, was inclined to agree.

Edward sighed. He surely did't picked her to be bridesmaid. Probably his parents. He did't liked it but he also knew she would become bridesmaid anyway. He did't really liked Emily. He found her sassy, annoying and very unattractive. With no fat on her body. Unlike her perfect sister.

He made her angry. You should never made Emily angry. Emily might be a pretty and cute girl. But if she was angry she could be very mean. Very, very mean. Revenge was something powerful.
Emily looked back at the frog and fishes that were swimming in the pond. She looked at her reflection in the water and smiled.

15533222222221.content:
Queen Victoria was out for a meal, desiring to bring something home to the palace. She felt it would keep her somewhat in touch with her subjects, and, her great love of food did not stop her from sampling dishes that normal folks would eat. Her retainers would often tell her that anything her majesty wanted she could have at the palace, but she shrugged them off. Every meal then would be filled with posh and circumstance, she thought. So, even amid protests from within the court, she would have a Roman Holiday.
On the itinerary was to go to her favorite butcher and get a meat pie, a leg of lamb, and then cross over to a bakery to fetch a fitting sweet for dessert. Like a cake, or perhaps a fruit pie, or maybe something else would call to her tummy. She really didn’t know what. But she was content to let her appetite decide.
Of course, she still made the barest effort to go there. Like a proper lady, she would be chauffeured by carriage, something which appeased her retainers, but it was also convenient because Victoria detested exercise. Her only exertion was to leave the carriage and walk into the store to get her prized mutton.
On the way, Victoria strolls happily, innocently toying with a velvet pouch of money, thinking only of the meat and not the attention she was attracting.
It was only a matter of time before a thief bumped into the queen, knicking her pouch for himself and dashing away. “Stop!” calls out Victoria. “Stop I say!” She tries to run after the criminal herself, but only manages to speed up to a light jog, and even then, she went down maybe fifty meters and wound up breathless.
Olivia, who had been shining shoes for some coin, paused her work to pay attention to the commotion. It wasn’t too long before she knew the thief would disappear, and thinking quickly, she lobbed her shoe shining brush at his head. The wooden handle clunked against his head, and he fell, dazed. It wasn’t long after that the queen’s entourage had swarmed him. Even Queen Victoria walked up leisurely from behind and smacked him viciously with a handbag.
It was only later that the Queen appeared again before the street girl. Olivia smelled the food just purchased on her majesty. It made her mouth water.
“Excuse me,” says the queen politely, “I wish to return to you your brush. You were very helpful during that incident. I thank you, young lady. May I know your name?”
“It’s Olivia, your highness, and please forget what happened. It was nothing.”
“Oh! I assure you, you’re mistaken! Your wits and quick thinking have made my rescue possible. You deserve to be rewarded. Go ahead, Olivia, you can ask me for something.”
It was by now that the scent of the food was just too pervasive and tempting, and Olivia’s stomach rumbled. This kicked off a rather amusing, and yet hasty discussion. The queen and Olivia discover that they shared a great love of food. Olivia just didn’t have much of it, sadly. Yet, she could speak on the tastiest porridge, fruit, breads, and other goods. The queen was sure she could nurse this girl to a point where she'd have a hearty appetite, just like she did. Victoria found herself wanting to feed her, too. Oh, this was a most interesting experience! It wasn’t long before the queen welcomed the famished girl to the castle for a special dinner. Heck, the Queen had enough for a snack on the way, if Olivia really wanted it and couldn’t wait.

Then she ate the chocolate one. Finally she ate the apple pie. Much to her disappointment, she would not find out what the surprise was that the Hewitt family would give her for eating all the pies. Her stomach, as it turned out, was literally stuffed full of food, and the pies were of such huge size that they could not all fit. “Don’t worry Daisy. I did not expect you to be able to eat everything.” Howard responded, helping the now much bigger Daisy to her feet. He continued, “In fact, you did better than I expected. Most people are not able to eat as much as you do. Go to sleep now darling, we will be shopping early tomorrow morning.” Daisy responded “Okay, I guess. It’s past my bedtime anyways. Tuck me in please.” “I will darling, I promise.”

Did it go well,” Helga asked as Howard came down the stairs from Daisy’s room. “Yes. Her appetite is growing day by day. She will still need a lot of work to be fat enough to eat, but she is taking more easily to the weight gain process than most. I would almost say she could be fattened to death and she would not care. I almost want to do that, as we have never done so.” “You want her to be fattened to death. Daisy did't mind it and swallowed the last bite of her third quarter pounder. The she realized she had fries to. She took some sips of cola and started stuffing fries in her mouth taking sips cola between. Daisy was really hungry since she did't had breakfast while since she came to live with the Heiwitt family she always got a big breakfast. She was wondered why they did't gave her one this morning but now she understood and she was happy she did't eat breakfast.

"Wow mom. She really can eat. She eats way more and better than Sonja. Remember her. She was such a trouble maker with fattening her up so we could…"

Her mother pushed her with her elbow gave her a angry look a whispered: "Sssssh."

Helga did't need to worry. Daisy was to caught up in her eating. Sure she had been hungry when they arrived here but now wit six quarter pounder's in her stomach and six large orders of fries she must admit she felt very full. However her hands grabbed another quarter pounder and she started to stuff it in her mouth. But halfway she must admit her defeat. She felt too stuffed to eat another bite.

"I'm sorry but I'm really full. If I eat another bite I'll explode."

"Well we can take what's left with us. Maybe you're hungry later.

Kari took a seat next too Daisy and started to rub Daisy's tummy. Daisy must admit that it did feel good.
155332222222221312112.title: Eat and eat

1553322222222213121121.content: “Daisy, what do you think of this? A little tight?” Helga asked, waving a baggy smock top before her. “I like this one, and no, not tight at all.” Daisy responded. Helga had such a tendency to recommend such good clothes. She first recommended a number of baggy dresses. She then recommended nice smock tops with appealing prints. Jeans were nice and loose as well. All the clothes were so nice, and so freeing of her stomach. They were so flattering of her figure, and yet they left room to expand as she grew in both height and weight. Kari got a lot of good clothes as well. The cart was full of some twenty five clothing items, mostly for Kari, but with another trip in the works for Daisy. After paying, Helga asked “Shall we go back home, or to Mcdonald’s again?”
1553322222222213121121.title: Clothes shopping

choices: Helga has a talk with her husband
15533222222222131211212.content:
Daisy looked a bit painful. She looked up at Helga.

"I must admit I loved the food of Mc Donalds and I would like it to eat there again but... I'm still really full from breakfast. I could't even eat all of that while I was pretty hungry. So I would love to go another time but right now I'm really full."

"Well that's to bad. But if you're still full you don't need to continue eating. Else you barf it all out." Helga said.

"Really?" Kari asked. "I thought that your tummy exploded. Like in that cartoon I once saw."

"Cartoons are normally not real Kari. They're just for fun. However I must admit that a lot of movies also are so fake sometimes. Things that can never happen in real life." Helga said. "Does't matter. Let's go home."

They got in the car and drove of.
Kari sat next to Daisy and bend over. Suddenly she put a hand on her belly and started to rub and massage her belly. Daisy must admit she liked this. It was just like a nice belly rub. Her real parents never did this. Perhaps partly because her mother did't wanted a fat daughter. If she could see her now. If things were going to stay this way she probably would soon be the opposite of what her mother wanted.

"You starting to get a nice and soft belly." Kari said. "Just like Sonja."

"Who's Sonja?" Daisy asked surprised.

Kari looked shocked and turned a bit pale and looked in the rear-view mirror at her mother for some help. Daisy did't understood why Kari looked so scared. Like if she told a terrible secret. After a minute Helga started to talk.

"Sonja is a girl that lived with us for some time. Her parents were busy with some work in another country. Could't take her in the start but after some time they found a way they could take her. Anyway she now lives far away so we probably never see her again. Too bad... she was such a nice girl. Kari was kind of close with her so she's a bit sad when we talk about her."

Of course this was't the truth. Sonja was a girl they fattened up and ate before Daisy. But of course Daisy was''t supposed to know that.

Daisy looked at Kari. She thought Kari had looked more shocked and scared then sad. But she decided not to think about it. She would probably never see that Sonja girl anyway. She did't saw the mean look Helga gave her daughter in the rear view mirror.
Kari stayed silent for the rest of the entire trip. Looking like she prepared for a angry lecture.

As soon if they arrived home Daisy took her new clothes to her room. Kari wanted to do that too but Helga grabbed her tight by the wrist and dragged her to the basement. Carefully closed to door so no one else would hear them.

"Kari that was on of the most stupid things you have ever done. Saying the name of one of our earlier meals. Do you also want to tell her about Annie, or else Kathy, or will we just show her all people we fattened up and ate. What was wrong with you. What's rule nr. 1? Never blow our cover. Now I saved you by some silly story about Sonja. But now I need t make sure that you brother and father know about it too or else we could end up with strange questions that I don't want to answer. But please be more careful with what you say around our delicious feast."

"Yes mommy." Kari send with bend head and let out a sigh. After that she took her new clothes and went upstairs.
15533222222222131211212.title: Who's Sonja

15533222222222222.content:
It was an average day out at the Jones house but today wasn't just any other day. The day before, Mr. Jones left to take what he could to sell. Today June was going to go out hunting despite not needing to. She got up and going to start hunting. On her way out, her sister came out to see her off.

"Going out already?" Jennifer asked.

"I am. Food dad brought is good but knowing me, I cant rely on just that to satisfy me." June said.

"Take this. I made it to bring you some good luck and protection."

Jennifer gave June a necklace made from a few of the claws and bones from a couple animals that June brought home. June liked it and had it on before leaving. Jennifer knew that she could bring in anything she could hunt down and even puts their father to the challenge. They knew that there wasn't anything she couldn't bring down but bringing them back would be a challenge. There was also nothing June wont eat and was well off. June knew that the hides bring in the money for them for the most part and the rest was for them to survive off of.
15533222222222222.title: June

155332222222222221.content:
June liked how things were going and found only a couple things that would satisfy her for a day or two. She saves what she can and hoped to sell them. By night of her day out, June found a track of a large animal. Her stomach let out a growl and can tell it was a deer.

"Good eating tonight." June said.

She followed the tracks a bit before finding the deer. It was a buck bigger than most she's ever seen. For now she would just wait until the right moment to strike. When the time came, she got it down with a single shot. Now the challenge was getting it back to camp. It was a challenge the chubby girl managed to do. When she got there, she got going with prepping it. The best may take a while to cook but she had some smaller game made for now. The hide and antlers would make some money and she wouldn't get much with this meat.

"Nothing beats a hunt better than eating it." June said.

She soon began eating and loved it. Her father taught her a few things that made it taste better when freshly cooked and it wasn't bad at all. She managed to finish it all and was more than satisfied. Her family knows what she does while hunting alone and don't do anything about it since she usually brings something back to sell and for them.

1553322222222222211.content:
June slept peacefully that night after eating and dreamt of all the hunts she'll do in the future. Morning soon came to her dismay and pleasure. Dismay for her wonderful dream and pleasure for it would come true. She made sure she knew where her camp was and set off to hunt a bit, even if it was a couple squirrels. An hour had passed and nothing was found. June didn't like going too long without a hint meaning she won't eat. That would change for her. Despite not being much of a hunter, Jennifer always seems to find the best pray a girl can find, her sister.

"Look at what I've got here, a little pig lost." Jennifer said.

They got settled in and soon was out for the night.

"This is some good stuff. Good thing June doesn't eat this kind of stuff."

They were given a dollar per hide they had and got $2 per antler. They made $15 for all the deer and a couple extra for a couple other things. With that, thy got a couple other things and made their way home. They ran into their father who finished his business there and went with. They put the money away and settled in for the night.

While many might have had trouble with this, Hungia took to it like a fish in water. However, she isn’t a loving, kind, ruler. No, this fat, little, girl is a tyrant who only thinks about how she can pamper herself. Of course, her favorite form of pampering is eating. A person goes into her hut and doesn’t come back out! Of course, these are only rumors, right?
155332222222222232.title: No, More Girls Please

1553322222222222321.content:
It was a hot, summer, day in the African jungle. The sky clear and the sun was shining brightly. Fortunately, the canopy above did offer some protection from the sun’s rays, but it was still warm enough to make everyone in the village below miserable

Everyone, that is, except for 1, little, girl. Inside the largest hut, sitting on a comfortable, padded, chair was 8 year old Hungia. The fat, little, princess sat in front of a long wooden table, which was barely off the ground, finishing off her latest feast as 2 of her servants fanned her

This was pretty much how her days went. After her parents disappeared, the young plumper had taken over. While technically still a princess and not a queen, given her age, she was in power over her tribe and seemed to revel in it. She got to do whatever she wanted, after all, and there was 1 hobby she held above all else: eating

Her tribe was working overtime to try and sate her bottomless appetite. Many of her people were starting to go hungry, but Hungia didn’t care. All she cared about was adding to her own, impressive, waistline. Fortunately, the chubby child enjoyed her weight and loved getting bigger. Pure and simple, Hungia was a fat, young, spoiled, brat of a princess

She let out a small burp as she finished off her latest plate of food. She was just about to demand another when someone entered the hut with…
1553322222222222321.title: Let’s go with Hungia

choices: Take a look at the people outside
15533222222222223211.content:
… a bound servant. Hungia looked up disturbed.

"Your Majesty," The man said. "We captured this servant."

"Why? What did he do?" Hungia asked uninterested.

"Well he escaped and tried to flew," The man said.

"WHAT?" Hungia screamed. "How dare he. Well I know a perfect punishment. I'm gonna lock you up in a tiny place. I have a perfect place for you in mind. You know what do do with him."

"I do. Don't worry you. You won't be in there for long. Just a few days. After you have been digested."

She could hear the man scream but did't care. All she cared about was herself. She thought she looked beautiful. Being so fat. She always had the idea that she had so much power and for that she had to have a big body. Big could of course also be fat. And how fatter she got how much more power she got. She was planning to become the fattest person ever.
She wanted to ask for more food but suddenly remembered the man. Perhaps she would wait a bit. She hated being hungry. But she knew the man would soon be ready. Ready to eat. Human flesh tasted pretty good and she wanted be able to eat enough of him.
Yes Hungia was a cannibal. Normal prisoners or people who disobeyed her were eaten. Sometimes just a servant. Human flesh tasted terrific. A bit like pig. Only sweeter. The people knew. Oh She was sure they knew but did't want to believe it. But what happened to people who entered the hut? They never came out and no one ever saw them again. They must have known what is going on but just refused to believe it. However her servants and cooks knew. She had a whole bunch of servants who did everything for her. She hardly needed to move a muscle. Of course she had a lot of cooks who were busy the whole day preparing food for her. Sure they made human more then once so they knew for sure but they were't allowed to go outside.
She did't feel any remorse for the people she had eaten. She did't feel any remorse for anyone. When her parents and brother died she did't cry. Not one single tear. To be honest she was happy. Without them she could rule.

"Help me up. I want to sit on my throne!" Hungia screamed.

Servants got up to help the spoiled brat that was a princess. Hungia's throne was decorated with the tusks of elephants and the teethes of hippo's. She had a lot of things made from animals. Animals she had eaten. Animals where only good when they were dead. Then you could eat them and use their skin or fur. Maybe their bones. That was the only things animals were good for.
The servants had placed Hungia at her throne.

"What are you waiting for. Continue fanning. I'm melting over here! It's hot."

A servant walked in and bowed for Hungia. She smiled. It was't that she really liked him but she did't dislike him and he was kind of useful for her.

"My princess, I see you already had something for lunch but the cooks wanted to know what you wanted to have for dinner. So they can prepare if they need to."

"Hmmm. I'm in the mood for zebra. Did any of the hunters caught a zebra today?"

"Yes he did. However if you take the zebra the family wont have anything to eat today. They also did't had anything to eat yesterday."

"Since when did that stop me?" Hungia asked.

"Never your highness."

"Right. So why stop now. By the way, if anyone else caught a zebra I want that one as well."

"Like you wish your highness."
15533222222222223211.title: The cruelty of a princess

155332222222222232111.content:
After what seemed like an eternity of waiting, lunch was finally prepared. 2 of her most muscled servants carried out a huge, wooden, platter. On it, nicely displayed, was a layer of rice and the servant from before. He was cooked and had an apple placed in his mouth, making him looked like the wild bores Hungia would gorge herself on

With a heavy thud, the servants set the feast before their bratty princess. The fat, 8, year old’s stomach rumbled loudly at this and her eyes light up with horrible delight. She was quickly given a knife and fork and that was all it took for her to begin

Maybe it was to tease her servants. Maybe it was to show off just how much she planned to eat. Maybe it was just her being greedy. Whatever the reason, Hungia started on the rice first. She wolfed it down in record time and with few manors .True, she may have been a princess. However, she was still an 8 year old, and a glutton at that. All she cared about was getting as much food in her mouth as possible

It was then it began. As if she was eating some delicious animal, Hungia began on the roasted servant. She began on his legs, working on them quickly like they were just another piece of meat. In the same way, his arms were eaten like drumsticks, even getting a moan of delight from the gluttonous, chunky, little girl

The other servants looked away nervously as she continued onto his torso. They had seen this play out more than a few times, but never got used to it. After all, they all knew they could be next. Sure she ate those who disobeyed her, but more than a few obedient servants had fallen to Hungia’s endless appetite
155332222222222232111.title: Lunch

1553322222222222321112.content:
Hungia smiled. She knew some servants got really nervous or even disgusted by turning people into food for a spoiled fat brat but she was in charge. And with her eating like this she would only become fatter and that was what she wanted.
She ate every piece of the servant. The bones were licked clean. There was't the smallest piece of meat left on them. She even scraped the meat of his skull. There was nothing left of him except a pile of bones.
Hungia leaned back and let out a huge belch. One servant got right over to her.

"Does your highness want a belly rub?" He asked nicely.

"Yes. A belly rub would be nice. Do that." She said enjoyed.

He started right on it. Rubbing and massaging the big pile of blubber. He was in a way pretty smart. He worked here for some time now. Because of that he mostly knew what Hungia wanted and when she wanted that. Like the belly rub. Because of this he was very useful. Hungia was mean, cruel, knew no mercy, and was selfish, but as long if somebody was useful for her she would't eat him or her.

"Rub a bit higher. Yep right there. That's the spot. He was delicious. It was worth the wait."

"Is our highness happy?" The servant asked.

"Well my belly is full and is getting rubbed. I have a delicious zebra dinner to look forward to. That reminds me. Did they caught another zebra?"

"I don't know for sure your highness. I busy like you feel but perhaps someone else could look."

Hungia pulled at a cord. A bell was heard and the next moment a servant walked in.

"What is it you want your highness?"

"Remember what I said? I wanted zebra for dinner. But if somebody caught another zebra I wanted that one too. Go look and make sure that nobody else kept a tasty zebra behind."

"But your highness… people are hungry."

The servant who was still busy rubbing closed his eyes. He could't believe how stupid this man was. No one said "but" to Hungia. He was lucky she just had eaten or else he would be the next one who would end up in her belly.

"Did you say: but?" Hungia asked on such an cold and icy tone it could freeze fire. "Do you know what happened to the last person who said but to me? And what the heck were you talking about? So some people are a bit hungry. So what? Who cares about them when I'm the one who's starving? I'm more important than them. If they want more food they need to hunt more. Then there's also more food for me. So I can become fatter and even more beautiful then I am now and… Where was I?"

Hungia could sometimes be a bit sidetracked like every eight year old.

"You wanted to know if anyone else got a zebra your highness." The servant who still rubbed her belly said.

"Right," She said and looked at the other servant. "Where are you waiting for? A invitation? Go over there and make sure they don't have a extra zebra. Because if I don't have enough zebra I might eat something else."

"Like you wish your highness."
1553322222222222321112.title: Rubbing

choices: There’s a problem of some sort
15533222222222223211121.content:
The servant rubbing her belly did his best to sooth her fat, greedy, gut. He knew that a happy Hungia was best for everyone’s sake. So, he continued his soothing kneading of the chunky, little girl’s, belly. He hoped this would dissuade her from doing anything too rash

It was only when the mouthy servant from before re-entered the hut that he felt a bit better. If the servant brought good news, Hungia would be happy with the additional zebra. If he brought bad news, he could be her next meal and not him

“What *URP* is it?” Hungia asked, still worked up from before

“Good news your highness. Another family brought back a zebra. You may have 2 of them for dinner, if you don’t mind the families going hungry…”

“I want both cooked over a spit and covered in peppers!” She bellowed at the skinny man in front of her, interrupting him

With that, Hungia returned to her, pampering, tummy rub. That was pretty much how the rest of her day went. She lazed back, letting her big, round, exposed, fat-kid, belly get all the love and attention it desired. She didn’t have a care in the world and enjoy every moment of her decadent pampering

All too soon though, she began to hunger. The thought of 2, tasty, zebras brought her belly to a loud, gluttonous, rumble. There was no doubt about it: it was time for dinner
15533222222222223211121.title: There's another zebra

choices: A servant comes in with disturbing new
155332222222222232111211.content:
"You can stop now," Hungia said. "It's time for dinner now. However I must admit you're very good at tummy rubbing. Keep up the good work."

The servant smiled thankfully and would keep up the good work. How better you did your job the less chance you had you would be eaten. You just need to be useful. Most people did't liked Hungia but were wise enough not to say that out loud. There was only one person. The spice lady. A old woman with white hair. She was mostly a bit grumpy scolded a lot and sometimes insulted people. Even Hungia. Hungia had planned to eat her when she insulted her but her servants advised her not to do it. The spice lade knew more about healing plants and spices then anyone else. Hungia knew that even a princess or queen could get ill or get injured. When that would happen to her if she needed the spice lady and she was eaten. That was the only reason she was still alive.

"Are you ready with my dinner!!!" She yelled. "I'm starving over here. I'm looking forward to a nice tasty zebra."

"We're almost done with the first your highness," A servant said. "Just a few more minutes."

"Hmmm. You better make sure that those zebra's are worth the waiting."

"Of course your highness. Cooked over a spit and covered in peppers just like you asked. However your majesty I Must inform you that some people... are,,, not... too... happy with this all."

"What do you mean?" Hungia asked bored.

"Well... Many families are hungry. Some families need to go for a few days without any food."

"So what? What do you want me to do? It's not my problem now is it?" Hungia said.

"Well... you are the queen... or princess," He mumbled.

"Exactly. So if there is't enough food the hunters need to work harder to catch more animals and the farmers need to grow more grains and vegetables. How hard is it to understand that? Do I need to think of everything? It's not that difficult. They need to do those things. Not me. Besides the most important thing for them is that their queen is happy. As long if I'm happy they're fine. Now where's my dinner!"

The next moment servants brought in the first zebra. Hungia wasted no time and buried her face in it and started eating like a wild animal. Chewing loudly. Burping and sounds from ripping the meat of the bones. Even pigs had better manners then her. But everyone was wise enough not to say that. after all what difference would it make. Except maybe that she would eat the one who said it as well. The sounds that were so disgusting some people felt the urge to vomit. But Hungia was't done with eating. There was nothing left of the first zebra except some bones. Totally clean. Not the tiniest small piece of meat was left on them. But the next moment the second zebra was brought in. Hungia licked her lips.
155332222222222232111211.title: Hungry!

1553322222222222321112111.content:
Even before the servants set the massive, cooked, zebra down, Hungia was gorging on it like she hadn’t seen food in months. Just as disgusting as before, she tore the zebra apart like a starving beast. She didn’t have the slightest hint of manors as she did it either. The same rude noses she made on her first dish filled the hut with the second dish of her supper

Very quickly, Hungia had finished her meal. Like before, not a single strand of meat was left on the bones of the zebra. Hungia sat back with a toothy grin on her face. She let out a big, loud, rude, belch before using 1 of the zebra’s bones as a toothpick

The servant from before looked over and noticed just how big the fat, 8 year old, princess’s belly had grown. True, the young fatty’s gut was already a sight to behold. However, after eating the servant, and the 2 zebras, the big, chocolate-brown, belly looked stuffed to its limit. Hungia’s tummy jutted out proudly, boasting a gain of at least 4 inches

“I-is there anything else you’d like princess?” He asked, his eyes still glued to her belly

He knew that, despite how full she looked, Hungia was pretty well always hungry and, most often, would want more to eat. It was almost expected by the servants at this point

It was then the fat, preteen, princess looked over and replied,

“I want…”
1553322222222222321112111.title: Continue dinner

choices: She wakes up in the middle of the night, time for a midnight snack
15533222222222223211121111.content:
...Some dessert. Those two zebra's were pretty good but they did't fill me up entirely. I still need more food to fill my belly. Understood?"

"Right away your highness!" He said while he ran to the kitchen.

Hungia grinned. She liked it when those servants were smart. That was good for them since then they would't get eaten. If you did your best to please her and you were useful to her you were safe. Her servants were well aware of that and that and that way she had power over them, because they were scared of her. Fear could give you power over people.
She hoped the servant would return soon he could give her some belly rubs until the dessert was ready.
This was the life. Being pampered and get whatever you want. She was surprised when she heard she would become queen. She did't really cared her family was gone because now she had so much power and now she could eat people. Something she had't been able to do before. She always wanted to taste one but of course she was't allowed to eat another human being. But now she was and she must admit they were delicious. "How can we? I'm not a hunter. I can't hunt. I can't run after animals. You know I get tired if I have to stand more then a few minutes and how walking exhausts me. The hunters need to work harder. I told you that before. How hard is it. Am I the only one with brains here?"

The man sighed and left the throne room. Hungia closed her eyes and enjoyed the belly rub and slowly drifted away to sleep.

15533222222222223221.content:
It was just a normal day. It was summer and the sun was shining bright. It had been nice weather for the past weeks.
On a path between the fields walked a young girl named Wyona. She blew some hair out of her face. She was very proud of her long straight blond hair and knew a lot of girls looked with envy at her blond hair. They also looked with envy at her body. Wyona had a healthy appetite. She was Lucky since her parents earned a lot of money and they were able to live a good life with enough food. Wyona became kind of chubby but in the 16 century a chubby girl/woman was seen like a sign of wealth. Someone who earned enough money to buy a decent meal. So her parents never saw this like a problem. They even were proud at her.

"Hmmm. Nice weather. Guess it's gonna be a hot night. Perhaps I can go out tonight. I've staid inside the past two nights."

Ever since she was bitten by that wolf she sometimes felt strange. She was convinced it was a werewolf and knew for sure he had changed her in a werewolf too. More then once she got outside during the night. She howled against the moon. She would run around, sometimes on hand and feet. She acted like a blood thirsty predator. Devoured everything on her path. She had't met any humans, yet. Good thing too. She had't met any human but she had met enough critters on her path who ended up in her belly. About two weeks ago she ate five chickens from a farmer. However eating all that critters added a few pounds to her frame but she was happy with them.
But was she really a werewolf. Well she does't transform. No fur, tail, razor sharp teeth or claws. She's still a normal girl that acts like a blood thirsty predator during some nights.
Perhaps Wyona was just a girl with a lot of imagination.
Perhaps she has schizophrenia (when you don't can't tell what's real and what's not). However in a time when people really believed in witches and werewolves it was sometimes hard to tell who has schizophrenia.
Perhaps she was just mentally ill. Some people also believe they are Napoleon, or Jezus. So why not a werewolf. Especially in a time were people really believed in werewolves and witchcraft.
Perhaps she just swallowed some strange stuff. For example the plant belladonna. Even while it means pretty lady this stuff can give people terrible hallucinations.
We don't know for sure what caused it but she was convinced she was a werewolf. Well more a werewolf cub, she was just eight years old after all but still.
But she knew very well she needed to be careful. If people found out she was a werewolf they would burn her without a second thought (thousands of people were burned in the 16th century because people thought they were werewolves, just like witches). She had it seen a few times. Back then she thought it was for the best. But when it happened to you it was different.

"I don't want to kill animals and humans but I just can't help myself. I don't have control. I'm stop thinking clear. The wolf is just taking over my brain. I can't stop it."

She sighed and walked further through the fields.
15533222222222223221.title: Werewolf, or maybe not

info.brief_description: Little girls gain weight in history
info.description:
This weight gain story is about young girls who gain weight but not in this time. This is in the history. The time can be from the early stone age until the first years of the 20th century. Keep in mind that in the history fat girls were seen like a sign of wealth and beauty. Just look at the fertility statues https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/venus_of_willendorf
So the girls probably get a bit more support from family and friends.

First the rules
No male weight gain
No sex or porn (these are little kids we're talking about)
No gay or lesbian stuff
Puppy love relationships, kissing and cuddling are okay
The characters can't die because of their weight gain
No magic spells, potions or ray guns
No suddenly gains a lot of weight
No descriptive nudity
Cannibalism is allowed BUT they can't swallow a character whole and before you write a chapter that involes cannibalism leave a second choice so people who don't like it don't have to read it.
You can add your own character BUT give a good discription of her and important her time area and don't make girls older then 10 (this story is called: Little girls)

Most important have funand keep on writing
